1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/a b+hi skam na s+yAtAt+ma/byed skad du/mngon par
1b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i mdo//dkon mchog gsum la phyaga'atshal lo//gang zhig nyid kyi dbu
1b3(mdo sde): ninirin chen 'od ldan dang /btsun mo pad+ma kho bye ma rIs mdangs ldan pas/slong ba
1b4(mdo sde): dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing /chos rnams sbyin mdzad ni'i darma
2a1(mdo sde): /phyuglu 'tshal lo//ga shig rnyed pas dun ng+gA'i 'ardzogs lus 'das gyur nga /spyod pa'i'atsha
2a2(mdo sde): thams cad nga byed ni gyur la/sdug bsngal mithul med 'khor ba'i na mtsho ltas ni lnga ba'i/rnam tho gcig tu
2a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs chostsal phyag 'tshal lo//gang la yon tan rdul byung lo gnas sbyin pa'i gnas//mchod pacung
2a4(mdo sde): zad byas kyang rgya che nyid 'ogyur bya/bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis//
2a5(mdo sde): brgyan 'phagaso pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo//thub gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa mi spyod pa'am/
2b1(mdo sde): nub mo 'byung ga ci yang yod minA lA//tshig btu ba dang dzin pa'i nus dung rnam dulag//rnam par glu yongs phyir 'brus sprul
2b2(mdo sde): 'di 'drug nyu rgyud cig/de ltar pang+ge'i byo'i dbus gnas byu nga ni//'khor zhi d+ma la ni rgyung 'di sogs par byed//de bzhin pang+ge 'i
2b3(mdo sde): me gyi b+hUd+hI rmyi li nang nas//rlung yid rashA t+tha dag 'byed chung bang bsdu bar bya//rtsub pa'i gsu ni m+bu lus shin+da tu rtags de//'og
2b4(mdo sde): na madz+haiM ts+tshinA 'di ba n+ti sh+le g+h+ra~M/rnam shrI tshig sa spyod kyi ma thar 'dri ma dag sten/chen ma na na
2b5(mdo sde): 'dini m+bu ci dgas//phyogs rnams su sbyin dang gag so pa'i snang khyA g+sa/ gsul zhes byas 'i dag par b+har pA na/
2b6(mdo sde): mis skyeng sa skyes kyu las rgyal bas rgyu ma smin gyis//bdud pas na cu'i cang pan 'od kyis zhol gcing rgyas//glang po'i
3a1(mdo sde): //po rgyags 'khrigs 'dod chags kyis chags pa//'phral du btsos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skabs gyur la//gzigs nas
3a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i chags sogs nyes pa zhi bzhed pas//thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btag/de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims//
3a3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang //brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams//nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag spe'o//'gro la
3a4(mdo sde): phan phyir shin tu dka' bi brgya phrag mdzad//thugs rje cher ldan drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du//nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad mi skyo ji
3a5(mdo sde): snyed do//brjod pa 'di ni shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang //gang dag phyir ni chung zad yongs su brjod par bya//lteg mo shrI ba'i glang po spre'u
3a6(mdo sde): dpyad dka' thub dbang //tshengs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas//don kun sgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po che gcig thogs
3b1(mdo sde): rlung chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas su skye ba ba nas//der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la logs glazigs nas//sgrubs med g.yo zhing phyongs pa du mas
3b2(mdo sde): yongs khyab la//thugs rje chen bas zlu gas na spro ba bskyed gyur//gzhan gyi don mdzod thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgangs gyur//de bus 'di ni dri myu mi tshul
3b3(mdo sde): ga gonas te/spyi dang ni shin pa'i 'artags pa gzigs nim ni//rang tho gas des mdzod byang chub ya dge bas/de bzhin chos sbyin mdzad pa po
3b4(mdo sde): mamanyan par gyis//de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byung rgyu sems dpa' bsgral pa myong par bya snod rnams dang // shes kyi tshogs dpag tu
3b5(mdo sde): rnam dum ba gis pas tshun kyi yos su smyigs nga gyi nyon ma sa bya'i hU~M mas na sa na da 'arnams
3b6(mdo sde): m+b+hal ga/gzhan myi na mdzad pa phyi rgyug tu na pa mdzad pa rnags pa dgas ma du dza gleng de
3b7(mdo sde): sa phyun shi khri gang mig mig dang nga chu ma rnams gakyis dang shin tu ga kyis yongs su cing 'i ga sa
4a1(mdo sde): /la gnas pa dang /gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang /rtag tu lhong ba med pa'i spro ba dang /'bras bu dang bcag/
4a2(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang /yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i
4a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog tshogs rnams la mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas byams pa'i stobs dang /zla 'od dang shi
4a4(mdo sde): bI dang glang po dang thams cad sgrol dang bzod par smra ba dang /spre'u yi bdag po dang mig bzangs dang sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed du smon lam byas
4a5(mdo sde): shing bsregs pa/e ma'o kye ma bdag gis 'jig rten long pa 'dren pa med pa/yongs su 'dren pa med pa/chos mi yin pa/'dod chags kyis dbang du 'gro ba/
4a6(mdo sde): log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyad pa/sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/khro ba mang ba/lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing gis rnam par brlag pa/phrag dog
4a7(mdo sde): dang ser snas kun tu bcings pa/legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la bdag sangs rgyas su
4b1(mdo sde): gyur nas sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o//ma grolnga ba rnams ni dgrol bar bya'o//dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o//yongs su mya ngan las ma
4b2(mdo sde): 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin na da ni bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyis/ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi gnas
4b3(mdo sde): skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na gdul bar nus so//gdul bar nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/su ni 'grib/
4b4(mdo sde): su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/su ni gnod par gyur/su ni nyams theg par gyur/sa ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig/me 'jigs shig/ces
4b5(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbugs dbyung bar bya/su ni ngan song lnga gzhol/su ni ngan spong la 'bab/sra ni ngan song la bab/su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/mtho ris dang
4b6(mdo sde): thur ba'i 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phrigs pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyur
4b7(mdo sde): gi bdag po la bzhag par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed po dag ni bskyed par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/gang gi yongs su
5a1(mdo sde): smin par bya/gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnams par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na sgrog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni
5a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba mi bskyed pa bskyed padro ba dang la la dge ba'i rtsa ba mi smin pa yongs su smin par nus pa dang /la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang
5a3(mdo sde): la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang /la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub 'thob par gzhol ba dang /la la bla na med
5a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang /la la ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsags pas rkyen la rags las pa gang zhig ma thos pas dam pa'i
5a5(mdo sde): chos las yongs su nyams par gyur par gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma'o bdag gis yun ring po nas yang dag par rtogs pa rdzogs par
5a6(mdo sde): gyur cing dra'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes ba shing ngas bya ba ni byas so//ngas khur bskur bar dka' ba ni mdzar phyin te/gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang
5a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yun ring por mi thogs par pad+ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma rig pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur
5b1(mdo sde): gyur gyis byi ba shol mi bya'o//'dir gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na bzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyis mu la badrug mi'i 'jig rten du song la
5b2(mdo sde): dring phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang /de bzhin du gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/'di rnams skal ba ji lta bu bzhin du 'dri rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/
5b3(mdo sde): cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dung 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung po///
5b4(mdo sde): skyabs med pa/yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog tshogs rnams dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o//thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su 'brel ba'i 'od
5b5(mdo sde): tshogs dang /zhe sdang dang gto mug gi mes kun tu gdungs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal mi lus pa bas lwa bar bya'o zhes dar
5b6(mdo sde): delta bu'i thugs le dgongs pa nges par bskyed nas/dzim+b+ha'i gling du 'jug par mdzad pa na rigs dang yul dang dus dang rgyud dang bud med de gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do//
5b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas ni bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sede'i
6a1(mdo sde): /rnams rig sa ji lta bu zhig tu nyid mtshams sbyor ba len s+thAm+b+han/bram ze'i rigs sam/rgyus rigs su yin la/de la de sa 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par
6a2(mdo sde): bkur/res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/de lta na ni rgyal rigs btsun por bkur bar gzigs nas/mal bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs
6a3(mdo sde): so//zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nyingad mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo//'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad
6a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
6a5(mdo sde): rigs la gzigs par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa
6a6(mdo sde): ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' yul ji lta ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len+da snyam na/'bras dang bu ram shing drang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/
6a7(mdo sde): slongs mo ngabargya 'du ba/mtha' 'khor gyi skye bo med pa/dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa gang du skye bo gcig bdul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po
6b1(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i yul glang yin pa gzigs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/dbus kyi yul 'di ni b+ha ram shing gi phrengs pa dang 'bras bu dang ba lang dang mthu
6b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/gang du skye bo gcig brtul bas skye ba'i tshogs chen po byedul bar
6b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin gyis//mal bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpo' yul mtha' 'khob po rnams su nyid mtshams sbyor ba rlangs so zhes glu zhi 'dis khri zer bar mi 'gyur
6b4(mdo sde): bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo//'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shi
6b5(mdo sde): brasags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu mod pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do//byang chub
6b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis nu dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nu bzhugs pa ni 'dri snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa'
6b7(mdo sde): rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu dza m+bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/skye dgu'i tsha lo yang skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nyid mchi mes sbyor ba mo yin no//mi rnams kyi
7a1(mdo sde): tshal mar 'grib pa na brgyu thub pa mAn+ta chud nyid mtshams sbyor ba mi len no//byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshol brgyud khyi thub pa yan chad nying /
7a2(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa ni yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang /bag med cing /
7a3(mdo sde): bden pa mngo bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//mir 'grib pa lo brgya man chad tu'ang sgyogs ma lnga po 'di lta ste tshe'i snyigs ma dang /nyon mongs pa'i snyigs
7a4(mdo sde): ma dang /sems can gyi snyigs mi dang /lta ba'i skyigs ma dang /dus kyi snyigs ma shwas che ba yin pas bdage la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shes che
7a5(mdo sde): ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro//'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
7a6(mdo sde): byas shing bsngags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa'i rnaMs dus la gzigs pa yin/
7a7(mdo sde): byang chub sade'i ni rgyu gang gis rgyud la gniHpA mdzad ce na/byang chub seMde dag ldan gyi gnA na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying
7b1(mdo sde): rnatshams sbyor bu len sbrum na/rigs glang zhig btsun par bkur zhing mams dang /pa myeste zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon mod par gzigs nas/de 'di snyam du dgongs te shA
7b2(mdo sde): rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bcur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur po nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis//mI la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud de ngan pa las
7b3(mdo sde): nying mchims sbyor ba blangs so zhes bzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam//'di ltar byang chub
7b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
7b5(mdo sde): chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu grang gis bud myed la gzig
7b6(mdo sde): par mdzad ce na/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig bri rdum du nyid
7b7(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na 'di snyam du dgongs te/bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang /ldan pa/rigs dang ldan pa/rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/khro ba gau can
8a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa/phra ma can ma yin pa/ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/dad pa dang ldan pa/rang bzhin bzang ba/bsam pa dge bla/rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/rigs
8a2(mdo sde): mtho ba/nye du'i rigs dang ldan pa/shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa
8a3(mdo sde): khengs pa med pa/byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/sngon gyi
8a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la e ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang /rang gro
8a5(mdo sde): don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/sgyu 'phrul chen mi 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi
8a6(mdo sde): bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang /rigs dang ldan pa dang /tshul dang ldan zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyis mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong
8a7(mdo sde): bzhin te/khro bog can ma yin pa dang /rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang /rang gi don yang mi nyams pa
8b1(mdo sde): yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag spangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'ang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpany+dza
8b2(mdo sde): mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mchims sbyor ba blangs so zhes kho zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo//'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
8b3(mdo sde): bsags pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' bud med rnams lnga gzigs par mdzad do//de
8b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams la gsungs pa/grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/pa dzam+b+ha'i gling du babs
8b5(mdo sde): nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis khyed cag lus gang dag bdud rtsi don du nye bar phal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug po 'di lta ste/mnyan yod dang sA kau ta
8b6(mdo sde): dung yangs pa can drang tsam pa dang rgyal po'i khab dang bai ra NI spyir nying mtshams sbyor ba long zhig/de skad ces bka' sprul pa dang /dga' rje ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub
8b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsal to//byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzad cig/de ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/spyi dgu kyi me rungs pa'i bsam pa can//dza n+da'i gling
9a1(mdo sde): na rtog ge ba drug dang /rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gosna dkrug pa ljags so//de la rtog glo ba drug gang non/'di lta ste/'ad srung
9a2(mdo sde): rdzogs byed dang /kun tu rgyu gnog lhas kyi bu dang /smra 'don gyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /mi 'jam skra'i la ba can dang /kA t+yA'i bu nog can dang /gtsor bru pa gnyen
9a3(mdo sde): gyi bu'o//rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bram ze sgyus rgal drang /bram ze rnas rdeg dang /bram ze bzang ldan dang /bram ze chings pa'i tshe dang /bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang
9a4(mdo sde): dang /bram ze dmar po'o//snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang /skye rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang /kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang /bram
9a5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang /drang srong nyon mongs med pa dang /lteng rgyas 'od srung ngal bya can no//'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad
9a6(mdo sde): bcu gnyis pa bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de chos de bdag cag gis thos
9a7(mdo sde): nas ci nas kyang bdag cag yun ring po'i don dang /sman pa dang /bde bar 'gyur pa de lta der ltar bsgrub par bgyid par sems lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /
9b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so//grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs shig/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rob mo'i cha spyad/
9b2(mdo sde): thams cad brdungs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa sa kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/grogs po dag 'di la lhag par sgra gang che/bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so//grogs po dag
9b3(mdo sde): ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha smad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas bde bzhin du ngas kyang dzam+bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang /rjes su sgrogs pa drag dang /snyoms par
9b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o//mi rtog pa'i dung bud par bya'o//bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o//
9b5(mdo sde): zhes gsungs nas tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/seng ge gi cag gis gcan zan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/brgya byin
9b6(mdo sde): gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms//nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel//grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don tu gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer
9b7(mdo sde): chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'dral chen mo'i lhums
10a1(mdo sde): nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis ma la de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
10a2(mdo sde): byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid/bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nA bzhugs la rigs
10a3(mdo sde): dang /yul dang /dus dang /rgyud dang /bud med la gzigs pa ste/gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan te dge'u ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas
10a4(mdo sde): yum gyi lhums su zhugs so//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nAs shi 'phros te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos
10a5(mdo sde): par gyur 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di
10a6(mdo sde): ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che bdag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to//der sems can gang dag skyes pa
10a7(mdo sde): de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba mi mthong ba las/de rnams snang ba des gcig gis gcig mthong nis shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so//shes ldan dag
10b1(mdo sde): sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so//ji ltar sprin ni rgyu chen legs 'dus pa//chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar//de bzhin blo ldan de ni lhums 'jug pa//
10b2(mdo sde): ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas ji bzhin no//gang tshe rtsal ldan mnyan med nyer gshegs la/de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na//mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs kun shin tu ni//gsal
10b3(mdo sde): snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos nyid do//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen
10b4(mdo sde): rmi lam bzhi mthong ste glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang /steng gi nam mkha' la skyil mo dkang gis 'chags pa dang /seng ge'i gdan
10b5(mdo sde): la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po lnga chos ston pa dang /lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o//rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang /
10b6(mdo sde): mtshan mkha' rnams la rmi lam 'di ji ltar ston pa yin dris pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/gang btsun mos rmi lam du mthong ba glang po che'i phru gu dkar
10b7(mdo sde): po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras bltam par 'gyur ro//snying gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba
11a1(mdo sde): dang mthu che bar 'gyur ro//seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste chos ston to zhes bya ba ni de'ang seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro//lha dang lham
11a2(mdo sde): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed do zhes bya ba nas gal te de rab tu byung bar gyur na lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par
11a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ras nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi
11a4(mdo sde): 'am mi yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar myi 'gyur bar/lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gyi dang /lug na mdung dang /lag na mdung thung dang /lag na mda' bo che'o//
11a5(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste//lha mchog bzhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa//khyed rnams spong la lha mi rnams kyi ni//shin tu mchog tu gyur yum de ji ltar su'ang //gnod mi byed
11a6(mdo sde): par gus pas yongs su srungs//de rnams shin tu 'bad byas dga' ba dang //brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas su//rnam kun mnga' mdung rawaM gri lag na thogs//byang
11a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i yum na skyong bar byed//g.yul du rgyal gyur lce bzhis sbas pa dang //de ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'ching zhing //lha mo rang khyim nang nas rnam rol pa//
11b1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pu lta bur spyod//de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa smras te/kye ma'o lga btson+da thams cad thar bar bgyi'o//rgyal po zlas/
11b2(mdo sde): gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i cho ga mnyan nas btson thams cad thar bar byos//de nas dus gzhan zhig ni btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/kye ma'o lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi
11b3(mdo sde): dbus su dman pa dang /long ba dang /bkren pa dang /sdug phongs pa dang /slongs mo bu rnams la sbyin pa byin lnga bsod nams dog byas pa dang /lho dang /nu bo dang /byang dang /sum
11b4(mdo sde): mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang /long ba dang /bkren pa dang /sdug phongs dang /slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin/bsod nams ni bgyi'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun
11b5(mdo sde): mo'i tshigs mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang /long ba dang /bkren pa dang /sdug phongs pa dang /skyongs mo pa rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang /ji ltar
11b6(mdo sde): bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin po ni byin/bsod nams ni byis pa dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /sum mdo'i dbus su dmun pa dang /long ba dang /bkren pa dang /sdug
11b7(mdo sde): phongs pa dang /slongs mo pa rnams gang mngon par 'dod pa dang /ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin bsod nams ni byas so//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shA
12a1(mdo sde): thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzus bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang shA ma'i dri ma dang /khrag gi
12a2(mdo sde): dri ma dang /mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma spags so//dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyi mi gos pa dang /kA shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de
12a3(mdo sde): bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang //sha ma'i dri ma dang /khrag gi dri ma dang /
12a4(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba gang yang rung bya sna tshogs kyis ma spags so//ji ltar nor bu tshon shel 'od gsal dang /ras gtsang ka shi'i ras kyang gos pa med//de bzhin thub chen lhums na
12a5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa na//mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum
12a6(mdo sde): gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo //dper na nor bu bai DUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po/rigs dang ldan pa/dad pa gsal ba/dri ma med pa/tshon skud
12a7(mdo sde): sna lnga sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o//'di ni nor bu'o//skud pa 'di la nor
12b1(mdo sde): bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/de'i yum gyi lhums
12b2(mdo sde): na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhums kyi nAng na bzhugs pa mthong ngo //ji ltar dri med nor bu bai DUr+ya//'od gsal lag par bzhag pa snang ba ltar//de bzhin thub chen yum gyi
12b3(mdo sde): lhums bzhugs pa//shes shing sems dpas yum ni yang dag lta//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na
12b4(mdo sde): bzhugs pa de'i tshe/de'i yum 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus dul ba 'am/lus dub par 'gyur ba med do//las kyi rnam smin zad pas mtho ris 'phos//gong tshe 'di
12b5(mdo sde): ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na//de'i yum ngal bas 'dzin par mi byed par//de tshe gyur pa 'dir de chos nyid do//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
12b6(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ji srid 'tsho'i
12b7(mdo sde): bar du srog gcod pa spangs nye srog gcod pa las slar ldog go//ma byin par len pa dang /mi tshangs pa spyod pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /'bru'i ching dang /sbyar ba'i chang myos pa
13a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba blag med pa'i gnas spangs te/'bru'i chang dang /sbyar bya'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do//skyog mi gcod dang //
13a2(mdo sde): ma byin mi len dang //khardzun mi smra dang chang la mi brkam dang //'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di//'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems
13a3(mdo sde): dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum 'di lta ste/skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtong ba med do//nyon mongs
13a4(mdo sde): rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing //de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la//de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi//skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong ba med//de nas
13a5(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas nges rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang /rgyal po zas
13a6(mdo sde): gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshon sum cu rtsa
13a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyi sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/gal
13b1(mdo sde): te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/de rnams kyis smras pa/sras yan lag mu tshang pa zhig btsos par 'gyur ro//rgyal pos smras pa/nga'i ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan//
13b2(mdo sde): lag ma tshang bar bya 'am//de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i bzhin kun tu rgyu mig dmer zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen po las chu myur bar khug
13b3(mdo sde): shig ces bsgo ba dang /des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu drangs te de rnams la btsun mo 'thung ngu bcug pa dang /de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar
13b4(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas dus gzhan zhig nA btsun mo sgyu 'phrul tshon mo tshul 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/kye ma'o bdag lus lum bi ni'i tshal du zhugs la shing gi rtswar yal ka'i mthar 'dug
13b5(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam mo//de nas rkyal pho zas gtsa mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul de lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par reg nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te glang po'i
13b6(mdo sde): tshogs dang /rta'i tshogs dang /shring rta'i tshogs dang /dpung pu chung gi tshogs te dpung gi tshogs yon lag bzhi pa go bkron+da nAs skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/
13b7(mdo sde): btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nas lum bi nI'i tshel du phyin to//de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos lum bi nI'i tshal mthong ba na sems rtse gcig par gyur pa dang /
14a1(mdo sde): de khyogs las babs te/shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te de der song nas me tog dang //'dab ma'i
14a2(mdo sde): g.yur gyis dud pa'i yan log la 'jus te/bud med rgan pas brkor nas gnas so//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo sras bltam
14a3(mdo sde): par nye bar gnas kyis ma la bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang po bltas pa na blang bar bya'o//de nas yang bsams pa/btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa yin
14a4(mdo sde): pas bdag gi mdun du bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bud med rgan mo zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/des gang gis bud med rgan
14a5(mdo sde): mode rnams phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag po zhig sprul nas dri rnams bros pa dang /bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byed du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo
14a6(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'dug go/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang /mkhyen
14a7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung ba yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te gang bdag skyes bu tha mal pa bzhin du mngal gyi skyo nas 'byung ba ni tshul dang mthun pa ma
14b1(mdo sde): yin gyis mA la bdag gis yum gyi dku gu ya swa pA brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi dkug yA sa pa brtol te byung ba dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
14b2(mdo sde): lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang /byang chub se de'i 'di ste du dgongs te brgya byin 'di bdagis byang chub si 'i 'di blang so we dwe Da pa skye bu 'gyur ba mkhyen de nyid kyi rdo'i snying po can gyi bskur byin kyis brlabs te lhums su
14b3(mdo sde): ni yum 'dzin pas nyon mongs par ma gyur cig sgyum du dgongs nas yang dag par mdzad de bzhugs pa yin no//de nas lce'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dzin sdo ma nus pa dang 'dar bar gyur to//
14b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ko'u shr-i ka thong thong /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa la bzhig go/bzhag pa tsam gyi
14b5(mdo sde): med la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun bor zhing tshig du yang gsung ba/kau shi ka phyogs 'di gang yin//byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs
14b6(mdo sde): lags so//byang chub sems dpya sa bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka sems can thams cad kyi stan du 'gro bar bya'o//phyogs 'di gang yin/lho phyogs lags so//'gro ba thams
14b7(mdo sde): cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o//phyogs 'di gang yin/byang phyogs lags so//srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal por bya'o//phyogs 'di gang yin/nub phyogs lags so//
15a1(mdo sde): de'i skyo ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro//skye rnamathar byed de ni bltams pa na/salwa gom pa bdun ni bzhud nas su//'di ngu'i skyob tha mar gyur yin nos//'gro/
15a2(mdo sde): rten gsum gyi bla ma gcig pus gsungs//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byung ba'i de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/'jig
15a3(mdo sde): rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di
15a4(mdo sde): lhur mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to//der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi log pa brkyang ba'ang
15a5(mdo sde): mi mthong ba las de rnams spang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mithong nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so//shes ldan dag sems can
15a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so//gang tshe rnam 'dren bltam par gyur pa na/de tshes ni rir bcas shin tu g.yoso//gang gis 'jig rten par yang skad cig
15a7(mdo sde): gis//snang byed 'od gsal de yang byung bar gyur//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sa g.yos pa chen po dang snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la bskor
15b1(mdo sde): ba byas te zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so//'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba'i bu skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//chos nyid kyis
15b2(mdo sde): gong gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums na bltam pa nA ral gri shugs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang /sha ma'i dri ma dang /khrag gi dri ma dang /mi gco
15b3(mdo sde): ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis me gos so//ji ltar 'od gsal tshon shel bzang po dang //ka shI rab gcing phan tshun gos mi 'gyur//de bzhin thub de lhums nas byung ba na//
15b4(mdo sde): gser sbyangs me chen nang nas bton pa 'dra//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpal shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug mi nyal te 'greng bzhin du
15b5(mdo sde): rgyul rigasu mA des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do//de ni mo 'dug nyul ba'ang ma yin te//yan lag lnga ldan tshul khrims kyis brgyan pas/de ni 'greng bzhin shin tu dge ba yi//
15b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu de 'dir brgya byin dag gis blangs//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe dri'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams
15b7(mdo sde): gdugs dkar po nor po'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to//dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs//lha yi ga tso bos dbu yi steng nas 'dzin//gdub 'khor 'od zer gyi
16a1(mdo sde): 'bar ba lag pa dang //rnga yab bzung gis 'di la g.yob par byed//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i modal bar snang las
16a2(mdo sde): chu bsil ba gcig dang /chu dron mo gcig ste/chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing nges byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do//dri med rab dag bsil dang de bzhin dro'i//
16a3(mdo sde): chu yis rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad de//rigs rgyud gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs//klu rnams de la 'ang mchod pa byed par gyur/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
16a4(mdo sde): bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'babs par gyur te de la de'i yum khrus chu'i bya ba byed do//rkang gnyis gtso bo gzhon nu bltam pa na//lha de
16a5(mdo sde): rnams ni shin tu yid dga' bas//der ni chu bzang phyung bar gyur pa la//de yum drer ni chu yis bya ba byed//lha yi rol mo shin tu sgra snyan rnams//shin tu dga' ba mchog tu
16a6(mdo sde): rdung bar byed//de rnams gos dang /phreng ba 'thor byed cing //gzhan dag rab tu 'dud cing de bzhin bstod//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la lhas par
16a7(mdo sde): snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /a ge ru'i phye ma dang /rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro//
16b1(mdo sde): lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro//lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to//gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do//mkhas pas btung ba'i sangs rgyas bltam pa na//dri zhim dri mchog
16b2(mdo sde): char ni phab pa dang //de dag des na rang spobs tshul mthun pa'i//rab dka'i sems kyis bstong pa rjod par byed//'dis ni byang chub mchog b+h+yob 'gyur zhing //sdug bsngal zad pa'i
16b3(mdo sde): 'gro phan mdzad gyur la//'gro ba mi shes rab rim mig ldongs la//sman pa mchog 'di mig ni rab stsol 'gyur//'di ni rmongs pas mig khebs long ba yi//'gro ba'i
16b4(mdo sde): sgron ma chen po nyid du 'gyur//lha ngan gyis brlag log pa'i lam zhugs la//mi 'tshol drang ba'i lam ni ston par 'gyur//ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing //
16b5(mdo sde): lha yi gnas kyis ni 'byed 'gyur zhes//'og min par na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni//lha yi gnas su yang yang sgrogs par byed//grang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
16b6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin bu btsas pa ni tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems te/bodag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba
16b7(mdo sde): gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i mang gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po bu btsas pa na
17a1(mdo sde): pad+ma chen po 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs
17a2(mdo sde): can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so//ko'u sham bi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa bu btsas pa na dmag brgya pa 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu btsas pa na
17a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so//grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu btsas
17a4(mdo sde): pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/do ni de lta ma yin no//'on kyang
17a5(mdo sde): de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang /grags
17a6(mdo sde): 'dzin ma la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang /'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya bcas pa dang /bsngags ldan la sogs pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so//lha rnams
17a7(mdo sde): kyis gter lnga'i/yang nye bar bstan to//khams kyi rgyal phran rnams dang /mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu btud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya phul lo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
17b1(mdo sde): mya 'dri snyam du sems te/bdag gi bu bcas pa na 'dod pa thams cad grub pas gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' la thog mar mtshan btags so//
17b2(mdo sde): chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i mod la yab yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang /ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/shes ldan dag cig gzhonu
17b3(mdo sde): gang dag dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te gal te khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/chos kyi rgyal po chos dang
17b4(mdo sde): ldan pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bduni ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /
17b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o//bu dpa' ba/rdul phodadra pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol
17b6(mdo sde): gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sgo ba med cing 'tsho ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med pa/chos dang mthun pas
17b7(mdo sde): legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/de bzhin
18a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa ga
18a2(mdo sde): dang ldan nas lha mang lags te/gzhon skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gAny+dzis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni mi yin te zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs
18a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du gdags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/snga ma bzhin du 'di ni 'dir chos nyid yin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/rgyal pos gzhon nu
18a4(mdo sde): bltams nas skyes bu yi//mtshan shes bram ze la dris ngo che smras//rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na//nges par 'di ni mi dbang dag tu 'gyur//brtul bar ldan zhing rgyal
18a5(mdo sde): chen bdun//mi mchog bsod nams las kyis 'thob par 'gyur//gang gi mi nu yis sa ni ma lus pa//'di ni lung mo gcog par spyod par 'gyur//gser los legs byas lce
18a6(mdo sde): ba shin tu zlum//rtsibs stong ldan zhing mu khyud ma nyams bzang //dang po sa la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang //'khor lo de 'dis dang por thob par 'gyur//yan lag thams cad
18b1(mdo sde): legs skyes sa la ni//rab gnas gangs can rtse 'dra'i glang po'i mchog/rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba yi//rin chen mchog ni gnyis pa 'dis 'thob 'gyur//tho rangs dus su phyags kun
18b2(mdo sde): mo lus po'i//sa rnams bskor nas slar ni ldog gyur gang //rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu ni yid 'ong ba'i//rin chen rta ni 'di yis thob par 'gyur//rin chen dri med bai DUr+ya rang bzhin//kun tu
18b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad tsam du snang byed pa//dri med mtshan mo ci 'dra nyin de bzhin//rin chen mchog ni bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig reg dri gzugs dang mdangs ldan pa'i//bud med dam pa dregs
18b4(mdo sde): ldan rnams kyi mchog/lha mo bzhin du yon tan kun ldan pa//bud med rin chen de 'dir 'thob par 'gyur//gang yang 'di ni rgyal la mu tig dang //gser sogs shin tu mang po 'bul
18b5(mdo sde): ba yi//nor ldan mtshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni//rin chen thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur//'gror dang kun tu gnas dang rnam ldog dang //ma lus dpung la mkhas par byed pa
18b6(mdo sde): yi//dpal ldan bdun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni//mi yi rin chen blon po zhes bya yin//dpal zhing brtul phod yan lag mchog gzugs ldan//bu stong dag ni 'di la 'byang 'gyur
18b7(mdo sde): zhing //gang gi gzi rjing shin tu stobs che zhing //sa bdag gzhan dag 'dud par byed pa 'byung //gal te khyim ni nyes mang gis dkrugs pa//rab 'bar shing ni bya yi mi slong ltang
19a1(mdo sde): zhi phyir nags su des song na//de 'dir ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas 'gyur//khyod kyis sras 'di deng ni 'di 'dra ba//gzhon nu 'gro ba'i rin chen gcig bltam pa//'gro ba gnyis
19a2(mdo sde): las gzhan du mi 'gro ba//de ltar sngags kyi tshig lam mthong ba lags//shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin
19a3(mdo sde): du 'jig rten gyi sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin//lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so//
19a4(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'babo ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis
19a5(mdo sde): la 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa tha ma sA cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/lha 'di gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lagaso///
19a6(mdo sde): lha gzhon nu'i sor mo mi ring ba dang /zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang /de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon nu sha chags pa lagaso te/phyag dang zhobs 'jam zhing gzhon shA
19a7(mdo sde): chags pa ni dper na/shing bal gyi 'da' 'am/ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no//lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhonu'i
19b1(mdo sde): phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba lags te/de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no//lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
19b2(mdo sde): logs so//lha gzhon nu'i zhabasra long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang /byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang /sku mdung pa dang /sku bzhengs bzhi na du ma btud par phyog pus mo'i lhang gnyis
19b3(mdo sde): slebs shing reg pa ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lnga lags so//lha grazhon nu ni 'doms kyi sba bA sbubs su nub pa lags te/de'i 'doms kyi
19b4(mdo sde): sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni dper na glang po che cing shos kyi 'am/rta tsong shes byung ma thag gi bzhin no//lha 'di gzhin nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//
19b5(mdo sde): lha gzhon nu'i sku tse srid par 'dom yang de srid la//'dom ci srid par sku yang de sred pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng grub po lags te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
19b6(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhon nu'i ro stod kyi spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku lA sU re re nas skye ba'ang mthing ga la g.yasaphyogs su 'khyil bar skya lags te/
19b7(mdo sde): lho 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser 'dra ba dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang /pags po srab cing mdog gsar
20a1(mdo sde): gyi 'dra ba lags te/pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gros pa ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lag so///
20a2(mdo sde): lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mthe ba ste sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang /zhabs gnyis dang /dpung mgo gnyis dang ldog pa lags to//rtsa 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes
20a3(mdo sde): bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang /sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang /dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa
20a4(mdo sde): pa dang /tshemos bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /tshems mnyam pa dang /tshems thags bzang ba dang /mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang /'gum pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /ro bro ba'i mchogs
20a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lags te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po skyes bu chen po mtshan lag so lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang /srab pa'i
20a6(mdo sde): kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyung bas sku mtshams nas bzung ste/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes
20a7(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /ka la ping+ga'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu
20b1(mdo sde): chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags s+ho//lha gzhon nu'i spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang /gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yasu
20b2(mdo sde): 'khyil ba logs te/lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so//lha 'di dag ni gang dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhon du ni ma lags pa
20b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par gragros par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so//bdag nyid legs bsgom
20b4(mdo sde): sku la ni//sku yi tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa'i//thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni//de ni bdag gis brjod par bgyi//'di zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste//sa la mnyam par 'bab pa
20b5(mdo sde): ye ni//'di zhabs phyag gi mthil la ni//'khor lo shin tu dbyibs legs skyes//'di zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang //de ni sor mo ring zhing mdzes//phyag zhabs dra bar 'brel
20b6(mdo sde): pa dang //shing ba liM lta bur 'jam pa dang //'di'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon//byin pa e na ya dang mtshungs//mi mchog sku yang mra btud par//phyag gis pus mo'i
20b7(mdo sde): lhang slebs//'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nug/n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gag//ro stod spu ni re ri nas//skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyil//mdog ni gser sbyangs 'dra ba dang //kun
21a1(mdo sde): nas 'dom gang 'od dang ldan//bcom ldan de ni pags srab cing //'di sku bdun ni mtho bA ste//bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang //sku stod seng ge 'dra ba
21a2(mdo sde): dang //sku drag kho lag che ba dang //dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang //bcu phrag bzhi'i tshoms rnams ni//yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med//mnyam dang thags
21a3(mdo sde): bzang nyid du ni//de yi tshems ni legs par gnas//rab dkar 'bum pa seng ge 'dra//ro bro mchog dang ldan pa dang //ljags ni shin tu srab pa dang //bcom ldan tshangs
21a4(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs dang ldan//rdzi ma pa 'dra spyan mthon mthing //smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu ni//dung lhar dkarare zhing g.yas su 'khyil//mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di//
21a5(mdo sde): gang zhig la ni 'byung 'gyur ba//de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi//gsum par 'gyur ba ma lags so//'di ni gal te khyim gnas ni//'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid 'gyur te//dran
21a6(mdo sde): ldan bu ni mang ba dang //gnod pa chung zhing mkhas par 'gyur//gal te rab byung rdzogs sangs rgyas//gang zag mnyam pa med par 'gyur//bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang /
21a7(mdo sde): gzims cha rnams kyang snyed 'gyur la//'di yi 'khor ni mi phyed cing //lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong //lha rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang //mi rnams kyang ni de bzhin te//chos kyi
21b1(mdo sde): bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing //mi yul dag tu'ang de bzhin 'gyur//mnyam pa med cing 'dra ba med//rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur//lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
21b2(mdo sde): mtshan lcags te//gang dang ldan nA 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma lags zhes bya ba ni snga mI bzhin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub po bltam nas zhag
21b3(mdo sde): bdun lon pa dang /de skrun pa'i yu mi nongs par gyur te/nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsi gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skyes so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub
21b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyed kyis gzhon nu 'di dus dus su sku mnye byos shig/dus dus su khrus byos shig/dus dus su zas byin cig/dus dus su yang
21b5(mdo sde): dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig/ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs po dus dus su sku ma nye byed/dus dus su zas byin/dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen
21b6(mdo sde): bkur byed do//yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la phul ba dang /rgyal po zos gtsang gis
21b7(mdo sde): de blangs te dga' bas pang du gzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/lta na sdug
22a1(mdo sde): sdug pa/mi'i kha dog las yang dag par 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/skyes pa dang /bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thong ste/
22a2(mdo sde): dper na dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser la mgar ba mkhas pas/rgyan brdungs pa/la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub
22a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/mdzes po lta ni sdug pa/mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
22a4(mdo sde): thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par spro bar byed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i
22a5(mdo sde): tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lhag pa nos lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
22a6(mdo sde): bltam pa'i ma nus spyan ma 'dzums par gzugs rnams la lta ste/de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'
22a7(mdo sde): bltam pa'i modo nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i skyon des de nyin dang mtshan du dpag tshad gcig 'khor khor yug tu gzigs so//los bcas las byung
22b1(mdo sde): dri med spyan gyis ni//gzugs chen po dang de bzhin phra rab rnams//nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dpag tshad gcig/mdun na gnas pa bzhin du 'dra gzigs par 'gyur//chos nyid kyi byang chub
22b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung sman cing 'jebs pa dang /gsung snyan pa dang //gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /skad snyan
22b3(mdo sde): pa dang /yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i med nas gsung sman cing 'jebs pa dang /gsung snyan pa dang /gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no//ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong
22b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs med ces bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa zhig gnas te de la tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba
22b5(mdo sde): yod pa dang /de de'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na byang chub sems dpa' bltam ste//'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen po gsal bar gyur pa'i snang ba de mthong ba dang nyon
22b6(mdo sde): mongs med la smras pa/mkhan po 'dir na nyi ma thams cad dag/cig car byung bar gyur tam ci//'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa//'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur//nyon mongs med kyis
22b7(mdo sde): de la smras pa//nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du no//bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni//yan lag reg na 'od bsal bas//nges par thub pa de yi 'ong //byang chub sems dpa' 'od can ni//nges par
23a1(mdo sde): snrums nas bltam gyur la//bstam nas sems dpa' chen po de'i//'od zer gser dang 'dra ba mo//dri ma med pa 'di dag gis//'jig rten gsum ni snang byas yin/
23a2(mdo sde): mis byin gyis smras pa//mkhan po bzhud/ci re zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram//'on te bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba rang nyid kyis blta bar mdzod cig
23a3(mdo sde): drang srong nyon mongs med kyis smras pa//da ltar ni rgyal po zas ga tsang mi'i khyim nyi lcog gi rgyal po dang 'khor gyi rgyal po dang /tshong ba dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dpon rnams dang /bram
23a4(mdo sde): ze dang /khyim bdag brgya stong dpag tu med pas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gi sa gang gi tshe dro dben par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o//de nas rgyal po zas
23a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma 'di snyam du kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam du sems so//de nas drang srong nyon mongs ma steng gi na mkha' lo mngon par
23a6(mdo sde): 'byugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang sgor phyin pa dang /ji tsam na sgo srungs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/drang srong nyon mongs med 'di mchis so
23a7(mdo sde): zhes rig par byas pa dang /rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /mchog tu rangs po byung nas mchog tu gus pas mchod de
23b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//drang srong chen po legs par 'ongs so//dgos pa ci zhig la longs/nyon mongs med kyis smras pa//rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'dir/khyed sras blta ba
23b2(mdo sde): phyir mchis te//'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa//thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu gnyid log gis sad kyi bar du re zhig spong cig/nyon
23b3(mdo sde): mongs med kyis smras pa/rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni//mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar//dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi gnyid//mig la yun ring mi gnas so//de nas gzhon nu
23b4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ma ma'i bang na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs med la byin pa dang /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/lha gzhon nu
23b5(mdo sde): 'di mtshan mkhan rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan/rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro//de nas
23b6(mdo sde): drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/rtsod pa'i dus nu 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung //
23b7(mdo sde): bsod nams mchog gis chos kyi mdzod 'di ni//nyes las rnam par rgyal/nas sangs rgyas 'gyur//mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po//gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po
24a1(mdo sde): da ga 'gyur//myu nga mtshan ni shin tu gsas pasam//mimatshogs sa rgyas chos kyilas smra//de nas dung ska ldan mangs med kyis bad tu du rgyan
24a2(mdo sde): mtha'i nges pa dang /byang chub sems pa'i mngon par bya chub pa brtag pa la zhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' ma dgu bzlas nas//kha nas byung nas li drug tu da/
24a3(mdo sde): bskyod par 'gyur te de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur po mthong ngo //bdag ni bai rlaska pas der 'tsho de'i dus byed pade mthong nas de mig mi chi mag+na ste 'dug pa rgyal po nas gtsang gis
24a4(mdo sde): mthong nis dngangs nas tshigs su btsid de/smras pa//skyes pa bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na//ngoms por mi 'gyur dga' bathob 'gyur ba//lus bzong dge byed de ni
24a5(mdo sde): mamyong nas//drang srong chen po ci slad du bzhin gyur//gang las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa'am//tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang //de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros//
24a6(mdo sde): khyod kyi mchi mas de dag ni 'dar bar gyur//drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyi tshigs su bcud de smras pa/gal te 'di yi steng du nam mdze' lam//rdo rje ser drag 'bangs pa zam
24a7(mdo sde): gyor kyang //thub pa chen po'i skul ba spuni//nyag me gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so//me tshon rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang //mtshon mo rnon pa shin tu me babad dang //drag
24b1(mdo sde): pa'i drug dang sbrul gyi drug non yang //gzhon nu la ba bskrad cig 'jigs mi 'gyur//thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa//'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol//de na
24b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na//mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung //'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi//gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la//tshangs bcas
24b3(mdo sde): lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa/mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung //mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni//gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob par du mod//chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang
24b4(mdo sde): phreng nas ni//don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur//gang dag smra ba dam pa mtshungs med pa//'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang //rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag
24b5(mdo sde): skyed cing bsod nams ldan la rims nung bral//de nas drang srong nyon mongs med byang chub sems dpa' la rig pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so//nyams pa dang nyon mongs med kyis
24b6(mdo sde): smos pa/rkang kho nas gling khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o//de nas rgyal po zas gtsangs mas thos pa dang grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /gla seg ma dang /gyo mo rnams bsal nas spos
24b7(mdo sde): dang /phye mas khyab par byed du bcug go//de nas drong srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer nas byung ste/rim gyi ri bo kun 'dzin du phyin pa dang mi sbyin la smras pa//ngas
25a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu mthong ste/bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur na ngas ni de sleb par mi 'gyur te dra ni bar skabs su dus byed par 'gyur gyis khyod ni de'i thad du rab tu byung
25a2(mdo sde): la/nga rgyal dang dregs pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang /tshangs par spyod pa la sbyar bar bya ste/rigs kyis dregs par mi bya/rus kyis dregs par mi bya//rigs rgyud kyis
25a3(mdo sde): dregs par mi bya ste/khyod kyis kyang yun ring po mi thogs par bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur gyis zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa//de bzhin gshegs pa tshol
25a4(mdo sde): 'dod na//shar phyogs su ni khyod 'dug dang //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa//rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur//de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang mas
25a5(mdo sde): gzhon nu ma ma'i bang na 'dug pa la yang dang yang du lta zhing nga'i bu ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni sa'i steng na su la'ang med do snyam du sems shing shin tu dga' bar gyur to//de nas byang chub
25a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring por ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas/gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsel pa na de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par
25a7(mdo sde): mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang /dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang /rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des
25b1(mdo sde): kyang ma nus so//de nas rgyal po blon po rnams dang sor snyun gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgon de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus so//de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang /byang chub
25b2(mdo sde): sems dpas bsams pa/'di rnams kyis bdag gis stobs nyams na mi rung gis ma la bdag gis 'dzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhon pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des 'dzub mo bkug
25b3(mdo sde): pas gser gyis gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang /glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so//rgyal po zas gtsang
25b4(mdo sde): gis bsams pa/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyis de bas gzhon nu'i
25b5(mdo sde): ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so//grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so//shAkya rnams kyis
25b6(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u 'am/bu mo gtsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos
25b7(mdo sde): blon po rnamos la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chu ga shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i glang po che la bskyon te dpung gi
26a1(mdo sde): te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor te grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa dang /grong khyer ste skye'i brini sgra bcu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing byang //
26a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to//de nos rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa/grong khyer 'di lta ste/glang po che'i sgra dang /rta'i sgra dang //
26a3(mdo sde): shing rta'i sgra dang /dpung bu chung gi sgra dang /dung gi sgra dang /rnga bo che'i sgra dang /bai de'i sgra dang /rA dung gi sgra dang /gar gyi sgra dang /glu'i sgra dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /sbyin pa byin/bsod nam
26a4(mdo sde): ni gyis/bsnyen gnas la ni nye bar gnas/tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnos shig ces bya ba'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang bral zhing gzhon nu de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du
26a5(mdo sde): zhi bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar btags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin
26a6(mdo sde): shAkya 'phel gyi gan du khyer ba dang /gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang
26a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so//de mthong ba dang /rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/lhas kyang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha
26b1(mdo sde): yin pas gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so//de nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dgongs pa'i ched la 'dug
26b2(mdo sde): nus don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge
26b3(mdo sde): slob par btang nas yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge dbris na phog pa dang /byang chub sems dpa se smras pa//'di ni ngas shes so//de nas des yi ga
26b4(mdo sde): gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/'di dag thams cad kyang ngas shes kyis gzhan dag smros shig/srin bu go chas
26b5(mdo sde): smras pa/'jig rten nA ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/yi ge
26b6(mdo sde): 'di ming ci yin smros shig/des smras pa mo 'tshal to//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/'jig rten du gnyis shig byung nas mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' dang
26b7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'o//na mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin no//yi ge 'di ni 'jig rten du gnyis shig
27a1(mdo sde): rgyunam nu pa / byung chubs s+yA ShA ma ma //byang nabs sa ngas pa sa u smran
27a2(mdo sde): namakha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa dang 'khod lnga brgya dang banas/
27a3(mdo sde): par bzang len dang /lhar bcas zhes bya ba 'phong gi slob dpon gyi gan du 'phong gi gnas su gtad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnas lnga po rgyad nas phog pa dang /sgra gras
27a4(mdo sde): bar phog phyed dang/gnang du phog pa dang /mi 'tshor bar bog pa dang /tshabs che ba la byung bar gyur te//de nas bzong lon dang /lhar bcus 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems
27a5(mdo sde): dpa' 'di ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad bslab kyi lha sbyin 'di ni gdug pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad du gnod par 'gyur na mi rung gis 'di la ga nang
27a6(mdo sde): du bsnun par bslab par mi bya'o snyam mo//de nas dus gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis dang palcags mangs bsnun pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi ni
27a7(mdo sde): bzhugs pa de'i bang bar de lhung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mnga' phyung ste sman gyis byugs pas soso so//lha sbyin gyis smras pa/byang chub sems dpa'
27b1(mdo sde): dang pa 'di ni ngas yongs su bzung ba yin gyis bskur cig/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ngas ches sngar yongs su bzung ste gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i byang chub tu
27b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe yongs su bzung ngo //der byang chub sems dpa' lho sbyin gnod sems dang /bzod pa ma yin pa dang /phebs bu ma yin pa byung bar gyur to//de nas lha
27b3(mdo sde): sbyin la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya byung ba dang //lha sbyin gyis ras kyis bcings nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to//ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs der
27b4(mdo sde): bzhud pa dang /lha sbyin gyis smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' col sdod/byang chub sems dpas kyang ras bcings te sh+lokya'i gzhon nu lha brgya bsgyel to//de nas lha sbyin ras kyis
27b5(mdo sde): bcings pa byang chub sems dpas kyang bzung ste rkang pa gyen du bstan nas gon rgyal du bsgyel ba dang /der yang byang chub sems dpa' le lha sbyin gnod sems dang /mi bzod
27b6(mdo sde): pa dang /bog mi phebs pa'i sems gnyis pa bskyed par gyur to//de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya mnga' gzhu thogs te phyi rol tu byung nas ta lo la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dang /
27b7(mdo sde): la las ni ta la gcig phigs so//la las ni gnyis so//lha sbyin gyis na gsum mo//byang chub sems depas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la bdun phigs pa las
28a1(mdo sde): ji srid rlung gis bskyod de thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro//de nas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram na shing dge ba'i snying po zhes
28a2(mdo sde): bya ba nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bo mtshan mo ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la nyin par ni mtshon gyis kyang gcad par mi nus pa zhig yod pa dang /gnas gtsang ma pa'i lha rnams
28a3(mdo sde): kyis gang gis shing dge ba'i snying po rtsa ba steng du bton nas ro hi ta ka'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag cig sprul to//de rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /legs par rab sad kyis
28a4(mdo sde): thos nas shing 'dir grong khyer brlag par ma gyur tam snyam nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang /shing dag ba'i snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /'khor brgya
28a5(mdo sde): stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang ci tsam du bskyod par yid ma nus so//'cha ra kas smras pa/lha byang chub sems dpa' sbron cig/rgyal pos smras pa/kho bos
28a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu la bka' stsol bar mi nus so//'char kas smras pa/khyed rnams kyis ca co'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig/ci nas kyang ngas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs
28a7(mdo sde): par bya'o//de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis sgra gsing mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so//'tsher ka byang chub sems dpa'i thod du song ba dang /byang chub sems
28b1(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/'char ka ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig yin/'char kas rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to//de nas byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/gal te de ltar na 'byin du 'dod/de nas 'char//
28b2(mdo sde): ka dang /byang chub sems dpa' ches pa dang /ci tsam na khur nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung ngo //'char kas byang chub sems dpa' zin par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos rked pa bcad
28b3(mdo sde): ba dang /sbrul gyi dug gi dbugs kyis 'char ka la pog ste de nag por gyur nas de'i ming yang 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur te//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing dge ba'i snying po gang na
28b4(mdo sde): bder bzhud de phyin pa dang /lha sbyin la gsungs pa/khyod kyi stobs ci tsam pa dAlta yis bskyod cig/lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bskul to//dga' bos ni cung zad drangs so//
28b5(mdo sde): ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi nyamasad par mdzad cing shing dge ba'i snying po phyag gis blangs te 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram nas 'phangs te byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/
28b6(mdo sde): shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang /shu ba dang /phol migra byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis dum bur khyod la khyer te rang
28b7(mdo sde): rang gi khyim du zhog shig/yang yangs pa can du glang po che rin po che zhig skyes pa dang /de nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa bi rnams glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis
29a1(mdo sde): bsams pa/rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes
29a2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po che rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam mo//de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khri de dong ba las rim gyis
29a3(mdo sde): ser skya'i gzhir rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang /ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis
29a4(mdo sde): brgyan par mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/glang po che'i dam pa 'di su'i yan//de rnams kyis smras pa/gzhon nu shAkya
29a5(mdo sde): thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phu'o//lha sbyin lhag par mo bzod
29a6(mdo sde): pa skyes nas smras pa/re zhig de 'khor los skyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do//ji tsam na phyogs der
29a7(mdo sde): dgo' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha sbyin gyis so//des bsams pa gdon mi za bar
29b1(mdo sde): 'di la lha sbyin gyi mthu sad kyis ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste goms pa bdun du bor ro//ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i
29b2(mdo sde): byiphyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so//sus bsad/lha sbyin gyis so//mgon rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa
29b3(mdo sde): bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so//phyogs gang du bsad pa bir ro//'dir sus drud dga' boso//des dgongs pa 'dir gdon mi zla bar dri gnyis kyi 'di la mthu sad kyis ma langs
29b4(mdo sde): kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste re bi'i khar 'phangs pa las rab rim pa bdun dang /'obs rim pa bdun las 'das te bor ro//
29b5(mdo sde): de lhung bas gshong btong ba glang po che'i bshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to//'dir smras par lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad//dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du drung /byang chub
29b6(mdo sde): sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la//rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs//mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rab tu ma byung na 'khor los
29b7(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ma la bdag gis 'di la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phal po che byin na de ltar na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu
30a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du gos dang /rgyan gyi phung po gzhag nas smras pa/nged khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnam
30a2(mdo sde): la rgyan dang gos rnams byin cig/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong khyer du ded gzhon nu gos dang rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog cig ces
30a3(mdo sde): dril sgrog tu bcug go/de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang /thams cad la byang chub sems dpas gos dang rgyan rnams byin no//de nas shAkya'i dbyig pa can la grags
30a4(mdo sde): 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dag/nges de la smras pa/khyed la yang gzhon nu gos dang rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis song //de nas grags 'dzin ma ci bdag la byang chub
30a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yas gzhan su zhig khyor 'gyur snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang /ci tsam na gos dang rgyan thams cad byin zin nas ci'ang ma lus pa dang /des
30a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mgul na shin tu mdzes shing rin che ba'i mu tig phreng gcig lus pa mthong nas de de la dga' bas bag 'bum pa med pa rang nyid kyis bkrol te rang gi mgul du
30a7(mdo sde): btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad nas song ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bu mo'i daphebs shing brtan pa las na 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bsnun par
30b1(mdo sde): nus kyis 'di blang bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor te khrid dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so//rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa'al
30b2(mdo sde): smras pa/yod las kyi mtha' ci tsam pa la ltos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsgo ba gsan te shing rta bzang po la zhugs nas phyi rol tu gshegs te yab
30b3(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i las kyi mtha' gzigs shing byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du byon pa dang /bshol lnga brgya dang zhing rmed cing zhing pa'i mi de
30b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs nye bar nyams pa mgo lus rdul gyis yoka pa dang /rlung dang than pos lus la gdungs pas lus rngub cing mdog dran pa/
30b5(mdo sde): rkang pa dang /lag pa gus pa dang /dengs shing dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/rkang pa dri ma can/ltogs pa dang skom pas mdog ngan zhing /lkog ma dang /mkhur ba dang /mig gis logs
30b6(mdo sde): skams pa dang /glang de rnams kyang rmon pa lcags gzer rnon po can gyis lus bral bas rgyab dang /mjug de'i phyogs khrag gis gsog pa/ltogs pa dang skam pas dbugs
30b7(mdo sde): brtsegs shing snying khe'i phyogs nas dbugs brtsegs pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis monan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang /'bru'i tshogs kyis za ba/zong lcags
31a1(mdo sde): kyis rkang pa lArma byung zhing kha dang sna nus kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag pa la sbrang ma dang sha s+tha dA sbrang du mchu rings kyis yog pa rnams gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang thog
31a2(mdo sde): ma med pa'i dus nas bsod ni bskyed cing bas khI thu rjes kun bskyod thun kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so//shes ldan dag khyed su'i yin/de rnams kyis gsol/pa/byang chub
31a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lags so//des gsungs pa/shes ldan dag khyed deng phan cad dran du mi bya/mngag gzhug par mi bya/rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/bde ba la
31a4(mdo sde): reg par gnas shig/rmon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/khyed cag kyang deng phan cad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing deng bdog la 'thung shig/
31a5(mdo sde): khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing slas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas snum
31a6(mdo sde): zhing sngo lo 'dub ma mthug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i shing gi grib ma gang na bA der gshegs te byon nas shring dzam+bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/'dod pa las dben pa sdig
31a7(mdo sde): pa mi dge bI chos nAM las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bo zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhug so//
31b1(mdo sde): smyod+mo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do//rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsnamasna pa/byang chub sems dpa'u ring zhag thogs te/
31b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar dro'i dus las yol gyis bltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing dzam+bu'i drung du phyin to//de'i tshe nyi ma'i
31b3(mdo sde): gu yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib me shar phyogs su gzhol/shar phyogs su 'bab/shar phyogs su bab par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang
31b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'isku mi gtong ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhon rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/shar phyogs su 'bag shar phyogs
31b5(mdo sde): bab par gyur na/shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhon ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/'di
31b6(mdo sde): ltar dra nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/shar phyogs su 'bab shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/shring
31b7(mdo sde): dza mU'i grib mi ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'i snyam mo//de nas dga' bo'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs
32a1(mdo sde): bcad pa de smras pa//ji ltar bltam tshes ni g.yos pa ltar/dzam+bu'i grib ma khyod sku mi gtong ba//blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste//kun gzigs khyud
32a2(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las bzhings nus shing rter zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na gter skyong ba skra dang kha spu dang sen mo ring ba gter thog
32a3(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to//lha gter 'dri rnams bzhes shig/byang chub sems dpa sa gsungs pa//
32a4(mdo sde): 'di gang gi lha skyes bu gang zhig dus las 'das pa de rnams kyi ljags so//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/'di rnams kyis chog gis re zhig de rnams kyi blun po yongasu
32a5(mdo sde): gzung ba byas no ci zhig byas khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig/tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/de dag kyang shi gtam du
32a6(mdo sde): gyur pa yin/bdag kyang shi nas ring por mi thogs par//gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong //de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba//gzhan nu gal te me bzhes na bdag
32a7(mdo sde): cig rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go/byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhug so//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris gyi
32b1(mdo sde): lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po'ang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so///
