61'b5(mdo sde): ba dang 'bar du mi btub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyis spong bar gnas kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyis
61'b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la chags pa dang /'dod pa la dga' ba dang /'dod pa la zhen pa dang /'dod pa
61'b7(mdo sde): la 'chums pa dang /'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sems yongasu gtugs te gnas pa yin no//de rnams bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzla
62a1(mdo sde): pa nub pa chu ba yi du mo 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong mod kyi 'on kyang de rnams shes par nus pa ma yin/mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus /
62a2(mdo sde): ma yin te/de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub senga' la sngon ma gsan po'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yino//'di lta ste/shing skam khong stong chu med pa zhig chu dang thag ring por skaM la bzhag pa dang /de nas mi me don du se
62a3(mdo sde): ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas de la gtsub stan byas te/gtsub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na yang 'di ltar shing de skaM zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang 'bar du bdub pa de bzhin du dge slong bram ze kha ste
62a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnal lus dang sems kyis thag pa srid par gnas pa de nas kyi 'dod pa nas la 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la cha Da pa dang 'dod pa la dga' ba dang 'dod pa la zhen pa dang 'dod pa la 'chums pa dang 'dre
62a5(mdo sde): pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnaMs kyi sems yongasu gtun te de mi gnas pa yino//de rnaMs bdag nyid la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yi du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyes myong
62a6(mdo sde): mod kyi 'on kyang de rnaMs kyis shes par nus mthong bar nus/bla na med pa yang dag par sbyo par byang chub par nus te/de la 'di ni de'i chu byang chub songa' la sngon ma gosan pa'i dpe snang ba gsuM pa yin//de nas
62a7(mdo sde): byang chub sede'i 'di ste du dgong ste/gang su dag sdug bsngal spong bar brtson par gnas pa dade thad ni 'di tsam du zad de las lhag pa'ang med de'i gong ni laM 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yo na/mthong bar nus pa ma yin/
62b1(mdo sde): blan med pa yang dag par rdzo bar byung chuzla par nus pa ma yin//de nas byang chub sa dang 'di skad sa te shes par nus pa dang ma na nus pa dang /blan med pa yang dag par rdzo par byung myu ba NA rba/
62b2(mdo sde): degang yin sbyin de 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag yab shAkya zas gcing gi khyim na gnas po'i tshe zhing las kyi mtha'i drung du so nA shi dzam+b+hir grib ma la 'dug ste 'dod pa la dben ga sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
62b3(mdo sde): las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa la skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba bas gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub ste gnas pi do mngon par dran te/de ni yi yin de ni bsgrub po yin shes par nus pa
62b4(mdo sde): yin mthong ba zhus pa yin blan mod pa yang dag par rdzo bar byang chub par nus pa yin na de bdag gis brnye yang 'di ltar ba cing nyom chung bzhan pa s+tha bA ma yon te ma la bdag gis tsong der dgu rngub pa dang ci bde
62b5(mdo sde): dbuDa dbyung ba dang tsaM bder 'bras can dang zan dron gyi kha zas ra Da ba bza' zhing lus mar sar dang til mra dang tsAg+h+r-i b+h+yaDa la chu 'dzi bos lus bkru bA bya'o s+t+waM ste da ci bder dbucu rngub pa dang ci bder dbun 'byung ba dang ci bder 'gyu
62b6(mdo sde): can dang ben dron gyi zhal zas na pa gsol zhing spyi ti la mar gyi rgyu zhes chu 'dza bsku 'khru bar mdzo do//de nas ri gri pa de rnaMs 'di sa dusas te/ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma~M 'di ni sdom pa stod pa bya ba mang ba mang
62b7(mdo sde): spyo snrums par gyur ba yin te/'di ltar 'bras chan da na dron gyi kha zlas meng duN+Dal lus zhun mar dang ti mar n+ti b+h+ya ni chu 'jo bos dus khrus byed 'dis nga ni cung zid kyi tha~M ba~M b+h+re mo nus smye du blas mas rgyu
62b8(mdo sde): byang chub song 'bor te dang ba wa ris kyis bA ra Na sIr phyi nas drang srong smra ba rid Na gyi na Nan gan so//de nas byang chub se de'i rim kyis lnga kyi stabs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus yang dag lnga bskyed na ri gyi sde can gyi gling khyer dug na
63a1(mdo sde): de ni grong khyer sde can zhes bya ba ni nai rany+dza nA'i chu bo'i 'gram na bzhugs pa dang /bram ze lbu zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi grogs bshes su gyur pa de sde
63a2(mdo sde): can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa dang /des byang chub sems dpa' bka' ba spyod pa mdzad pa mthong nas/grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma gnyis la smras pa//khyed gnyis
63a3(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras mtshan mkhan gyis gal te rab tu byung por ma gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de thos sam/de gnyis kyis smras pa//
63a4(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams kyis kyang gal te de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag cag de'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smon lam btab lags so//bram ze lhas smras pa/bdag nyid
63a5(mdo sde): chen po de ni dka' thub kyis lus gdungs pas spong ba las bzhengs na khyed gnyis kyis de la thog ma kho nar bsod snyoms phul cig dang /de khyed cag gnyis kyi yun ring po'i phan
63a6(mdo sde): pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro//de nas bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas thos pa dang /ba stong bzhos so//bzhos nas kyang ba lnga brgya la blud do//ba lnga brgya bzhos
63a7(mdo sde): nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud do//nyis brgya lnga bcu bzhos nas kyang brgyal blud do//brgya bzhos nas lnga bcu la blung ngo //lnga bcu bzhos nas nyi shu le rlung ngo //nyi shu ba zhes te
63b1(mdo sde): me sbar nas shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nas 'o thug bskol bar brtsams pa na/bram ze rnams kyis bsams pa/'dir nges par bag ma lan tam bag ma gtong bar 'gyur /
63b2(mdo sde): snyam nas bram ze mang po 'dus par gyur pa dang /'o thug stong du bsgres pa bskol ba na bum pa bzang po dang /dpal be'u dang /g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag byung ba snang ba dang /kun
63b3(mdo sde): tu rgyu nye 'gro zhes bya bas mthong nas bsams pa/'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des ni bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis bslang ngo snyam mo//de nas
63b4(mdo sde): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' de ni dka' thub kyis sku lus nyams chung zhing sku la sgribs pa dang /skyems pas nyen pa yin la byang chub sems dpa' 'o thug
63b5(mdo sde): gsol na bla na med pa'i ye shes thugasu chud pa 'gyur na/bram ze 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis brkam pa dag 'dir 'dus par gyur pas gal te byang chub sems dpa' la gnod pa byed par
63b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ri spos kyi dad ldan nas lha'i smin blangs te de shin tu gzugs bzang ba'i bram ze zhig tu mngon par sprul nas 'o thug de skol ba'i steng du 'dug ste/lha'i dbang po brgya
63b7(mdo sde): byin gyis der sman mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba blugs so//de nas dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa bskol nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
64a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so//khyod nyid rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras de yin nam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/de ni nga'i mkhan po yin te nga de'i slob ma yin no//de nas
64a2(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'o thug spring rtsi ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa blangs so//blangs nas kyang dga' mo dang /dga' stobasnga ma gnyis la smras pa/sbyin pa 'dis khyed
64a3(mdo sde): gnyis ci zhig dron du gnyer gang gi don du yon bsngo bar bya/de gnyis kyis smras pa/gsol ba phul ba'i bsod nams ci mchis pas//grags dang ljon pa don rnams kun
64a4(mdo sde): grub pa/mi yi mchog gyur blo mchog ldan pa de'i/don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chus klung nai rany+dza nA ra zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/
64a5(mdo sde): rgol bar bzhed pa dang /sku nyam chung ba nyid kyis rgal bar mi spyod pa na lha rnams kyis ar+dz+nyA nA'i yul ga btung ba dang de la 'jis nas byang chub sems dpe'i rgol bar mdzad
64a6(mdo sde): de chos gos banabs nas chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na bzhugaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar bzhugs par rig nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi
64a7(mdo sde): ltar mngar ba stong du bsgres pa yol gor blugs te/byang chub sems dpa' la bstabs so//byang chub sems dpa'as kyang gsol nas yon bsngo bar mdzad do//de nas
64b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram+b+ha na phan tshun du bzhugs pa'i sa btsal ba dang /ci tsam na ri brag chen po me tog dang /'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig gzigs/
64b2(mdo sde): nas de de la 'dzegs te phyogs su dbon zhing gsal ba'i phyogs su skyil mo klung bcas te bzhugs so//bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid du rnyil to//de nas byang chub sems
64b3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'dir rgyu ci zhig yod na ri rnyil bar gyur/ci de 'ong ba la lha rnams mngon par mi dga' 'am 'on te bgegs 'ga' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mo//
64b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas gsol pa/byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad kyis gzung bar rngo mi thog pa ni gnyis te/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags
64b5(mdo sde): pa dang /dge bo'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang lags pa ste/khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pa lags te/'on kyang mdun
64b6(mdo sde): du bzhud cig dang de na rdo rje'i gdan mchis te/der ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob
64b7(mdo sde): par gyur cing thob par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhas lam bstan pa bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhag sar pad+ma dag byung bar gyur te/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las
65a1(mdo sde): byang chub pa nas pad+ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur to//gom pa bor nas mnan pA na sa chen po 'di khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsams so//byA tsa sha
65a2(mdo sde): dang /ri dwags dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byed do//rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dril bu dal bus rlung gtong bar byed do//tshar pa
65a3(mdo sde): 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang char pa cung zad 'bebs par byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma bzang po
65a4(mdo sde): byung bar gyur pa sna deng nyid bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam mo//chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram ni klu'i rgyal po dus can zhes bya ba long ba zhig gnas te/
65a5(mdo sde): der de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i gnas zhig byung bar gyur te/sangs rgyas byung ba ni mig thob par gyur la/yongs su mya ngan lngas 'das pa na slar
65a6(mdo sde): long par 'gyur ro//de sa'i sgra grags pos gnas nas byung ba dang rgyang ring po kho nas byang chub sems dpa' sku skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan la/
65a7(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus smras pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan po/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang /rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa mthong ngo //
65b1(mdo sde): mang ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyungs kyis bskyod pa brnams pa/dga' ba'i dbyings kyis kun gang du'o//sa yi spyan nus nas byung/
65b2(mdo sde): zlaSh+Ti gnas nas blong nas su phyogs kun+da tu yang lta bar bye//rlung glos 'gro ba'i gci bre ste//klu yi rgyal po man chen gyis//nA bag+h+nAnA'i dgas su ni/'jig rgyu 'dren pag shegs pa
65b3(mdo sde): nga //sas rgyas 'byung po'i many+dzu yos ni//klu yis mug ni thob gyur te//sems cani dga' zhing yod mgunas//des ni 'di skad ces gsol te//bdag gis sngon ni mthong ba
65b4(mdo sde): yin//sangs rgyas mthu chen de rnams dang //sgrib pa khyod ni mthong gyur na//de dang tha dad dbyer ma mchis//thub pa ji ltar thug mar ni/g.yas pa'i zhabs ni 'jigs pa lags//
65b5(mdo sde): khyod ni sangs rgyas deng gyur nas//'jig rten gyi ni yin gonas 'gyur//ji ltar chos gos mnobs pa dang //nairany+dza nA'i chu bsil la//ji lta bur ni 'jug pa las//de ring khyod
65b6(mdo sde): songs rgyas 'gyur/bdag ji ltar rab brtan 'gros su gshegs pa dang //ba ladu khyu mchog 'gying ba ltar gshegs pas//skyes bu khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mchog/deng
65b7(mdo sde): 'dir khyod ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//ji ltar mkha' la tsa sha brgya phrag gis//khyed spu rgya cheni rgya chen mdzad de la//rdzing zhing skang bang bgyid par gyur pa las//mi mchi/
66a1(mdo sde): deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//ji ltar dri zhim rlung ni ldang ba dang /ri dwags bya yi tshogs kyang mi skrag la//ljon shing rlung gis g.yos par ma gyur pas//mi mchog/
66a2(mdo sde): deng ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//ji ltar btsun pa khyod kyi zhal gyi 'odi//dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de//rnam par mdzes shing kha dog ldan pas na//mi mchog deng ni sangs
66a3(mdo sde): rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje'i gdan logs su gshegs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
66a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te rtswa gding ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang /de la rtswa'i dgongs pa byungabar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes
66a5(mdo sde): nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing bal gyi 'dab mo ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa khur cig blangs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyi tsha byed du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te byang chub sems dpa'i
66a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar sdong ngo //byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa//bzhin bzangs rtswa'o ni dag ngal phul cig/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la
66a7(mdo sde): gtugs nas gus pa dang bcas pas phul lo//byang chub sems dpa' rtswa 'tshong bkra shis las rtswa bzhes te lha dang mi rnams kyis yid srung bar byed pa'i spyod lam gyi 'gro ba rnams
66b1(mdo sde): dang par mdzad cing lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba lta bu'i rdo rje'i
66b2(mdo sde): gdan la brtan zhing nges pas nyid kyis rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang /sdug bsra ba med par bkram nas thugs bskrad cing tshig tu yang gsung ba/ji srid sdug bsngal kun gyi mtha'i//
66b3(mdo sde): zag zad yang dag ma thob pa//de srid srog ni mthar gyur kyang //skyil krung 'di ni gzhig mi bya//zhes gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la 'jigs te brang gi 'gro'i rgyal
66b4(mdo sde): po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba lta bu'i skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drangs por bsrang dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhugs so//bzhugs pa'i mod kho na la bdud sdig can gyi gnas
66b5(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te ci'i phyir nga'i gnas grayos snyam pa dang /ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la gzhugs pa mthong ngo //
66b6(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya zas gcing gi bu rdo rje'i ga na la 'dug gis ji tsam bdag gi g.yul los me 'das kyi bar du bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas
66b7(mdo sde): phrin yig skyel ba skra gyen du 'greng la sha na'i slad g.yos bgos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rtags par smras pa/
67a1(mdo sde): grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi ni lha sbyin gyis mnan//pho brang ni bcom/shAkya rnams ni kha gtab na/khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug/de nas byang chub sems
67a2(mdo sde): dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsumo skyes pa 'di lta ste/'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog
67a3(mdo sde): pa'o//de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grags 'dzin ma dang /ri dgas skyes dang /sa 'tsho ma la'o//gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ni lha sbyin la'o//rnam par 'tshe ba'i
67a4(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa ni de'i rjes su 'tsho ba'i shAkya rnams la'o//de nas byang chubo sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ci'i phyir bdag la sdig po mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa
67a5(mdo sde): gsum skyes snyam na//ji tsam na bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/dkag pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs pa gzigs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa
67a6(mdo sde): gsum skyos te/'di lta ste nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang //gnod soms med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o//yang bdud
67a7(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//bdud kyis smras pa/khyod
67b1(mdo sde): kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes ga la thob/byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/sdig can khyod kyis re zhig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug phun sum
67b2(mdo sde): tshogs par gyur pa na ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /
67b3(mdo sde): mig dang /sha dang /khrag dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /dbyig dang /gauser la sogs pa yongs su btang nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te
67b4(mdo sde): ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bdud kyis smras pa/re zhig ji ltar bdag gis mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i
67b5(mdo sde): khams kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur pa'i dbang ni khyod yin na/ji ltar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig
67b6(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /log pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /shra dang /khrag dang /bu dang /chung ma dang //dbyig dang /gser la
67b7(mdo sde): sogs pa yongs su btang bar khyod la dbang su yod//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /bkra shis dang /g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang /dra
68a1(mdo sde): bas 'brel ba dang //bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/skrag pa rnams lnga dbugs 'byin par 'dzad pas sa la reg par mdzad nas ngas bskal pa grangs
68a2(mdo sde): med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /sha dang /khrag dang /bu dang /
68a3(mdo sde): chung ma dang /dbyig dang /gser la sogs po yongs su btang ba'i nga'i dbang ni sa 'di yin no//de nas so'i lhas sa brtul nas thal mo sbyar te skad phyung ba/sdig can bcom
68a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin yin no zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te zhu mdzum por gyuraro//bkra'i khums par gyur//spyi
68a5(mdo sde): slegled nas spobs pa med la sems khongs su chud cing 'dug par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig cen 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang glags
68a6(mdo sde): ma rnyed kyis/ma la bdag gis yang bgegs shig bya'o snyam nas dpung mchog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drag po glang po che dang /rta dang /rnga mo dang /rlung dang /ri dgas
68a7(mdo sde): dang /ma he dang /phag dang /khyi dang /'ug pa dang /ne'u le dang /spre'u dang /we be sogs pa 'dra ba/ral gri dang /mnga' bo che dang /mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /'khor
68b1(mdo sde): lo dang /mdung thung dang /gzhu dang /zhags pa dang /dgra sta dang /lcags kyis dbugs pa la sogs te mtshon cha rnams 'phyang ba 'jigs su rung ba rnams dang lhan cig byang chub
68b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i kun nas yongs su bskor nas gnas shing bdud sdig can rang nyid gzhu rna drung du bkang nas 'dug gi/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams pa du mo can/
68b3(mdo sde): mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang chas pa de rnams gzig sde nas dgongs pa re zhig skyes pa phal bzhi ga dang lhan cig 'thab par rtsom na'ang /de'i gnyen po'i phyogs
68b4(mdo sde): sbyor bar byed na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/ma la bdog gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i
68b5(mdo sde): thobs lo dgos par brtsams so//bdud kyang 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nos 'khor lo dang /mdung thung dang /mda' bo che dang /
68b6(mdo sde): mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /mda' la sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbab par po rnams so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shelaM las byas pa'i gzhal yas+ya khang mngon par sprul pa dang
68b7(mdo sde): mtshon chathams cad gzhal yas khang de'i steng du 'bab pa dang /gzhal yas khang gi sgras bdud kyi sde rnams cad skyug nas kun tu 'byer bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sem
69a1(mdo sde): dpa' nam gyi thun dang po la rtag tu bya ba dang /'grus skyong dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang /mthun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor kyi rjes su/
69a2(mdo sde): brtson pas bzhugs so//de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes po mngon du bya ba'i mngon por shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam
69a3(mdo sde): pa du ma nyams su myong bar mdzad de gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur la/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs
69a4(mdo sde): pas nyams su myong bar mdzad do//skus rtsig pa dang /ri dang /rab la'ang thang pa gshegs par mdzad do/dper na na mi mkha' la bya ba bzhin no//sa la'ang sbyang du 'byung
69a5(mdo sde): ba dang /byi'u zul mdzad de/dper na tshul bya ba bzhin no//chu'i rgyun la'ang mI nyams par gshegs te/dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la skyil mo krung
69a6(mdo sde): gis gshegs par mdzad de/dper na mdab tshogs bya bzhin no//nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba lnga'ang phyag gis nom zhing
69a7(mdo sde): nyug par mdzad de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du skus dbang sgyur bar mdzad do//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/bsam gtan gyi tsher mo ni sgra yin pas/
69b1(mdo sde): ma la bdag gis rgyang ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra byung ngo //byang chub sems dpas kyang
69b2(mdo sde): de bsgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshal sprul pas des na sgra de rdugs pas mi grag go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/mal bdag
69b3(mdo sde): gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag nas des na lha dang mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang gang dag thos par 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o snyam du
69b4(mdo sde): dgongs nas lha'i rna ba shes par mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na de'i lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang /mi
69b5(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams kyi dang /gang dag ring ba dang /gang dag nye ba 'ang gsan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug
69b6(mdo sde): las bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems su dag ni ma yin zhes de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te/sems kyi rnam
69b7(mdo sde): grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas de nam gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs
70a1(mdo sde): ba mngon du bzhag pa na de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
70a2(mdo sde): te/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang
70a3(mdo sde): bral ba'i sems so zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /gti mug dang bcas pa dang /gti mug dang bral ba dang /bsdus
70a4(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam par g.yengs pa dang /zhum pa dang /rab du 'dzin pa dang /rgod pa dang /mi nod pa dang /nye bar ma zhi ba dang nye bar zhi bar dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa
70a5(mdo sde): dang /ma bsgoms pa dang /bsgoms pa dang /bsgoms pa dang /sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//shin tu rnam par
70a6(mdo sde): grol ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdud kyi mdag
70a7(mdo sde): gzhug pa 'di rnams las su dag tshe rabs gzhan na mar 'brel pa 'am/bar 'brel pa 'am/su dag gshed ma 'am/phyir rgol ba 'am//dgrar gyur pa de dag ji ltar
70b1(mdo sde): shes par bya snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byas pa'i mngon par shes pas yin no snyam nas de nam gyi
70b2(mdo sde): gung thun lo sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na ngos sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/'di
70b3(mdo sde): lta ste/skye bo cig dang /gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /drug dang /bdun dang /brgyad dang /dgu dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /
70b4(mdo sde): lnga bcu dang /skye ba brgya dang /skye ba stong dang /skye ba brgya stong dang /skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /'jigs pa'i bskal pa
70b5(mdo sde): dang /'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /'jig pa dang /'tshags pa'i bskal pa dang /'jigs pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /'chags pa'i bskal ba du ma dang /'jig pa dang /
70b6(mdo sde): 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/bdag sngon sems can 'di dag gi nang na gnas pa na ming ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya//zas ni/
70b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu zhig za za/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /tshe ni 'di srid cig lon//yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dug/tshe 'di srid cig lon te gnas/de nas
71a1(mdo sde): bdag shi 'byos te che ga mo zhig du skyes so//de nas kyang shrI 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so//de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas pa/
71a2(mdo sde): yul phyogs dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam par dri ma rjes su dgongs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te bdud kyi mngago gzhug 'di rnams las su
71a3(mdo sde): dag ni ngan song du 'gro/su dag ni ngan song du mi 'gro ba de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te 'chi 'apo dang skye ba shes pa
71a4(mdo sde): mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pas yin no snyam ste/de nam gyi thun tha ma la 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa
71a5(mdo sde): mngon du bzhag pa na de'i lha'i spyan rnam par dag la mi rnams kyi las 'das pas gzigs na sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /skyo ba dang /kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog
71a6(mdo sde): ngan pa dang /dman pa dang /gya nom pa dang /bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams lnga ji lta ba bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba/ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/
71a7(mdo sde): shes ldan dag sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gi dang /yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/'phags pa rnams la sgur po 'ang
71b1(mdo sde): palog par smra bste/log par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de rnams dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shrI ba'i 'og tu dran song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sams/
71b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//shes ldan dag sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gi dang /yid kyi legs par spyod dang ldan te/'phags
71b3(mdo sde): ba rnams la sbyar ba mi 'dobs shing yang dag par lte ba ste/yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu deng rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro
71b4(mdo sde): mthi ris kyi 'jig rten du lce dang mi rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung ni bzhugs te rtag tu bya ba dang 'gus skyong dang /
71b5(mdo sde): ldan zhing byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su mthun pas bzhugs te/de nam gyi thun pa me la zag pa zod pa'i shes pa mdzad
71b6(mdo sde): sum du bya ba'i shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du byazhig bA na/des 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'di ni sdug bsngal kun
71b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma byin to//de de ltar shes
72a1(mdo sde): shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur byung /srid pa'i zug pa dang /ma rigs pa'i zag pa las snyoms rnam par grol
72a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba na bdag gis skye ba ni zad do//tshangs par spyod pa la bston te//bya bye byas so//'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes de nyid du blan med pa
72a3(mdo sde): yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thug su chud par gyur cing de ltar bcom ldan 'das nam gyi thun tha ma la bdud 'byung ba bye
72a4(mdo sde): phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas pa las byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par rgyal te bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes so//de nas bdud sdig can gyi lag pa nas gzhu shor ba dang /
72a5(mdo sde): rgyul mtshan rna mi mthur du lta ba dang /gnas g.yos par gyur to//de nas bdud sdig can 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang bcas par sdug bsngal zhing yid
72a6(mdo sde): mi bde la yid la btsags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la dam par gyur pas sems pa'i zhugs te mdangs
72a7(mdo sde): sa la 'dre zhing gnas par gyur to//de nas bdud kyi bu ma sred ma dang /dga' byed ma dang dgu' spyod ma zhes bya ba bdud gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig cen la 'di skad
72b1(mdo sde): smras so//yab khyod ci phyir thugs mi dgyes//ci yi phyir na 'di ltar bzhugs//gang gis khyod la gnod byed pa'i//skyes bu gang la rjes su sems//gsungs shig de ni 'dod chags//
72b2(mdo sde): kyi//zhabs pas nags nas glang po bzhin//bcings nas bdag cag 'tshal te mchi//de ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur//bdud kyis smras pa/skyes bu 'dod chags rab bral te//chags
72b3(mdo sde): pas legs par dgug mi nus//bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir//nga ni shin tu mya ngan byed//de nas sred ma dang /dga' byed ma dang //dga' sbyor ma ste/bdud kyi bu mo gsum
72b4(mdo sde): po sprin las byung ba'i glog bzhin du gzi brjid rab tu 'bar zhing rang gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
72b5(mdo sde): bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldani 'das la bdud sdig can gyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsal to//kye dge sbyong khyod
72b6(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dko bar
72b7(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pa de la dgongs por ma mdzad do//lan gnyis la ni gsum du'ang bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
73a1(mdo sde): kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi rim gro bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang
73a2(mdo sde): ci nas kyang sred pa yang dag por zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do//de nas bdud kyi bu mo
73a3(mdo sde): gsum phyogs gcig tu song ste phan tshun smra zhing kun tu bgros pa/shes ldan spyan gnyis zla dge skyes pa rnams kyi bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin pas/ma la bdag gis
73a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu ma mdog mdangs brgya phrag dang /gos dang /kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas par mngon par sprul zhing bu btsas ma myong ba dang /lan cig btsas pa dang /lan gnyis
73a5(mdo sde): dang /lan gsum dang /lan bzhi sgo lnga mngon par sprul zhing bud med par ma'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul la dge sbyong gau ta ma gang na ba der nye bar 'gro bar
73a6(mdo sde): bya'o//phyin nas kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma lnga 'di skad ces dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur byed cing bde bar gshegs pa khyod la rim gro ba bgyid do//zhes skye bar bya'o//
73a7(mdo sde): de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po gzhon nu'i mdog brgya stong du mor bdag nyid mngon par sprul cing gos kha dog brgya phrag dang bcas pa nas ji srid du bud med bar ma'i tshul brgya
73b1(mdo sde): phrag du bdag nyid mad+mo par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde song ste phyin pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu
73b2(mdo sde): 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing bde bar gshogs pa khyod kyi rim gro pa bgyid do//bcom ldan
73b3(mdo sde): 'das ci nas kyang srid pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do//lan gnyis
73b4(mdo sde): laldan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis de skad gsol kyang /lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs par ma mdzad do//de nas bdud
73b5(mdo sde): kyis bu mo gsum phyogs gcig tu song nas phan tshun 'di skad ces smra ste/spun zla dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i skyes bu dag 'di lta bu'i thabs mang pos nye bar bsten cing
73b6(mdo sde): gnas na de'i sems g.yengs par 'gyur ba 'am/snying 'gas par 'gyur ba 'am//kha nas khrag dron po skyug par 'gyur ba'i gnas de ni yod na dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni 'u bu cag
73b7(mdo sde): la/sems gtong bar mi byed kyis skyes pa rnams kyi bud med la sred pa ni tha dad pa yin gyis//ma la po dag cag bud med rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu mngon par sprul la dag
74a1(mdo sde): skyong gau ta ma'i gan du 'gro na de lta na ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma bdag cag rnams la 'dun pa skyed pa'ang srid par 'gyur gyis zhes smras te bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bud med//
74a2(mdo sde): rgan mo'i tshul brgya phrag tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/sngam bzhin du bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i bar du gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
74a3(mdo sde): ci nas kyang sbed pa yang dag par zad cing rnam par grol la thugs yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba bla na med pa brnyes pas de la dgongs par ma mdzad do//de nas bcom
74a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/'di dag ni rang nyid kyis rgan mo'i dngos por byas pa yin gyis me la ngas kyang 'di rnams nyid kun shrI tu skyob bskyed pa'i phyir rgan pa 'di nyid du byin
74a5(mdo sde): gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyis bu mo rgan mor byin gyis brlabs so//de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rgan pa de mi snang bar bya bar 'dod kyang mi snang bar
74a6(mdo sde): bya bar mi nus so//de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs shing gzugs kyis ngo tsha ba bzhin du rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/sgur po phyam dgu po
74a7(mdo sde): ltar kyang kyir can mdun nas mkhar ba la rten cing lus 'dar bzhin du bdud sdig can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//skyes bu 'dod chags
74b1(mdo sde): rab bral te//chags pas legs par dgug mi nus//bdud kyi yul 'das de yi phyir//da ni shin tu mya ngan byed//ces bdag cag rnams la gsung ba ni yab med de/gang zhig
74b2(mdo sde): gzhan sems rmongs byed pa//bdag cag gis ni ma byas pa'i//rnam pa de ni yod min na//de lta na yang dbang mo gyur//thu mur gzugs ni 'di 'dra ba//byas nas de gan nyer song na//
74b3(mdo sde): ji ltar rgan pa nyid gnas pa//de ltar de yis byin gyis brlabs//de bas yab kyis bdag cag rnams//rgas pa 'di ni mi snang bar mdzod//bdud kyis smras pa//khyed rnams
74b4(mdo sde): gzugs kyis dregs nas ni//sprin gyi tshogs las glog bzhin du//gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba dang //spro ba'i nga rgyal gnas pas song //dpa' cheni de gan phyin pa dang /
74b5(mdo sde): rlung gis shing bal bzhin du brlag/gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i//sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byed pa//ngo bo sen mos rko ba dang //so yis lcags ni 'cha ba dang /
74b6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i gzhon nu sdong bu yis//ri bo gzhig par 'dod pa yin//gang zhig chags kun mthar 'byin pa'i//sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod byer 'dod//rgya mtsho brkos par gyur
74b7(mdo sde): nas ni//zab pa'i gting tshol 'dod pa yin//gang zhig chags kun mtha' 'byin pa'i//sangs rgyas la 'dir gnod par byar 'dod//rlung ni zhags pas 'ching ba dang //zla ba
75a1(mdo sde): ba mkha' las dbab pa dang //rgya mtsho lag pas 'chu ba dang //grangs can la ni rgal ba dang //snang ba zhing sreg bcas 'bar ba yi//me la 'khyud par 'dod pa yin//
75a2(mdo sde): gang zhig dka' ba byed 'dod pa//de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin//ji srid thub pa de nyid la//skyabs su 'gro bar gyis shig dang //de nyid rgas pa'i gzugs 'di ni//don gzhan
75a3(mdo sde): du ni byed par 'gyur//de ni thugs rje cher ldan pas//nges par khyed kyi sel bar 'gyur//'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang //bdud dang bcas pa dang //tshangs pa dang bcas pa
75a4(mdo sde): dang //dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams dang //lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na//khyed rnams kyi rga ba'i dngos po mi snang bar byed pa de ni
75a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dogra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid las gzhan dag gang yid ma mthong ste khyed rnams song la bcom ldan 'dra
75a6(mdo sde): de nyid menyes par gyis shig/de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyiso zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas
75a7(mdo sde): te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byis pa ji lta ba dang /
75b1(mdo sde): rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /mI gsal ba ji lta ba dang /thabs mi mkhas pa ji lta bar ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par //
75b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba mnyes par ma bgyis pa'i nongs legs kyis/bcom ldan 'das nongs pa bzung du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bzod par mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das bdag
75b3(mdo sde): cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das
75b4(mdo sde): kyis de rnams rgas pa'i dngos po mi snang bar mdzad do//de nas bdud kyi bu mo gsum po rang gi gzugs nyid rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas
75b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur pa dang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang la rang gi skyes bu rnams kyis lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/gzhon nus blan
75b6(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes brnyes so//de thos pa dang nyi ma do nyid li grags 'dzin ma la'ang khye'u zhig bcos so//bdud rtsi zas la khye'u zhig btsas so//de nyid kyi nyin mo zla ba'ang sgra gcan
75b7(mdo sde): gyis zin to//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /rangs pa rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes par
76a1(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /gsog ma dang /gyo mo rnams bsngal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btag shin tu dri zhim pa'i bog por nyo bar
76a2(mdo sde): bshams/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang por sbyangs/rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan ni bsgreng /me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang sum mdo rnamasu
76a3(mdo sde): 'ang sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs so//de nas grong khyer gyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /ngan pa dang /mgon med pa dang /bkren pa dang /
76a4(mdo sde): phongs pa dang /spongs mo pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa dag gtong ngo //lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /dbus kyi sum mdo rnams su'ang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed do//
76a5(mdo sde): grags 'dzin ma'i bu'i ming 'dogs par pyod de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa//'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas de bas na khye'u yi ming sgra gcan zon zhes
76a6(mdo sde): gdags so zhes btags so//bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang //bsod nams dge byas nas khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do//
76a7(mdo sde): nye du dag gis smras pa/gang gi tshe 'di btsas pa na grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u yi ming kun dga' bor gdags so zhes btags so//rgyal po zas gtsang
76b1(mdo sde): glus smras/grags 'dzin mA'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni shAkya thub pa'i bu ma yin no zhes smras pa glags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chang bar gyur to//de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i phang chung
76b2(mdo sde): kyi pha bong la zhon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug te bden pa gsol ba btab pa/gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na de bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha bong dang lhan cig
76b3(mdo sde): 'phyo bar gyur cig/ji ste ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur bor ba dang /de shing bal gyi 'dab pa bzhin du pho bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur to//rgyal po zas
76b4(mdo sde): gtsang gis ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du dong ni ji tsam na sgra gcan 'dzin bzang
76b5(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa'i phang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chun 'phyo bo mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /
76b6(mdo sde): rangs pa rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes te de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po bang du blangs nas langs so//gang gA tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
76b7(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon par btul nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to///
77a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/'di ltar 'jig rten dang /'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma
77a2(mdo sde): dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu tsho ba'i snang bas snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas der sems
77a3(mdo sde): can gang dag skyes pa de rnams kyis snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig shes ldan dag sems
77a4(mdo sde): can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig ces ngo shes par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas skyol mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun
77a5(mdo sde): 'da' bar mdzad do//de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i
77a6(mdo sde): 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so zhes zer/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs to skyil mo klung gcig gis
77a7(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/mal bdag cag der song la tshigs su bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do//de nas tshangs ris kyi lha
77b1(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te brkyang ba 'am/brkyang ste bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis kyis tshangs ris kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang
77b2(mdo sde): bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshigs su bcad te gsol pa/ded dpon g.yul las
77b3(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba po//sdig pa mi mdo bzhed shig 'jig rten gzigs//rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis//bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol//
77b4(mdo sde): gcig shos kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de gsol/nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba//sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs//bco lnga lon pa'i
77b5(mdo sde): dgung zla nya ba ltar//khyod kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag legs//zhes gsol nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin
77b6(mdo sde): de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/'jig rten 'dod pa'i bde gang dang //lha yul byung bde gang yin pa//sred pa zad pa'i bde de la//bcu drug char
77b7(mdo sde): yang mi phod do//khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te/phung por ba ni bde ba yin bu ni lci ni blon//gzhan dag blang bar mi bya'o//sred pa thams cad rnam spangs shing //'dus byas thams cad zas nas ni//
78a1(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad yongs shes na//sgrar yang srid par mi 'ong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang 'dre ba sku nyams su bstar
78a2(mdo sde): ba las skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad pa na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul lo//de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam
78a3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig dong ba na las de nyid du zhugs par gyur to//de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang //blon po dang /nye du dang /mdza' bshes su gyur pa'i
78a4(mdo sde): lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
78a5(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' bo dang bde ba sku nyams su bskor nas skyil mo krung gcig gis zhagro bdun 'das par mdzad pa na de la sus kyang bsod snyoms
78a6(mdo sde): ma phul gyis de la tshong pa ga gon dang //bzang po gnyis kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms 'phul du bcug na/de ni tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po de gnyis kyi yun ring po'i
78a7(mdo sde): don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag rang gis 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'phul du gzhug pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o//snyam nas de na lha
78b1(mdo sde): des shing rta dang /tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshong pa tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng
78b2(mdo sde): rgyas na chu klung nai ny+dza nA'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyams su bstar ba na skyil
78b3(mdo sde): mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad de de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis//de la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa
78b4(mdo sde): dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/chos bshad
78b5(mdo sde): pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir 'di ltar lhas kyang 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir brtson par byed do snyam nas nang par sngar langs te spang
78b6(mdo sde): rtsi dang 'da' gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs
78b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du 'dir bdag cag gis sbrang rtsi mda' gu mang du
79a1(mdo sde): 'tshal te mchis kyis bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te bdag phyag
79a2(mdo sde): gri bsod snyoms bzhes na dper na mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog/
79a3(mdo sde): chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsam par bya'o//snyam pa na//bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi gsol pa/btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag
79a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed tu bsod snyoms bzhis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs
79a5(mdo sde): shing ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed tu bzhes par gyur
79a6(mdo sde): nas/de na bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi dgongs pa byung ngo //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzod kyi dgongs pa 'byung bar rig nas ri brag can
79a7(mdo sde): zhig la rdo ba las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing mi ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ba dri mi zhim pa med pa bzhi khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na
79b1(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyug byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das
79b2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi mkho ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas ri brag can zhig la rdo las rdo'i lhung bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis
79b3(mdo sde): pa gsal ba gtsang ba dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te mchis na/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
79b4(mdo sde): du dgongs te/gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed gcig bzhes na gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//gal te gnyis les na ni gnyis kyi
79b5(mdo sde): sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//gal te gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes la lhung
79b6(mdo sde): bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi bzhos te/lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so//
79b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po las srogs chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzhes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /
80a1(mdo sde): bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshong pa dag khyod tshur sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng shig chos la skyabs su dang shig/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung
80a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la yang skyabs su deng shig/btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o//chos la skyabs su mchi'o//me 'ongs
80a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang lags pa de la'ang skyabs su 'chi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po'i sbyin pa'i de la rjes su
80a4(mdo sde): yi rang ba mdzad de//gang gi don du sbyin pa btang de yi don du 'gyur ba ste/bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na//de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin//bsod nams rnam smin bde ba dang //
80a5(mdo sde): bsam pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur//myur du zhi ba dam pa yi//mya ngan 'das pa rtogs par 'gyur//pha rol las byung gnod pa ni//lha dang bdud kyi ris dag gis//
80a6(mdo sde): bsod nams kho na byed pa na//bar chad bya bar mi nus so//gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir/gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na/sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag/rnam par
80a7(mdo sde): mthong zhes reg par 'gyur//de nas tshong pa ga gon dang //bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
80b1(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes nas
80b2(mdo sde): chu klung nai rany+dza nA' ba gang na bo der gshegs te byin nas chu klung nai ran+te nA'i 'gram du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do//de na sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong la 'di gu yang rlung slong
80b3(mdo sde): be des na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs so//de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun kyis thebs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
80b4(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'do' ba'i dus la bab lags so//bde bar gshegs
80b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te//'di lta ste/dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can
80b6(mdo sde): 'di nye bar 'ongs so snyam du dgongs nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sdig can ji srid nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/pha rol
80b7(mdo sde): gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa/rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa/dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams
81a1(mdo sde): /rgyu h+mA ma m+b+ha pa dang /ngan tshungs par spyod pa rgya tshun pa sgru ba stong pyod de//dang sti'i tshulal rgyu tshor yang dag/par logs par zlas pa/na
81a2(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las mi 'a'o//de nas bdud sdig can 'di sbyim du dgongs to//kye ma'o dge sbyong g+hA d+ha ta mA nI yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dra'o snyam du bas mas nas sdug bsnga'i ning
81a3(mdo sde): yid mi bad la 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas lce rnams kyi dbang po porgyu byin gyis bcom ldan 'dos rlung nang kyi spyan gyis thebs par rig nas shing 'dzinan
81a4(mdo sde): byabs dam+bu'i gling du gdagus pa gang sbyin pa de dang ha n+yang yang mi ring ba zhig na a r+yA chen po'i rgyal yod de/don kha dag deng dri dang ro dang ldan pAD+D+h+ya a dzu byung
81a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gdon pa der spyod ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo zas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dun
81a6(mdo sde): nas sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'odas paser ma'i spyan nad kyi sbyin gyis thobs par bdag gros
81a7(mdo sde): 'tshal nis shing dzam+bu zhes bya bos dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba na a ru ra chen po'i tshal mchis te/de nis bdag gis kha dog dang dri dang
81b1(mdo sde): ro dang ldan pa'i a ru r+ya 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyis de bcom ldan 'das gsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /bsor ma dang mthun par 'gyur zhing gaskor ma'i smyan
81b2(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /rlung dang mthun par gyur nas rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to//de na bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod cing lhag par
81b3(mdo sde): 'tshe bar gyur to//de na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na be der gshegs te byon nas shing gi
81b4(mdo sde): drung du brtan te skyil mo krung bcas nas/sgyu drang por bsrang ste/dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs so//de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas su zhig bdun
81b5(mdo sde): du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to//de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par rig nas gnas nas mngon par 'phags te/bcom
81b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong /tsha ba dang sbyad ma dang /shA sbrang dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang /sdig sbrul gyi rag pas sku la gnod par 'gyur du'ong zhes
81b7(mdo sde): lus kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan bdun du dkris te steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun gyi dus ma yin pa'i
82a1(mdo sde): sprin chags pa med par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las lus phral te/dpung rgyan dang /rna rgyan dang /phreng ba dang /rgyun sna tshogs dang /byug pa byugs//
82a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po 'di la bser bar ma gyur
82a3(mdo sde): tAtama?/tsha ba dang /sbrang ma dang /sha sbrang dang /bskor ma dang /gdugs dang /sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la reg par ma gyur tam//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
82a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//bden pa'i dga' ba bde ba yin//chos thos pa la lta ba dang //srog chags rnams la sdom pa yis//'jigs rten 'tshe ba med
82a5(mdo sde): pa bde//'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang //'dod pa rnams la rgal ba bde//nga 'o nga rgyal thul ba gang //de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam
82a6(mdo sde): bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas//byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dor gshegs te byon pa dang //rtswa'i gdings pa bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung
82a7(mdo sde): bcas sku drang por bsrang nas/dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugs te skyil mo dkrungs gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin
82b1(mdo sde): lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun pa dang /lugs dang mi mthun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad de/'di lta ste/'dri yod pas 'di yod//'di skyes pas 'di skye ba 'di wA ste/ma
82b2(mdo sde): rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs//ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched dri dag
82b3(mdo sde): gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye bo'i rkyen gyis
82b4(mdo sde): rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig
82b5(mdo sde): po 'di 'byung bar 'gyuraro//'di lta ste 'di med na 'di med la//'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/ma rig pa 'grags pas 'du byed 'gag/'du byed
82b6(mdo sde): 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gags
82b7(mdo sde): pas reg pa 'gags//reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gog/len pa 'gags pos srid pa 'ag //srid
83a1(mdo sde): pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gug/skye ba 'gugs pa sa rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /skye sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsnga lbu ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnam///
83a2(mdo sde): 'gag par 'gyur te//de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas/
83a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//
83a4(mdo sde): gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pa//de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs
83a5(mdo sde): pa yin//gang tshe sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas shes pa//de nas de'i som nyi thams cad 'bral//gang tshe chos 'di dog ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan
83a6(mdo sde): tshadra pa yin//gang tshe tshor bzod pa thob gyur pa//de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan
83a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa yin//gang tshe rkyen rnams zad pa thob nas ni//de nas de yi sem nyi thams cad 'bral//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam
83b1(mdo sde): gtan tshangs pa yin//gang tshe zag pa zad pa thob gyur nas//de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'bral//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan
83b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa yin//'jig rten kun tu snang bar 'dug pa ni//ji ltar bar snang nyi ma shar ba bzhin//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan
83b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa yin//bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te//sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor las rnam par grol//de nas bcom ldan 'ongs 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis chos zab mo zab
83b4(mdo sde): par snang ba//mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba//rtog go pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa//zhib mo/'dzangs pa'i mkhas pa dang /rig pas rnam
83b5(mdo sde): pir shes par bya ba rtogs te/de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang gzhan gyis de mi shes pas des bdag dub par 'gyur/ngal bar 'gyur/sems la spro ba med pa kho nar
83b6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar zad pas/ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nags stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde sa gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam ste/de na bcom
83b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no//de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o/
84a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ma rung ngo //kye ma'o 'jig rten 'dri ma rung ste/gang gi phyir de ltar brgya lam na/lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag/
84a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad
84a3(mdo sde): cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin pas ma la bdag der song la gsol ba gdab po snyam mo//de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums
84a4(mdo sde): nas/brkyang pa 'am/brkyang nas bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/
84a5(mdo sde): de nas tshangs pa'i mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//ma ga d+hA ra ni sngon chad chos byung ba//dag pa ma lags dri ma bcas pas rtogs//bdud
84a6(mdo sde): rjertsi chos kyi sgo ni phyed mdzod le//dri ma med pas rtogs pa bshad par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//tshangs pa ngas ni tshigs
84a7(mdo sde): chen gyis//skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa//srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis//chos 'di legs par rtogs mi 'gyur//rgyun las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba'i laM///
84b1(mdo sde): zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba//mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa yi//'dod chags zhon pas mthong mi 'gyur//btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rga sdu pa'i sems can rnams la
84b2(mdo sde): dbang po rnom po dang /dbang po 'bring po dang /dbang po rtul po dang /drang sla ba dang /gdul sla ba dang /nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te de dag gis dam
84b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos mthos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur lags so//btsun pa dper na/ut+pa la 'am/pad+ma 'am/pad+ma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing chab nas chen por gyur te/chab
84b4(mdo sde): nas 'phags te kha cig ni chab dang mnyam//kha cig ni chab kyi nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la'ang
84b5(mdo sde): dbang po rnon po dang /dbang po 'bring po dang /dbang po rtul po dang /drang sla ba dang /nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te de dag gis dam pa'i chos mtho na yongasu
84b6(mdo sde): nyams par 'gyur bas chos rin po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis/bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol//de nas bcom
84b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ma lang nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
85a1(mdo sde): la gzigs te/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can
85a2(mdo sde): rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /dbang po 'bring po dang /dbang po rtul po dang /drang slo ba dang /gdul sla ba dang /nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod do//de dag
85a3(mdo sde): dam pA'i chos ma thos na yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
85a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad te bka' stsal pa/bdud rtsi sgo mo dag ni dbye bar bya//nyan pa su 'dod som nyi sol cig dang //tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos//klan ka mi btsal
85a5(mdo sde): mdo tsam bshad par bya//de nas tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi bdag po 'di snyam du sems te//kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro//e ma bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan
85a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom
85a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas su la thog mar chos bshad par bya snyam mo//de nas bcom
85b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/mya la ngas sgyu rnal shes kyi bu rnying 'bur dro la thog mar chos bshad par byA ste/de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjod pa'i dam pas rjod
85b2(mdo sde): cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchod la rtogs pa dmi pa dag la yang yi rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snyam mo//bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/btsun pa skye rtul shes
85b3(mdo sde): kyi bu gum nas dgung bdun lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur shi nas zhag bdun lon no//
85b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur shi ba de ni te por ma stes so//e ma'o sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur shi ba de ni shin tu te bor ma
85b5(mdo sde): stas te chos 'dul ba 'di mthos so//gal te 'dis chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas
85b6(mdo sde): thog mar su zhig lnga chos bshad snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod de la thog mar chos bshad par bya skye de ni nga'i thog myi
85b7(mdo sde): slob dpon kho na bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod la rtogs pa dam pa dag la'ang yi rangs shing dad par gyur to snyam//bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa
86a1(mdo sde): btsun pa rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod mdang sum srod la gum lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la zhugs te ye shes gzigs pa bskyod
86a2(mdo sde): na rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod srong la shrI bar gyurato//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te//e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lcug spyod shi ba de ni te bor ma skyes so/
86a3(mdo sde): e ma'o rangs byed kyi bu lkog spyod shi ba de ni shin tu te bor ma stes te chos 'dul ba 'di ma thos so//gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos ni shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo//
86a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam mo//de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te ma la ngas lnga sti'i dge slong de rnams
86a5(mdo sde): la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor kyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa dang bla ma dang /gus pa dang /sdug pad+ma
86a6(mdo sde): bcas pas gnas pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/lnga sde'i dge slong rnams da ltar gang na 'dug snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i
86a7(mdo sde): spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bA ra Na sIn drang srong sme ba ri dgas kyi gnas na 'khod pa gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang ji tsam
86b1(mdo sde): bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas bA ra Na sI'i ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so//de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam+b+ha de nyid du lAmra du zhugs
86b2(mdo sde): par gyur te/kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nus kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong gau ta ma khyod kyi dang po
86b3(mdo sde): rnams ni dang /bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/pags pa'i mdog ni bsal na/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyi ston pa ni gang /khyod su los brten te rab tu byung /khyod
86b4(mdo sde): su'i chos la dga'//bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/da dang 'dra ba yod min pas//nga la slob dpon 'ga' med de//'jig rten sangs rgyas
86b5(mdo sde): nga gcig pu//yang dag byang chub dam pa thob/thams cad zil mnan 'jig rten kun mkhyen la//'di ni chos kun gyis ni dam gos//thams cad spangs shing sred bral
86b6(mdo sde): rnam grol te//rang gis mngon par shes nas su la rten//de bzhin gshegs pa lha ma'i ston pa po/thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas//nyid kyis
86b7(mdo sde): byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa//mi nyams mtshungs pa med na su la rten//nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste//'jig rten bla me nga yin pas/lha dang bcas pa'i
87a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten na/da ni rgyal ba bdud zil gnon/tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba zhes gsung ngam//gang gis zad pa zang thob pa//rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par bya//
87a2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i chos nI ngas bcom pas/de bas nyor 'gro nga rgyal ba'o//cha dang ldan pa gau ta ma gang du bzhud/b+hA ra Na sIr gshegs nas ni/ngas ni chos kyi rdo brdung zhing //'jig rten
87a3(mdo sde): me bskor gang yin pa//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//'jig rten chags pa las rgal ba'i//kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa/'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par//skyes bu
87a4(mdo sde): dam pa grangs mi srid//tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rgyal ba legs so zhes gsol na//kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lom nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das yul kau shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing
87a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa na bA ra Na sIr byon to//de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bA ra Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na 'khod do//lnga sde'i dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang
87a6(mdo sde): ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas ched du bsams te legs par 'dug nas khrims su bcas pa/shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma mi brtan pa/bya ba meng pa//
87a7(mdo sde): mang pos 'tsho ba/spong ba nyams pa de nga 'bras can dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar ser dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis
87b1(mdo sde): de bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang de la smra bar mi bya//phyag mi bya/lhung bar mi bya/langs te stan bsgrub par mi bya'o//gzhan du na spyan nar ma kho nar bting ba la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang /
87b2(mdo sde): ldan pa gau ta ma stan yod kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so//bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa
87b3(mdo sde): de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dang /dpal dang /bkur sti ma bzod nas stan las langs te khe cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi tshad du gong na shom mo//
87b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni zhabs bkru ba'i chu dang zhabs kyi rten dag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed do//kha cig ni bsu ste na bza' chos gosadag blangs nas 'di skad ces shes ldan gau ta ma
87b5(mdo sde): tshur spyon/shes ldan gau ta ma byon pa legs so//shes ldan gau ta ma gang na bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zeraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma skyes
87b6(mdo sde): bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas rang gis bshig go snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas lnga sde'o dge slong rnams lhag par yang bcom
87b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas rjod/gdung nas rjod/tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas mun tu rjod par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
88a1(mdo sde): khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan+da nas rjod pa dang /gdung nas rjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pas rjod pas kun tu ma rjod cig/khyed la yun ring por/
88a2(mdo sde): gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag gang la la lhag par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
88a3(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas rjod pa dang /gdung nas brjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pas rjod pa'i kun tu rjod pa de ni skyes bu blun po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin
88a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma khyod kyis ro shig sngon gyi tshul dang /spyod pa dang /dka' bar spyad pa des ma'i
88a5(mdo sde): chos bla ma 'phags pa'i khyad par thob par nus sam/shes pa 'am/mthong ba dang reg par gnas pa cung zad kyang ma thob pa na da ltar khyod mo rten zhing bya ba mngal mong pos 'tsho
88a6(mdo sde): zhing sbyong ba nyams pas nga khyod 'bras can dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos khrus byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/dge
88a7(mdo sde): slong khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog pa dang bzang po rnams gsal ba sngon las tha dad du bya ba gzhan lha mthong ngam/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
88b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa ga tu ma de de bzhin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rab tu byung nas ni mtha' 'di gnyis la bsten par mi bya/bsnyen
88b2(mdo sde): par mi bye/bsnyen bskur mi bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'dod pa rnams le 'dod po'i bsod nams kyi rjes su brtson pa/dman pa dan pa/thA chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang /bdag nyid du
88b3(mdo sde): pa la rjes su brtson pa/sdug bsngal ba 'phags pa'i ma yin pa gnod pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o//khyed kyis mtha' 'di gnyis la mi rten par dbu ma'i lam mig byed pa/ye shes
88b4(mdo sde): byed pa/nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba//mngon par shes pa dang /rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba yod de/dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na 'phags pa'i lam
88b5(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang
88b6(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi ste'i dge slong rnams la shes par bya ba 'dis shes par
88b7(mdo sde): mdzad spyod pas bcom ldan 'das lnga sde'i dge slong rnams las gnyis la snga dro gdams dag 'bogs pa na/gsum grang khyer du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/gsum gyis bsgrubs
89a1(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa des drug car 'tsho bar byed do//bcom ldan 'das lnga sde'i rnams kyis dge sbyong gsum la b+hi drog dmas ngag 'bogs pa na/gnyis grong khyer
89a2(mdo sde): du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/gnyis kyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des lnga sde 'tsho bar byed de//de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho narwa gsol ba yin no//de nas bcom
89a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin du yid
89a4(mdo sde): la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong drag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni bsdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o///
89a5(mdo sde): 'di ni sdug bsngalo 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i la mo mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /
89a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos mngon par shes pas yongs su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin
89a7(mdo sde): yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'i 'phags
89b1(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa des dus mngon par shes pas spangs par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag ngas
89b2(mdo sde): sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dengs mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni mig skyes//shes pa dang //
89b3(mdo sde): rig pa dang /blo dang /rtog pa skyes so//dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dengs mngon par shes pas
89b4(mdo sde): bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos
89b5(mdo sde): rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /
89b6(mdo sde): blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dengs mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes
89b7(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa
90a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang //
90a2(mdo sde): blo dang /rtog pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa des ngas mngon par shes pas
90a3(mdo sde): bsgoms so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni mig skyes so//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga ji srid du 'phags pa'i
90a4(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams de ltar lan gsum du bzlos te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig ma skyes/shes pa ma yin//rig pa ma yin/blo ma yin/rtogs
90a5(mdo sde): pa ma skyes pa de srid du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang tshangs pa dang bcas/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mir bcas pa 'di las
90a6(mdo sde): grol po dang nges par 'byung ba dang /mi ldan pa dang /rab tu grol ba dang /phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnos par ma gyur cig/dge slong dag ngas bla na
90a7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar ma shes so//dge slong dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di
90b1(mdo sde): rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
90b2(mdo sde): bdud dang tshangs pa dang bcas/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skyes dgu dang lhor dang mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang nges par byung ba dang ljon pa dang /rab tu grol ba dang phyin ci log dang
90b3(mdo sde): bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur cig/dge slong dgo ngas de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar shes//
90b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' stsal pa na/tshe dang ldan pa kau N+Di n+ya dang /lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
90b5(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau N+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal legs so//kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/kun
90b6(mdo sde): shes sam/bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so//kun 'tshal lags so//tshe dang ldan pa kau N+Di n+yas chos kun shes pas de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes
90b7(mdo sde): bla dgas su btags so//tshe dang ldan pa ko rti n+yas chos kun shes so zhes sarba'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed de/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bA raHsAr
91a1(mdo sde): drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong dang /bramu za 'am/lha 'am/bdud
91a2(mdo sde): dam/tshangs pa'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jog rten la snying rtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams
91a3(mdo sde): kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i rigs mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyangs bsgrags so//sa bla'i gnod sbyin
91a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra thos nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul
91a5(mdo sde): dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /yud tsam de dang /skad cig de dang /thad cig de dang yud tsam de dang skad cig
91a6(mdo sde): dang thang gcig dang /yud tsam de la tshungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi rab tu sgra grags so//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed de/grogs po dag bcom ldan
91a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bA ra Na sIr drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/
91b1(mdo sde): bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang /mthun par 'ga' tsam yang ma bskor ba/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang ni steng ba d+ma lha drung mi rnams
91b2(mdo sde): kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so zhes dbyings bsgrags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bA ra Na sIr
91b3(mdo sde): drang srong slu ba ri dwags kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo tshwa dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor la
91b4(mdo sde): bskor ba zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni
91b5(mdo sde): 'di dag yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
