91b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa'o//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/skye ba sdug bsngal dang /rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang /na ba sdug bsngal ba dang /'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang //
91b7(mdo sde): sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang /mi sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal ba dang /gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba dang /mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
92a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba ste/de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'o/
92a2(mdo sde): bden pa gang zhe na/yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par 'dod pa ste//de spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom
92a3(mdo sde): par bya'o//sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid
92a4(mdo sde): ma lus par spangs pa dang /bor ba dang /bsal ba dang /zad pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gags pa dang /nye bar zhi ba dang nub pa ste de mngon sum du bya ba'i
92a5(mdo sde): phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
92a6(mdo sde): brgyad pa ste/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang
92a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de yang bsgom par bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
92b1(mdo sde): kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par gral//lnga sde'i dge slong lcug ma rnams la ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//de'i tshe 'jig rten na
92b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa gcig dang gnyis pa ni bac+doMs/de na brjes kyis yang dge slong lde sde'i lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no//dge slong dag gal te
92b3(mdo sde): gzugs bdag yin na gzugs la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing /gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par
92b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig/
92b5(mdo sde): 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam pa yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//dge slong dag tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no//dge slong drag gal te
92b6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing //rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig/'di lta bur
92b7(mdo sde): ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang //sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
93a1(mdo sde): zhing rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//dge slong dag ji snyam/
93a2(mdo sde): du sems/gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/btsun pa mi rtag legs so//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/btsun pa sdug bsngal lagaso//
93a3(mdo sde): mi rta ba sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos pa dang ldan pa de la 'di ni bdag go/bdag ni 'di yin no//'di ni bdag gi
93a4(mdo sde): bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/btsun pa ma lags so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
93a5(mdo sde): partag gam mi rtag/btsun pa mi rtag lags so//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/sdug bsngal ma yin/btsun pa sdug bsngal lags so//mi
93a6(mdo sde): rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag gro//bdag ni 'di yin no//'di ni bdag gi
93a7(mdo sde): zhes bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/btsun pa ma lags so//dge slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa de ci yang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/
93b1(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi 'am/phyi'i 'am/rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/ngan pa 'am/gya nom pa'am/gang dag thag rnying ba 'am/gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin//
93b2(mdo sde): bdag ni de ma yin de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o//dge slong dag de lta bas na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
93b3(mdo sde): dang /rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci'ang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi 'am/phyi'i 'am/rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/ngan pa 'am/gya nom
93b4(mdo sde): pa'am/gang dag thag ring ba 'am/gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin/bdag ni de ma yin/de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes
93b5(mdo sde): rab kyis blta bar bya'o//dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di bdag ma yin bdag gi ma yin par lta ste/de de ltar lta ba
93b6(mdo sde): na/'jig rten ci'ang len pa med do//len pa med pa na yongs su gdung ba med do//yongs su gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag gi skye ba zad do//
93b7(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to//bya ba byas so//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma
94a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par gro'o//de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga dang drug pa ni bcom ldan 'das so//de nus bcom ldan 'das b+hAraN
94a2(mdo sde): sde'i 'brab rgyu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na bzhugs so//de'i tshe bA ra NA sIn rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis
94a3(mdo sde): byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pas lus snyoms lus dub/lus rgud pas myur du gnyid log par gyur to//bud med de rnams kyang lus
94a4(mdo sde): snyom/lus drug/lus rgud pas gnyid log par gyur to//rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyis sad pa na bud med de dag thams cad brdol zhing sgron mor
94a5(mdo sde): byung la skra zhig/lag pa brkyad ste byung rgyal du zla ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de dag gi chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo
94a6(mdo sde): bu grags pa mal chen po la babs te/rin po che'i lham brgya stong rib zung tsog gyon nas nyal khang gi sgo gla na ba der song ste/phyin nas grogs po dag ni bcos so//
94a7(mdo sde): grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa
94b1(mdo sde): khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni bcos so//grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan pa phyung ba dang /de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par
94b2(mdo sde): byas so//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer gyi sgo gang na bder stong ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtses so//grogs po bdag ni nyams so zhes skad ngan pa phyung ba dang /
94b3(mdo sde): de'i sgo mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phye nas skad kyang mi grag par byas so//de nas rigs kyis gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can de gang na ba der song ba na/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
94b4(mdo sde): 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la yang dang yang du bzhengs shing 'chag pas 'chag go//rigs
94b5(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dge sbyong bdag ni gtses so//dge sbyong bdag ni
94b6(mdo sde): nyams so zhes skad ngan phyung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon nu tshur shog/gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tshe ba
94b7(mdo sde): med pa yin/'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas 'bab chu
95a1(mdo sde): gnod pa can rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas//bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas
95a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na be der gshegs nas byon pa dang gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//bzhugs nas
95a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang
95a4(mdo sde): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims
95a5(mdo sde): kyi gtam dang /mthos ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /nges par byung ba dang /
95a6(mdo sde): rab tu bden pa'i rjes su bsgrags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do//gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /dge
95a7(mdo sde): ba'i sems da//mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal ba dang ldan pa dang /yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe
95b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lum
95b2(mdo sde): de rgya cher bshad do//dper na gos gtsang ma nug nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du btsug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btubs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags bstan de nyid
95b3(mdo sde): la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam rtogs so//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags
95b4(mdo sde): pa chos mthong ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las rgal ba dang /the tshom las rgal ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/
95b5(mdo sde): pa dang /gzhan gyi mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
95b6(mdo sde): ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so//mngon par 'phags so//bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /
95b7(mdo sde): chos dang /dge 'dun lo skyabs su mchis legs kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon
96a1(mdo sde): byAr dang lags so//bran mo nig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sadan/gzhon nu blugs pa mal chen blon mi snang bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang kyi
96a2(mdo sde): bdag rigs kyi gtso bo gang nu ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to//ji bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi rnal
96a3(mdo sde): chen po na mi gang la lags so//de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/gzhon nur nor gyi phyor chom rkun nam/g.yon can rnams kyi phyirol tu khrid par
96a4(mdo sde): mgyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag brtse nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab rgyu gnod pa can gang na bde legs su
96a5(mdo sde): song ba dang /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung cig phud pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems
96a6(mdo sde): te/gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyi phyi rol tu khrid kyi 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig brud pa
96a7(mdo sde): las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las rgal bar ma gyur grang /'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lhamo brgya stong ra bzung gcig zor
96b1(mdo sde): ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi dogs de nyid las gal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas
96b2(mdo sde): gzigs so//gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags
96b3(mdo sde): pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas khyim
96b4(mdo sde): bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do//de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
96b5(mdo sde): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das cig gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam/khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /stan 'di kho na
96b6(mdo sde): la gzhon nu grags pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do//de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis
96b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur
97a1(mdo sde): ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to sgyum du rig nas dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba rgya chen po dang /yid
97a2(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la bcom
97a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la chos kyi

97a5(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa do slar brtul nas de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/rgyun gyis brgyan bzhin du ni
97a6(mdo sde): chos spyad de//dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la/'byung po kun la chags pa spangs pa ni//de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin//de'i tshe 'jig rten ni dag
97a7(mdo sde): bcom po drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so//khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags bstan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang gzhon nu grag
97b1(mdo sde): ba la 'di skad ce smra so//zhon chung shog khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre spags 'don gyis khyim du 'dong /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i la 'di skad ces
97b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang //'gog/
97b3(mdo sde): pa dang /lam mngon par rtogs pa de ji ga khyim pa khyim na gnas pa 'am sogs 'jog gri longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la longs spyod par 'gyur ram/btsun pa ma lags so//khyim
97b4(mdo sde): bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang /slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par
97b5(mdo sde): rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa
97b6(mdo sde): dang /lam mngon par rtogs so//btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste sdug bsngal dang
97b7(mdo sde): kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so//bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang /thugs brtse ba
98a1(mdo sde): nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi gtso bo gang nu ba der gshegs na lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo //de na
98a2(mdo sde): khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
98a3(mdo sde): nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dron bza' sham thabs mnabs/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong
98a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i mi dang //chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das
98a5(mdo sde): la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do//tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom
98a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi phyir gang na bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshar spyon//bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams
98a7(mdo sde): pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i me dang chung ma gnyid kyis
98b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /
98b2(mdo sde): chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng stong/yang dag par rab tu dge' bar mdzad de/sangs rgyas
98b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa
98b4(mdo sde): rnams la mchog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i
98b5(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do//gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal pa dang ldan
98b6(mdo sde): pa dang /yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/'phe
98b7(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam rgya tshor bshad do//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'ongs pa'i nang du bcug na tshon
99a1(mdo sde): rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
99a2(mdo sde): po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'grog pa dang /lam mngon par rtogs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba
99a3(mdo sde): dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las rgal ba dang //the tshome las rgol ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan
99a4(mdo sde): gyis mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
99a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so//bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te/bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong
99a6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol//deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyebs su mchi bar mngon par dad lag so//
99a7(mdo sde): btsun pa de'i slad dro 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags po'i mi dang /chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
99b1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nus bcom ldan 'das gad na la bde bar bzhugs pa dang /gtsang zhing
99b2(mdo sde): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' bdag rang gi lag nas bstangs shing
99b3(mdo sde): tshim par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i
99b4(mdo sde): phyir 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
99b5(mdo sde): por mdzad/yang dag par gzing bstod par mdzad//yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag
99b6(mdo sde): bar 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//ba ra NA sI nA khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
99b7(mdo sde): gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa gang po dang /dri med dang /ba lang bdag/lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang
100a1(mdo sde): kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgros nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so//thos nas kyang de dka 'di snyam du sems/
100a2(mdo sde): te/kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin po ma yin te/gang gi phyir de ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu
100a3(mdo sde): gzhon pa/shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang /kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ma la
100a4(mdo sde): bdag cag gis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs to gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i
100a5(mdo sde): bu gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa gang po dang /dri med dang /kha lang bdag dang /lago barba te/rig+sa kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams pa ra NA se nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das
100a6(mdo sde): gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag dus te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i
100a7(mdo sde): bu gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa gang po dang /dri ma med dang /ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom
100b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang /bstan par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngas pa gnang na/bdag/
100b2(mdo sde): cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par
100b3(mdo sde): dge slong gi dngos po thob s+ho/de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dge gcig pu dben pa bag yod brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas so//gcig pu dben pa
100b4(mdo sde): bag yod pa/rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gdod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang kha spu gregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
100b5(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/tshangs par sbyor ba'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe 'di nyid la rang ga mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byis te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do//tshong
100b6(mdo sde): par spyod pa bstan to//bya ba byas so//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dag
100b7(mdo sde): bcom pa gyur to//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang /bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ba ra NA si na grong mi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
101a1(mdo sde): dang po dang /gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa ste grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri me dang /ba lang bdag dang /lag pa bzangs
101a2(mdo sde): te rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so//thos nas kyang
101a3(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing /chos bstan pa'ang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
101a4(mdo sde): dang po dang /gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa ste grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri med dang /ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i
101a5(mdo sde): bu rnams ni re shig shin tu gzhon pa/shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig pagos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
101a6(mdo sde): gis ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo//de nas grong khyer gyi
101a7(mdo sde): gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag ba ra tA si nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas
101b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong ma'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ca/
101b2(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
101b3(mdo sde): bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan/
101b4(mdo sde): pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid ga tong par gnas pa/
101b5(mdo sde): na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa
101b6(mdo sde): drug bcu dang /drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so//de nas bcom ldan 'das bA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
101b7(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no//dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba
102a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba
102a2(mdo sde): dang /lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shog ni gcig tu ma 'gro zhig/nga yang lteng brgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der
102a3(mdo sde): rgyu zhing gshegs so//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ba ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su 'dug nas du nyan thos
102a4(mdo sde): rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston to//dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gong yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no//dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching pa
102a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du skyeste//nga yang ldeng rgyas
102a6(mdo sde): gyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/mo la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/dkag po'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas
102a7(mdo sde): bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u yi tshe byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dwe dro ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad
102b1(mdo sde): pas gsol pa/ma grol grol bar 'du shes na//ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems//bdag gis dge sbyong ma bkrol bas//'ching ba chen pos bcing pa yin//de nas bcom
102b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te//'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka'
102b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi//'ching ba gang yin kun las grol//bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par//sdig can de ltar shes par gyis//de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam
102b4(mdo sde): du sems te/dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngalo zhing yid mi bde la yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
102b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no//dge slong dag khyed kyang
102b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma
102b7(mdo sde): bzhin du'o//nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so//btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs
103a1(mdo sde): rgyu zhing dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ra NA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer snga can gang na bder rgyu zhing gshegs
103a2(mdo sde): te/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sdenan du byon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das nges ba la can gyi nags tshang tshing gadren ba de dgashegs te byon nos shing zhig gi
103a3(mdo sde): drung du brten te nyin por gyi gnas pas bzhugs so//de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol tu nyi ma re re bzhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/
103a4(mdo sde): ngaga' bar byed dga' dgu spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshags bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang
103a5(mdo sde): gang na ba der dong ba dang /drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/dad par 'os pa/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba/thugs mchog tu dul ba/zhi ba dang /
103a6(mdo sde): dul ba dang ldan pa/gser gyi mched sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'barare zhing shing zhig gi drung ni brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong
103a7(mdo sde): ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to//bcom ldan 'das jig bud med gcig gzigs sam/gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cer 'ong /btsun pa
103b1(mdo sde): rnying na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sngo can gyi slad rol tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyis/dga' bar bgyid dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/de rnam
103b2(mdo sde): dang bdag cag rtse bor bgyid//dga' bar bgyid/dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshal lags so//gzhon nu dag
103b3(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems//bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang /bdag nyid tshol ba gang 'dam/btsun pa bdag cag la bud mod kyis rtse bgyis/bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshul ba gang lag
103b4(mdo sde): pa de'ang ma lags so//gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do//de nas drug cu sde bzang ba'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
103b5(mdo sde): phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa
103b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshigs kyis spyan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /
103b7(mdo sde): 'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtog so//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang /tshematho pa dang /chos rig pa dang chos kyi gting sgribs pa dang /so mo nye las rgal
104a1(mdo sde): the tshom las rgal ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las//
104a2(mdo sde): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag
104a3(mdo sde): 'phags so//mngon par 'phags so//bdag cig bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi legs kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du
104a4(mdo sde): gzung du gsol//deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan
104a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de na
104a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so//de nas bcom
104a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mer su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/de nas bcom
104b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor lA rjesu
104b2(mdo sde): brtson pas gnas pa na 'dir mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma'i khyim
104b3(mdo sde): gang na ba der gshegs so//grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshoms
104b4(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/bcom ldan 'das byon pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol//zhes
104b5(mdo sde): gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so//de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
104b6(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i
104b7(mdo sde): gtam gyis yang dag par bston ces byas nas//mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhi no//de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas bcom
105a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga'
105a2(mdo sde): mo dang /dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas grang ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing
105a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing
105a4(mdo sde): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyur par rig nas stan
105a5(mdo sde): chos dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma la
105a6(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs
105a7(mdo sde): te gshegs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgangs te/ngas yul ma ga d+hA 'dir dang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam
105b1(mdo sde): bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas nas de dbang du gyur pas tshogs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo//de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo
105b2(mdo sde): brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas po 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mchod par bya bas dag bcom
105b3(mdo sde): par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza nA'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/lteng rgyas 'od srang rel pa can
105b4(mdo sde): btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma gad+hA'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ma l-i ngas lteng
105b5(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srang ral pa can dbang du bya ste 'di dbang du gyur na tshig chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das ldeng rgyas 'od srang ral pa
105b6(mdo sde): po can gyi bsti gnas ga na der gshegs so//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral po can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gad na
105b7(mdo sde): bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/dge sbyong chen po byin pa legs so//dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor 'dir
106a1(mdo sde): byon//dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas lteng
106a2(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang /bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig
106a3(mdo sde): tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang dung zhag gcig cig
106a4(mdo sde): 'dug go//dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis ni/'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod la mtho brtsams par gyur du mchi'o//'od srung khyod kyis re zhig
106a5(mdo sde): gnang bar gyis shog dang mtho brnams par mi 'gyur ro//dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar bzhugs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das
106a6(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba dar gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te//nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams
106a7(mdo sde): nas sku drag por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so//klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
106b1(mdo sde): khros pa'i mthus dud pa byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo //klu gdug pas khrod pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams
106b2(mdo sde): le snyoms par bzhugs so//de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthus dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce
106b3(mdo sde): gcig tu gyur pas sres par byed do//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams can 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas
106b4(mdo sde): sreg pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes par klu gdugs pa thal bar byas par ma gyur grang /kyi hud nyon mongs
106b5(mdo sde): bdag gi tshig ma nyan to skom mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te//nga ldeng rgyas 'od srang ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas phya smad kyis ma langs rdzu 'phral ji lta bu
106b6(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mis klu gdug po'i mo zil gyis mnan la/des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul por byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug
106b7(mdo sde): ste/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na
107a1(mdo sde): mes kyu gdug pa'i ma zil gyis mnan la/des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bya mngon par 'du mdzad de/de dul bar mkhyen nas ltung bzed du
107a2(mdo sde): bcug ste/lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so//lteng rgyas 'od srung rol pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyud ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
107a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig/'od srung gsan no//dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/'od srung
107a4(mdo sde): klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa/rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so//de nas
107a5(mdo sde): ljang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang dag bcom pa yin no snyam mo///
107a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kye nags chang tshong na bzhugs so//de'i tshe lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga
107a7(mdo sde): brgya tsam mai la yongs su sbyong ba re ra'i me thab gsum gsum ste/me thab stong lnga brgya yod do//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su sbyang bar 'dod na me sbar bar
107b1(mdo sde): ma nus so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u da rnams lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ltang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so//mkhan pa ma byon par
107b2(mdo sde): mdzod cig/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs te spang bar rngo ma thog lags so//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po
107b3(mdo sde): bdag gi nya 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung gang snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na bde song ste phyin nas//bcom ldan 'das la 'do skad ces
107b4(mdo sde): gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cing //'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/me de sbar bar rngo ma theg nas bdag 'di snyam du//
107b5(mdo sde): sems te/bdag gi nye 'khor ni dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do//'od srung mo spar bar 'dod dam dge sbyong chen po sbar du gsol//de nas 'di
107b6(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ma de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di lta la
107b7(mdo sde): dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me gsad par
108a1(mdo sde): 'dod na gsang bar ma nus so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
108a2(mdo sde): pacan la 'di skad ces smras so//mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad pa nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs so//
108a3(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na dra'o mthu zhig ma byung gang snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ra
108a4(mdo sde): pA can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song de phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol//'dir bdag gi bram ze'i
108a5(mdo sde): khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su sprad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rdo mi thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na
108a6(mdo sde): de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyod do//'od srung mi de bsad dam/dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol//dri nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
108a7(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srub la po can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba
108b1(mdo sde): yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na sbyar ba
108b2(mdo sde): ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no//de bzhin du yongasu spyad nas bsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no/
108b3(mdo sde): no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no//de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu
108b4(mdo sde): gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang gsad par ma nus so//
108b5(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur gang snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyas
108b6(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol//dge
108b7(mdo sde): sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi mi khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bor/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg por bgyid pa do la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
109a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bstims na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo mi thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag nyid nye 'khor na dge sbyong
109a2(mdo sde): chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do//'od srung me de zhi bar bya'am/dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas
109a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ngal pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong
109a4(mdo sde): chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te lnga mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas
109a5(mdo sde): gyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas
109a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed
109a7(mdo sde): pa bzhi mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po yang ma la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rang tu
109b1(mdo sde): 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa yod do snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin na snga bcom/
109b2(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol//'dir bdag ma dang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar na zhugs kyi bu
109b3(mdo sde): rab tu rabar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'idi snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po yang mi li yongs su spyod do//
109b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo//'od sang cing me la yongs su
109b5(mdo sde): spyod dam/da me la yongs su mi spyod de/mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las//sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyi//me 'am yang na chu dag la//yongs su bsten yon tan ci
109b6(mdo sde): zhog yod//de lta mod kyi 'dir mdong sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa nang gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis lnga mgo bos
109b7(mdo sde): phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa
110a1(mdo sde): yin no//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag
110a2(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la babo pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
110a3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/de dper nA me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi pa de dag pas ches lhag cing ches
110a4(mdo sde): 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
110a5(mdo sde): sta na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu tsho ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dag bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du
110a6(mdo sde): gong ma bzhin no//de nas mi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dag 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
110a7(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag byas te/de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/me'i phung po chen po lnga po de mo lho gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do//
110b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar de dag bkya lhag cing chos la 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na
110b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshon che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes/
110b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no//de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od ralnga pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te
110b4(mdo sde): gral te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid shes na bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis
110b5(mdo sde): kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'dri Ta kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan
110b6(mdo sde): du bzhud do//de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang /bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang /bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan pa skye bo'i tsho gas chen po'ang
110b7(mdo sde): dbang du gyur to//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mched sbyin zhag mdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/zheg bdun po 'di la bdag la
111a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang /bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang /bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan/skye bo'i tshogs chen po'ang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma nga ni dge sbyong
111a2(mdo sde): chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen
111a3(mdo sde): nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so//ltong rgyas 'ad srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
111a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po byon tam//'od srung 'ongs so//dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas bzhud lags/'od srung khyod kyi 'dug nas
111a5(mdo sde): gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes
111a6(mdo sde): na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang tsa ma rung
111a7(mdo sde): snyam sems pa ma yin nam/nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo //'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/'od srung khyod kyi mchod
111b1(mdo sde): skyon nag bdun du byas byin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag ban du rnyod pa dang /dkur chen po byu myong papa' ba dang /bza' ba rab tu mang po dang ya d+d+ha ts+tsha ba chags can pabyung nga /
111b2(mdo sde): du gyur gyis kyi mi dge sbyong chen po 'angs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so//
111b3(mdo sde): nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no//dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du gsol/de nas lteng rgyus 'od srung rol pa can 'di snyam du sems te
111b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas lteng rgya sa 'odi srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das
111b5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro//bcom ldan 'das
111b6(mdo sde): kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas lteng rgyas 'od sang ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas gauyos byas nas bcom ldan
111b7(mdo sde): 'das gang na pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus le bab
112a1(mdo sde): par dgongs su gsol//'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga'ang 'ong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can snod nas ring po
112a2(mdo sde): malon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag ni shing dzom+ba zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog drang dro dang ro dang ldan pa'i dzam+bu'i snye ma rnams kyis
112a3(mdo sde): lhung bzed bkong nas bsnams te//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan
112a4(mdo sde): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan
112a5(mdo sde): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po byin tam/'od srungs 'ongs so//dge sbyong chen po khyod
112a6(mdo sde): kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/'di rangs 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po me ldon par mkhyen nas/ji lhor thugs mnyam par bzhag nAM shing dzam+b+ha zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu
112a7(mdo sde): gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan po'i dzam+bu'i snyem rnams kyis lhung bzod bkang nas 'dir byin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na
112b1(mdo sde): ngas spyod can/dge sbyong chen po ci bde gakho nar 'tshal lags s+ho//de nas stong rgyus 'od spyang ral pa can 'du snyam du snyoms te/'di ltar dag byung chen baud+d+ha rgyu rgyun /
112b2(mdo sde): che ba yin te/ya mtshon tshe mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//shing dzam+bu zhes bya ba gang gis dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa de dang /haM cang mi ring po zhig na a ru r-i'i
112b3(mdo sde): nags dang /bil pa'i nags dang ka bide tha'i nags dang /skyu ru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no//byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sku lus
112b4(mdo sde): lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//de nas de'i 'og tu
112b5(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gan spyi gaudan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di
112b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po byon tam/'od srungs 'ongs so//dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon
112b7(mdo sde): par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs monyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nos ma rmo sa ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkong nas 'dir phyin pa de lta
113a1(mdo sde): bu'i tIng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na yongs spyod cig/dge slong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshul lags so//de nas ltung rgyu
113a2(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bo yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas
113a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms pazhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhags nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan
113a4(mdo sde): 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
113a5(mdo sde): so ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bstan po dang /de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba
113a6(mdo sde): mdzod ngo //lteng rgyus 'di srung ram pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pan bkong mchen po byung ste chubab pa mthong ngo //mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/rgyu 'di ston
113a7(mdo sde): ni mid ni du 'di ltar gang nas byung snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rab pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
113b1(mdo sde): gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/badrag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkrong ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du
113b2(mdo sde): sems te/chu 'di sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nis bab snyam bgyid do//'od srung 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bye ba
113b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa na ngal chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo //de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ngal chus chu'i dgongs pa byung bar shes nas da gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i
113b4(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug pas sa la bsnun pa las de nas bkong ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do//'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o//de nas lteng rgyus
113b5(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/yi mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//
113b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma rang du yang dag par 'dzag las bzhengs nas rdzing de lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi
113b7(mdo sde): mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzun
114a1(mdo sde): gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo //de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs nas rdzang lag pas brkos pa nas byung//
114a2(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa ni rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ar+d+ha ni yal ga chen po dung ba zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te
114a3(mdo sde): oMr+d+ha na'i yal ga 'di snron ni dring bar ma gyur na//ar+d+ha na'i yal ga chen po 'did su zhig gis btud snyam mo//de nas lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gangan
114a4(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/bdag 'dir bsti ga nas na 'chag pa ni rdzing lag pas
114a5(mdo sde): brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na 'iri yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ar+d+ha na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dung par ma gyur na da lu
114a6(mdo sde): zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do//'od srung 'dir phyir red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas
114a7(mdo sde): rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig rngu na bza' cho saM gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas
114b1(mdo sde): byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzun 'di dag gang na bde logs su lhag pas brkyang ba dang /de nas am+bu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dung par gyur te/de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos
114b2(mdo sde): pa nas byung ngo //'od srung 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te//'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che
114b3(mdo sde): ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha nA'i ras dag brnyes nas/de nas bcom ldan
114b4(mdo sde): 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shwe
114b5(mdo sde): nas ri brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phyag
114b6(mdo sde): dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ris rnams bkrus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
114b7(mdo sde): te/de'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dag ma snyam pa dang /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas brag
115a1(mdo sde): gcig las rdo leng+ga che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
115a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgra mau du gsol//de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo//lteng rgyas 'od
115a3(mdo sde): srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo la ba che la ring ba dag mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/rdo leng che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leng che

115a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dog cig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
115a6(mdo sde): bdag 'di snyam du sems te/rdo lab che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/rdo leb tshe la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis skam bgyid do//'od
115a7(mdo sde): srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so//de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang /de nas
115b1(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems gyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/drag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te gang nar der 'ongs te phyin nas du la 'di skad ces
115b2(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i shwa na'i ras rnams bkrus so//de 'di snyam
115b3(mdo sde): du dgongs te/ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam po dang /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes
115b4(mdo sde): nas brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i
115b5(mdo sde): sha na'i ras dgam du gsol//ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i ras sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo//'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o//
115b6(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dog bcom pa yin no snyam mo
115b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshid na bzhugs so//de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brub nas bab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
116a1(mdo sde): chu klung mi gang byas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chags par mdzud //de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rab pa
116a2(mdo sde): can 'di snyam du sems te//dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po drub pas khyer bar ma gyur grang /ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas
116a3(mdo sde): shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung ma gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas
116a4(mdo sde): rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pan 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gson nam/
116a5(mdo sde): 'od srung gson no//dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i glur 'jug pa gam 'od srung 'jug go/de nas macom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas
116a6(mdo sde): ltar thugs mnyam par gzhog na shing gi cig pa'i gru ji ltar rdul 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/de nas decom ldan 'das

116b1(mdo sde): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems to//'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo//de nas bcom

116b3(mdo sde): ni dgra bcom pa ma yin//dgra bcom de'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bye ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so//de nas

116b6(mdo sde): skyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la ltas sam/dge sbyong chen po ma ltas lags so//'od srung de'i phyir ro
116b7(mdo sde): zhig 'khor la los shig/'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes gnyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs la
117a1(mdo sde): ba can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/bram ze'i khye'u
117a2(mdo sde): dag kho bo'i ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs pa spyod pa spyad na/shes ldan dag ci byed/maukhan po bdag cig gis cung zad ci 'tshil ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la rten nas lags
117a3(mdo sde): pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo //bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir
117a4(mdo sde): g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang /mkhar ba dang /ril pa spyi phyogs dong /blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig/mkhan bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
117a5(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang /shing shun dang /mkhar ba dang /ril pa spyi blugs dang /blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng

117a7(mdo sde): pade bgyis legs so//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

117b6(mdo sde): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po 'am/chom rkun nam/me 'am chus nyes de migs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang /ma la bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
117b7(mdo sde): rnams btsal lo snyam mo//de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /ga yA 'od srung spun dag lted rgyus 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na
118a1(mdo sde): pa der dong ba de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lhung rgyas 'od srung ral pa can sna phye snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngun chos mnyan par

118a6(mdo sde): spyir byas/bla mar byas/brjed par byas/mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs
118a7(mdo sde): kyis ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po bdag

118b5(mdo sde): spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod no/shes ldan dag ci byed/mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan
118b6(mdo sde): po dge dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad po spyod na/bdag cag kyang mkhan po drag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo //bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus

119a1(mdo sde): lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par
