119a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhid kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ga yA gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
119a5(mdo sde): te rim gyis rgya zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thebs cig tu bzhugs so//
119a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong snying po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su
119a7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul ni 'di yin te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag pa nyid
119b1(mdo sde): kyo gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi bAr snang la mngon par 'phags nas/spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/'di lta ste/'chag pa dang /bzhongs
119b2(mdo sde): pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal bar mdzad do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/me'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/sangs rgyas
119b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do//'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /le brgan dang /
119b4(mdo sde): shel gyi kha dog go//cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de sku'i slad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/sku'i stong las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do//sku'i stod nas mi 'bar
119b5(mdo sde): bar mdzad la/sku'i smad nas chu grang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//sher phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /
119b6(mdo sde): byang phyogs su 'di de bzhin to//phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/dge slong gi dge 'dun
119b7(mdo sde): gyi grong la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul yin no//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i tshe 'dul na
120a1(mdo sde): 'di yin te//dge slong gi dag khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o//khyod kyi sems 'di 'di lta bu'o//rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o//'di ni rtog
120a2(mdo sde): cig/'di na ma rtog cig/'di ni yid la byas shig/'di ni yid la ma byed cig/'di ni spongs shig/'di ni ma spangs shig/'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la
120a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par gyis te gnod shig/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no//de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul ni 'di yin te/dge
120a4(mdo sde): slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no//dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/dge slong dag mig dang /gzugs dang /mig gi
120a5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/bde ba'ang ma
120a6(mdo sde): yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de'ang kun tu 'bar ba yin no//dge slong dag rna ba dang /sku dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /chos
120a7(mdo sde): dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/
120b1(mdo sde): bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yung kun tu 'bar ba yin no//gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang /zhe sdang gi me dang /
120b2(mdo sde): gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ba/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug
120b3(mdo sde): pa ste/sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bor ba'o zhes smra'o//de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sngon
120b4(mdo sde): thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon
120b5(mdo sde): thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/bya ba byas so//byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/rang gi don rjes su thob pa/
120b6(mdo sde): srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i
120b7(mdo sde): zho shes 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang /ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung
121a1(mdo sde): ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
121a2(mdo sde): po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang //
121a3(mdo sde): glang po rin po che dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che dang /khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no//de la bu stong yang tshang
121a4(mdo sde): bar 'byung 'gyur te/dpa' brtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnon par
121a5(mdo sde): bdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro//gal te skra dang kha spu
121a6(mdo sde): bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho na byin khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
121a7(mdo sde): rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grag par 'gyur bar lung bsten to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin
121b1(mdo sde): nas ma g+had+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so//lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol badrag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyizhon du
121b2(mdo sde): gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lus bstan pa zhig
121b3(mdo sde): thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//lha de khum shig/lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o//grong po dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes
121b4(mdo sde): bya ba nas/grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/lha de khum shig/lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'i zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra shig/de ci'i
121b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o//gal
121b6(mdo sde): te sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos drur smrig bgos nas dad po yang dge bar kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yod dag pa
121b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyon thos su khas blang bar bya'o//de nas ma gad+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang
122a1(mdo sde): bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi lnga la smon par byed de/kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi smyon pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
122a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha
122a3(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang de la'ang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /nye bar song ba nas des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang /bdag gis
122a4(mdo sde): kyang ches bshad pa de shes pa dang /bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo//de nas bcom
122a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/smon pa'i
122a6(mdo sde): gzhi lnga smon pa byed de/kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar gang
122a7(mdo sde): ma bzhin no//ma gar+b+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shes 'tshe ba dag cig ljong ba rgyu ba na/shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan
122b1(mdo sde): shing rta'i 'gram drang srong sar skya'i bsti gnas dang /ha cang yang myi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram zla mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags
122b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
122b3(mdo sde): ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pas byas pas de gau yA na ga yA'i makI mchod rten la sngon thams cad da' ba can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang
122b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas
122b5(mdo sde): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong
122b6(mdo sde): ste lhags nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so//lha mkhyen par mdzod du gsol//bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rmya ba na/
122b7(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bai re gang ma bzhin du ste/de skra dang kha spu bregs te gas
123a1(mdo sde): ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
123a2(mdo sde): ngas rgyas nas/de ga yAn ga yA'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad rol pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zang po zhes bya ba nas/yang dag
123a3(mdo sde): pa'i shos pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bA sha steg dang thabs cig tu bzhu gas s+ho zhes byu bar du ste/lha de dag la bkur sti mdzad cig dang /de lta na lha gtso badra
123a4(mdo sde): ches gtso bor 'gyur ro//de nas me ga d+hA'i rgyal po ga sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig le bsgo ba/kwa'i nang rje chung khyod bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song nas/
123a5(mdo sde): khro bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/nyi ma nga ba chung ngom/'tsho'am/bskyo ba yang ngam/
123a6(mdo sde): stobs dang /badre ba dang /sgra nya mas dang ldan nam/reg par spyod dam zhes zhu stso la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun da
123a7(mdo sde): thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' che se gos dang /bso snyoms dang ga zims cha dang /spyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /ye byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid
123b1(mdo sde): nabacom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas
123b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gdon pa der sang ste byin nus/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs gnyis la mgo bas phyug bcol te phyogs gcig N+DI 'dug nas/baN+Dama~M ldan 'das ma
123b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/gnod pa
123b4(mdo sde): chung ngam/nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/reg par skyong ngam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste skyon gsoso lags so//kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
123b5(mdo sde): can snying po bde bar gyur cig/btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bza sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchod nas/'di skad ces bo dge bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
123b6(mdo sde): dang /thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza'o dang /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims che dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen srin dang /yo byad rnams
123b7(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang mi gsungs pas gnong ngo //de nas
124a1(mdo sde): mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
124a2(mdo sde): snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yangs
124a3(mdo sde): pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnal par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/yul ma ga d+hU pa rnams kyi mchod rten
124a4(mdo sde): legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa ga na ba der gshegs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ma gau d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod
124a5(mdo sde): rten legs par rab gnas ltung brang gi tshal yod na pa na bzhugs so//ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bathi sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral
124a6(mdo sde): bya can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun tshun po stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ma ga d+hA'i
124a7(mdo sde): ljongs rmyi zhing gshegs pa na/ma gau d+hA'i pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab tu gnas ltung brang gi tshal yod pa gang ni bder gshegs do/ma gar+b+he pi rnams
124b1(mdo sde): kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang shing rta'i bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /rgyal
124b2(mdo sde): po'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang shing rta brgya stong snyed pa lhan cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom
124b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na di'i shIN+Da'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to//des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grong snyam mo//
124b4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis skyon can ma byas med kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag btsen ran bdug gis de dag
124b5(mdo sde): thun cig/rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson pa rnams 'don du bcug go/yong rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan
124b6(mdo sde): sgo la thug go/de nas yang bsams pa/bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gauzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa'i dbyung ngo snyam//
124b7(mdo sde): s+yAd rnams kyis yang smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhon cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha
125a1(mdo sde): cig ni yul ljongs gzhan gA ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mthu' byed cing 'dug pa de dag cig/rgyal po sde yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs tham
125a2(mdo sde): cad bkug go/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang /zhabs 'bring brta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang /ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag
125a3(mdo sde): du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan las kyi spyan sngar song ngo //de ji tsam bzhin pa'i byar
125a4(mdo sde): du bzhon pas song ste/gzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so//ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan
125a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang /gdugs dang /ral gri dang /nor bu'i rnga yab dang /lham khra bo rnams phud do//de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal pi
125a6(mdo sde): pepa bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan me lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bla gos phyug pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na
125a7(mdo sde): ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum du gsol pa/btsun pa bdag ni mi gad+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po legs so//btsun
125b1(mdo sde): pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so//rgyal po legs so//rgyal po de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo
125b2(mdo sde): spangs gzugs can snying po yin ni rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no//rgyal po yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi sbyin ji lta ba la
125b3(mdo sde): 'dug shig/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ma ga d+hA'i
125b4(mdo sde): bram ze dang /khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig
125b5(mdo sde): pa'i mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
125b6(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do//kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
125b7(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang //khyim ba dag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ci dge sbyong chen
126a1(mdo sde): po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad dam/'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo///
126a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis ma gA d+hA'i bram ze dang /khyimo bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs
126a3(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'di ri ci mthong na//mo spangs nas ni brtul shugaso 'di dag spyod//khyod kyis ji ltar me yi mchod spungs pa//don de 'od srung
126a4(mdo sde): nga la smra bar gyis//lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin no//'dod pa dag bud med kho na smra//de dag phung po'i dri ma rab mthong ste/
126a5(mdo sde): des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs yin/khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang /de bzhin rol yid ni mi dga' na//lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid//
126a6(mdo sde): dga' bu yin nam 'od srung gi yis smros//phung po ma mchis zhi ba ni ma mchis//'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis//gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phangs mchogs
126a7(mdo sde): mthong ste//des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min//ko 'phangs mi nyams mchog ni mi mthong bas//mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gi/
126b1(mdo sde): grol snum bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te//dmusu long gyur nas sgyu shA'i rjes bzhin mthong //skyob pa gcab mchog gis legs bshad pa//go 'byung 'dus ma byas te brjod mthong/
126b2(mdo sde): na//thub pa gau ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni//skye bo'i bral chen don brtson pa bden la zhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis rtogs po le gos rtogs te//
126b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis nyes par bsams pa yin//rab tu phye ba'i chos rnams las//gtso bo gang yin de blangs so//'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas
126b4(mdo sde): 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur to//shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar bsnang la mngon par
126b5(mdo sde): 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed do/snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnaM pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dgra bsdus te bla gos phyag pa
126b6(mdo sde): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo glayas pa'i lha nga sel gtsugs te bcom ldan 'das glang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
126b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so//bcom ldan 'das ni bdeg gi ston pa lags so//bdag ni/
127a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so//'du spyad de de bzhin na//de de bzhin te/'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no//khyod ni nga'i nyan thos
127a2(mdo sde): yin no//'od srung nga ni khyod kyi skyoston pa yin no//khyod ni ba'i nyan thos yin no//'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung
127a3(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyog byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/dge

127a6(mdo sde): ba dang 'jigs pa yang rig par bya'o//rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes po la skye ba yang yod/'jig pa yang yod/de'i
127a7(mdo sde): skye ba dang /'jig pa yang rig par bya'o//rgyal po chen po yang rigs kyis bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jigs pa'i chos nyid rig nas gzugs de yongs su shes so//
127b1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /'jigs pa'i chos nyid rig nas rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so//
127b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khos mi len mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed do//rgyal po chen po
127b3(mdo sde): rigs kyis bus tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na bdag glam bdag gir khwas mi len mi 'dzin lhag par gnas mngon par
127b4(mdo sde): zhen par mi byed do//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag glir khas myi len/mi 'dzin/lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad med
127b5(mdo sde): cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan lasna 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o//rgyal po chen po rigs kyis bus tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la bdag gam
127b6(mdo sde): bdag gir khwas mi len mi 'dzin/lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed na chad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o//de nas ma gA d+hA'i

128a4(mdo sde): smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di zer te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyar ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi

128a7(mdo sde): 'di 'gag go/skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa ni'ang 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/rgyu dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud
128b1(mdo sde): 'jug go/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang dogs par mdzad de/dge slong

130a1(mdo sde): pa dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ga ma mi rtag/btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug

131b1(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas snang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas

133a4(mdo sde): dor song ngo //kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes gyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang kun tu rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan
133a5(mdo sde): pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam pa ro dang /gzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do//
133a6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos skyon cig/de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa//chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang //de yi rgyu dang de
133a7(mdo sde): 'gog gang yin po//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to//de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che//tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan cig brjod cig
133b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o//chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni kun tu rgyu dang nas skyes
133b2(mdo sde): chos rnams chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slongs pa
133b3(mdo sde): dang /som nyid las rgal ba dang /the tshom las rgol ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs
133b4(mdo sde): pa thob pa nas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gi la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/skyob pa rnams kyi
133b5(mdo sde): chos 'di yin//bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig tu//sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa//'chi med mya ngan re do ba yi//go 'bang 'di la rjes su rtogs//tshe dang ldan pa bcom
133b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das deng lta ga lU bzhugs//tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal kA lun+da dka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o//tshe dang ldan pa dzu re shog/tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/
133b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'dis de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir rje 'khor la blta bar bya ste/bdag cig lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa/shes par
134a1(mdo sde): gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin na//de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/
134a2(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig/kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ri tshangs par spyod pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed/mkhan po gnyis
134a3(mdo sde): bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba la gas na/gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
134a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar dgye'o//bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shos
134a5(mdo sde): par bgyi' shig/de nas kun tu rgya nye rgyal dang /bang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba~M der dong ngo //de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dag
134a6(mdo sde): slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgya nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so//
134a7(mdo sde): gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyod kyis grags po'i tshigs yongs su sdud pa/tshogs yongs su 'dren pa tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba 'di
134b1(mdo sde): lta ste/nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong ngo //'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang /zung gi mchog dang /zung bzang por gyur te/gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa
134b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la/gcig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad ba smras pa/ston pa dgongs
134b3(mdo sde): yul mtha' yas pa//skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byod//bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas//grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes//'od ma'i tshol du ma byin par//de
134b4(mdo sde): ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas//tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni//'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi//zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te//gtsog ni rdzu 'phrul
134b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i mchog/gcig shos shes rab ldan pa yi//mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad//de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan
134b6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag
134b7(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por nang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa
135a1(mdo sde): ba spyad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog/tshangs par spyad pa spyad
135a2(mdo sde): cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /snam sbyar gyon par gyur te lag na lhung bzed thogs pa skra dang kha spu zhag bdun
135a3(mdo sde): skyes pa tsam dang /dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to//yang smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal
135a4(mdo sde): pos//skra byi snam sbar gyon po'i lus ldan zhing //mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te//sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur//de nas dge slong
135a5(mdo sde): rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs pa dang /de nas rgyal po'i khab gyi mi gang dag
135a6(mdo sde): yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge
135a7(mdo sde): slong de dag mthong nas tso 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas//yang dag rgyal ba'i
135b1(mdo sde): kun khrid na//phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya//de dge slong rnams dpa' gong zhing mi dga' ba dang /mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i
135b2(mdo sde): khyab tu bsod snyoms rgyas nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/phyi dro bsod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas/rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/sdug bsngal zhing
135b3(mdo sde): yid mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dor dang ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig
135b4(mdo sde): tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thub 'tshang //
135b5(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos dag thogs te/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /de nas rgyal po'i khrab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi
135b6(mdo sde): gnas nas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/phyin chad yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis
135b7(mdo sde): dge slong de dang /dode ga mthong nas co 'dre zhing tshigs su bcad po smras pa/sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas//yang dag rgyal
136a1(mdo sde): ba'i kun khrid na//phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/zhes mchi nas bdag cag rnams dpa' grong zhing mi dga' ba dang /mi 'jigs pa ma mchis

136a3(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de//de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la//mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed/ces brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom
136a4(mdo sde): pab tsam mam/spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos//lhung bzed
136a5(mdo sde): dang chos gos thogs te/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas
136a6(mdo sde): nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyon par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid me rangs shing mngon par mi dka' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang dri dag mthong nas tsu 'dri zhing tshigs su
136a7(mdo sde): bcad pa smos pa/sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas//yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na//phyin chad do zhig bkri bar bya//
136b1(mdo sde): de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/'di na dpa' chenu bde gshegs dag/dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de//de dag chos kyis mkhrid mdzad la//
136b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed/de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad ces zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi
136b3(mdo sde): thams cad du med par gyur to//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//ko sA la'i rgyal po
136b4(mdo sde): gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba//lho dgyes pa bskyed du gsol//khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do
136b5(mdo sde): zhes spring pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de nyid du legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba
136b6(mdo sde): nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to//rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la btang nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba

137a1(mdo sde): bzhugs/des smras pa/'char ka gang gi tshe/gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi gtang ba las de dag
137a2(mdo sde): kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o//da ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i'o mi gtang na 'ga' yang phrin yig/

137a4(mdo sde): smyosmos pa/'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyis song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas
137a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de yod do//'char klas smras pa/lha slar mchis lags so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rong nyid kyis spring yig bres pa/lhums su zhugs pa

137b1(mdo sde): tsam nA//bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te//bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na//du la yon tan 'bras bu mi steng khyod
137b2(mdo sde): lnga snying rje med//gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na//nyid do ni bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni//shin tu che dang phan gdogs zhes//khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad pas na//khyod

137b4(mdo sde): spring ba'i yi ge mtshar kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba drar song ste phyin nas
137b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge lag so so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas klagaso//
137b6(mdo sde): nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhug pa dang /'char kas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
137b7(mdo sde): 'char ka 'dod do//'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyi 'dis pa kho nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang bdag
138a1(mdo sde): gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bkru' stsal pa/gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing
138a2(mdo sde): sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' bri de//gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yi sI bkri//gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags

138b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang /yum dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyis chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma dazlog

140b2(mdo sde): gis smras pa/'char kA gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/tshe dang ldan pa 'cha ra~M kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan te//de nas rgyal pos blon
140b3(mdo sde): po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol gyi rnam po gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang phran drug cu po rtsig tu chug
