140b6(mdo sde): song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te yab sras gdan 'jim na/khyod cag las su zhig lte bar spro ba de chos gos drag long zhig ces
140b7(mdo sde): bsgos shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag
141a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/yab sras gang na 'dzom na/khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba chos gos long zhig ces bka' stsal
141a2(mdo sde): to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/grol ba 'khor grol gang gu phyin ga 'khor dgu phyin pa rjer dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/dge
141a3(mdo sde): bcom pa 'khor dgra btsam pa/'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba
141a4(mdo sde): lta bu glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu//dang po'i rgyal po dang pa'i tshigs kyis bskor ba
141a5(mdo sde): lta bu/nam na mkha' ldang bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/sman pa mkhas pa nang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor bA lta bu/dpa'
141a6(mdo sde): byo ru pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/khams kyi rgyal po
141a7(mdo sde): blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/nyi ma 'od zer
141b1(mdo sde): sdong gis bskor ba lta bu/yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis
141b2(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/thags bzang ros lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/brgya byin sum cu rtse gsum
141b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/sprin chu dang bcas po lta bu/glang po dam pa
141b4(mdo sde): dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/dpe
141b5(mdo sde): byed bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan po'i sku nyi ma'o 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas
141b6(mdo sde): mdzes pa/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs po bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran po nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
141b7(mdo sde): dang thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi te kar byon to//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad gab pa 'bab chu ro hi ta ka/ra byon to zhes thos//thos nas kyang
142a1(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gzang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang gyo mo dang /gseg ma rnams bsal nas can gyi chus chag chug pa ga/dri shin
142a2(mdo sde): tu zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/dar gyi tshun 'cha ngo mang po sbyongs te/gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ti ka nas gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bya de'i bar gyi lam shin
142a3(mdo sde): tu mdzes par byas te/sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go/de nas 'brab chu ro ha te ka lu dge slong kha cig ni lag pa
142a4(mdo sde): 'khrub par byed do//kha tsog ni so shing 'dor bar byed do//kha cig ni khrus byed do//ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhin nu don thams cad
142a5(mdo sde): grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so//thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge bo'i rtsa bas bsnol/kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga'
142a6(mdo sde): re ba nas byung ste/ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/'on de sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/'on te sras yub kyi zhabs la phyug byed pa lha'o
142a7(mdo sde): snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal ting zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na shAkya'i rgyal can rnams kye ma'i gzhon nu
142b1(mdo sde): don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su gshegs nas lcog po zhig rtsub pa lta zhig ste/de lta brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bying byas nas steng ga nam mkha' las
142b2(mdo sde): gshegs te des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyom nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das
142b3(mdo sde): kyis thugs mnyam par bzhig na/shar phyogs kyi steng gri bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/'di lta ste/'chag pa dang /bzhengs pa
142b4(mdo sde): dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal ba mdzad do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sangs rgyas
142b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/'di lta ste/sngon pa dang /sor po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /lob rgan dang /
142b6(mdo sde): shel gyi kha dog dag go/cho 'phrul zung du'ang ston par mdzad do//sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/sku'i stod nas chu brang rgyun 'bebra par mdzad//spu'i stong nas me 'bar ba mdzadal
142b7(mdo sde): rgas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs pa mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//shar phyogs la rnga lta bor lho dang //nub dang byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin no//
143a1(mdo sde): phyogs bzhing rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas//rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon pa gdu mdzad pa de bsdus te t+pal bdun gyi sgyid du mun bzhugs so//
143a2(mdo sde): dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das lde'i srid tsamA ni na dge slong
143a3(mdo sde): rnams bzhi'i snyid tsam no'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhi'i srid tsa ma na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam+ba na'o//bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam+ba nA ni dge slong
143a4(mdo sde): rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams ta lU gcig gi sred tsam nA'o//bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsamA na
143a5(mdo sde): bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid can ni dge slong rnams lha'i srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam
143a6(mdo sde): na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsame nA ni dge sbyong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam ne'o//bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/
143a7(mdo sde): dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'ad nyi kyi srid tsam na ne dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni dge slong
143b1(mdo sde): rnams sa la'o//rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang /dge slong nang po n+ya thong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang+gA yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to//de nas tshwa dang
143b2(mdo sde): ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/'charaka/'drin ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na de la gzhin nu gang yin/tshe dang ldan pa 'ju sa dzA bstan nas smras pa/'di ni
143b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lpags so//srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags//'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags//
143b4(mdo sde): 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags//dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi skyes lags mi dbang de gzigs
143b5(mdo sde): shig/de nas rgyal po zlas gtsang gis lus btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dag ni//kun spun zhabs
143b6(mdo sde): la lan gsum phyug bgyis te//bltams pa'i tshe nas ni g.yos pA dang /dzam+bu'i grib mas sku las ma 'das pa'o//de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang
143b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i the tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do//rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo
144a1(mdo sde): /rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so//shes ldan dag pa gdong kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma
144a2(mdo sde): yin te/gang gi tshen gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa nas chen po g.yos par gyur cing 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/'jig
144a3(mdo sde): rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang /zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang
144a4(mdo sde): yin pa de'ang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas sems can+da gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas//shes ldan
144a5(mdo sde): dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan drag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes po shes par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang kho bos byang chub sems
144a6(mdo sde): dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so//gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhing las kyi mtha' la bzhugs pa na shing dzam+bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa
144a7(mdo sde): rnams las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag
144b1(mdo sde): med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsams gtan dang po bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol//shar phyogs su 'bab/shar phyogs su
144b2(mdo sde): bab kyang shing dzam+bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bos yid bsdus pas/bcom ldan 'das
144b3(mdo sde): kyis zhabs la yang phyag byas te/'dri dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so//de bas na 'di skad ces blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni//
144b4(mdo sde): kun spyan zhabs la lon gsum phyag bgyis te/bltam pa'i tshe na sa 'di g.yos pa dang /dzam+b+ho'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o//zhes smras so//de nas bcom ldan
144b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa dri brtul nus 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la
144b6(mdo sde): bzhugs so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/gzhal med khang gi
144b7(mdo sde): gnas rnams las//yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las//dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su//ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
145a1(mdo sde): mi yi bdag po gang du ni//khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba//'phags pa yin gnas pa bcus//thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad//rgyal pos
145a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ba so gser gyi rtsa ba can//shin tu 'di ba gting ba yis//khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las//gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bda'/
145a3(mdo sde): sprul pa/rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni//dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/me tog bkram par chags med cing //yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs menal//rkyal
145a4(mdo sde): pos gsol pa/dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na//glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa//tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la//zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad//bcom
145a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang //yang dag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis//sa kun rnam par rgyun yang //nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med
145a6(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i//na bzu' banabs nas mdzes pa la//ngur smrig rtsub pa'i gos banab pa//ji ltar khyod kyis
145a7(mdo sde): sku yis bzod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes//nga yi bgo ba snam sbyar te//de bgos thub bzhi pa rnams//nags
145b1(mdo sde): khrod nu ni mdzes par 'gyur//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa//'di ltar khyod ston gser gyi gnod pa nas//du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las//'di ltar dra rtsa rba
145b2(mdo sde): dalta'i bsod snyoms ni//phul pa gsol pa ji ltar mgul du mchi//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//zos kyi srid pa thams cad spangs nas ni//nges par byung dang
145b3(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i//nga yi chos kyi rom tshig gisol mod kyi//'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir spyod do//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsal ba//gu du
145b4(mdo sde): bang ba mang bgyid pa'o//rgun skyems kha ra'i chag gsol na/rnyog pa can la dring ba'o//chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi yi
145b5(mdo sde): bdag po gang 'thungs na//bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni//dug dang 'dre bar snang gyur pa//chab kyi ro mchogang 'thung ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/
145b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang //khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs//da ltar gcig pun gras khrod khyod bzhugs pa//blo bzangs ji ltar
145b7(mdo sde): bsnyengs po med par bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gau ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa//dri ma bge tshogs bcas par yang spangs pas/
146a1(mdo sde): da ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te//nga la 'di na 'jigs pa chung zad med//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba//khyod sngon khrus khang shi
146a2(mdo sde): tu mid 'ong bar//khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsngal na//gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par//thub dbang da ltar su yi khrus mdzod 'gyur
146a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po//gau ta ma chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa//tshul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste//de la reg pa'i yon tan mi bkrun/
146a4(mdo sde): lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgas//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa//dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni//gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na//rnyog pa can
146a5(mdo sde): dring ba//chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gau ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med//bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam
146a6(mdo sde): pas bsngags pa ste//dI la rig pa'i yan tan ma bkrus na//lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba//dpa' bo khyod ston sar
146a7(mdo sde): skya yis//rjen gyis ni sku dkrus shing /ka sho'i mchog gnas mdzes pa las//de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
146b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin te//tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin//gsar dang nor bu rna cha dag/rmongs skyes ngal ci zhig bya//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/
146b2(mdo sde): gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod//gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye//yid 'byung ba yang gang pas skyes//zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis
146b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/gang gis nga ni khyod gsod dang //gang zhig los ni 'jigs pa dang /gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dganyon mongs khyod la bshad par bya//rga dang
146b4(mdo sde): na dang 'tsho ba ste//gal te 'di gsum yod min na//nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i//yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/
146b5(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba//legs par 'ablangs pa'i dpa' bo legs//khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis//ji lta bur yang mgos so//de nas rab dga' dang
146b6(mdo sde): pa rgyas byas nas//drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ci//thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te//bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/de nas//
146b7(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/gong bdag gi bus yon tan gyi chags 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed dode snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan
147a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /brag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun
147a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de//de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas//
147a3(mdo sde): gtsang ni ma gtogs so//lha byin nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar mi byas pas khro bas kun nas bkris pa dang paurjes pas smras pa/
147a4(mdo sde): gral te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed po shes na/bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bye ba zhig/de la shAkya rnams kyis ga
147a5(mdo sde): ba'i tshig gis smras pa/lhas byi ni bcom ldan 'dis ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra zhig ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go//tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed
147a6(mdo sde): mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i tshes bshad pa mdzad de/de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bye bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du zhugaso
147a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na'ang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du zer ro//ro hi ta ka'i skyes mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos pas rgyal
147b1(mdo sde): bo zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na'ang lhas byin de kho na bzhin du zer ro//
147b2(mdo sde): 'khor lhag pa rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha gcig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
147b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu//kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas//kha cig gis nau lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong
147b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dag bcom par 'gyur/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /kha cig gis
147b5(mdo sde): ni chos la/kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/chos la 'bab/dge 'dun la thob par bkod do//de nas rgyal
147b6(mdo sde): po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ston ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang /rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar gyur na/da lta ni
147b7(mdo sde): mis mchod kyis lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo//de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcaka de gsol pa/drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi//char pas 'gro
148a1(mdo sde): ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de//mi bzad lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di//drongs te thar pa'i lam la spyod par mdzod//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
148a2(mdo sde): dgongs te/rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig/'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu tsho ba yin no snyam ste lhag par dga' bo las gyur gyis
148a3(mdo sde): mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug/rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ha cang zhum pa dang shin tu dga' bo'o//de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin tu
148a4(mdo sde): dga' ba yod kyis ma langs de'i zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la
148a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/maud+gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan
148a6(mdo sde): nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang /rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po rlung ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //mthang nas kyang tshe dang
148a7(mdo sde): ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa mod+gal gyi bu chen po chur spyon//met+pal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so//btsun pa maud+gal gyi bu
148b1(mdo sde): chun po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen pos sems
148b2(mdo sde): ji mnyam par bzhag na//rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa re bzhi byed de/'di lta ste/'chag
148b3(mdo sde): pa dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal bar byed do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug par byed do//mi'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/
148b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed do//'di lta ste/sngon po dang /srer po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb
148b5(mdo sde): rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog dag go/cho 'phrul zung du'ang ston par byed do//lus kyi smad nas me 'badz+ra bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do//
148b6(mdo sde): lus kyi stong nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi spyad nas chu glang mo'i rgyun 'o bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs so//shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du
148b7(mdo sde): lho dang /nub dang /byang phyogs su'ang de bzhin na//phyogs ge zhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba sdus te stan bshams pa
149a1(mdo sde): nyid la 'dug//nganas rgyal zlas gang gsu ma dang ldan pa mas myenacanathal 'di skad kyis smras so//btsun pa maul gyi ba rgyan
149a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tsha ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan med mchi skye lags sa ma/rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
149a3(mdo sde): mthu che ba dag gsum rig dang /sems gyo rnami grangs shesaM pa dang //zag zud dgra bcom gang yin pa//thob pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis//de nas rgyal ba zas
149a4(mdo sde): gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gri bu 'ba'i shig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang
149a5(mdo sde): yod do snyam nas de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyurato//skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de//kye ma brgya byin
149a6(mdo sde): drung tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na//lha'i 'khor dag pa la tshos pa shad do//skem pa dang /chos nyid kyis glang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
149a7(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/srog chags grog spur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/brgya byin
149b1(mdo sde): dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos//gang gi cha 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan
149b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/srodag chags grog sbur rnams kyis lha ga la shes/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
149b3(mdo sde): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzod snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos
149b4(mdo sde): 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas des lha'i bu bzo thams cad dang /ba la sgo ba/bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
149b5(mdo sde): rab ri rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gang na sna tshogs pa sham pa zhig sprul cig/kau shi ka khyod kyi gsung mchog tu bzang ngo zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas lha'i dpa dri
149b6(mdo sde): brgya byin las mnyan te n+ya grog d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ri rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa po rtsegs ma gdan sna tshogros bshams pa zhig sprul te//de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin 'khod
149b7(mdo sde): bi ni yul 'khor skyong dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /lus ngan pa ste/shar smon ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang /rna cha gdub kar dang /phreng ba dang /
150a1(mdo sde): /rgyun sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o//lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin
150a2(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o//byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thad
150a3(mdo sde): rgyun du bcug ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to//de nas brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la
150a4(mdo sde): sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mes yongs su bskor nas khang po brtsegs par zhugs te lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa seng ge'i
150a5(mdo sde): khri la bzhugs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal
150a6(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang /rgyal po zas gcod la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdud cig ces bzlog go/ci'i phyir
150a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de der mor gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang do//bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgyal po chen po bdag na yul 'khor skyong ngo //
150b1(mdo sde): denas rgyal po zas gtsang sgor song ba dang /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras bya//rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par snang cig/rgyal po zas gtsang ga
150b2(mdo sde): mthong nas smras pa//bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/'phags skyes pos spros pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags skyes po'i//ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag
150b3(mdo sde): pa la chos 'chad de/der mir gyur po 'jug tu mi dbang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nur sgor song ba dang /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/rgyal
150b4(mdo sde): po chen po nang du ma 'jug par snod cig/rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyed su zhig/mig mi bzang gis smras pa/rgyal po chen po bdag
150b5(mdo sde): ni mig mi bzang ngo //ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/dang mir sbyor pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sbyor song
150b6(mdo sde): bdang /rgyal po chen po rlom thos kyi dus mthong nas smras pa/rgyal po chen po na 'du ma 'jug par sdod cig/rgyal po bas gtsang gis smyos pa/bzhin bzongs khyod
150b7(mdo sde): su zhig//rnam thos kyis bus smras pa//rgyal ba chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o//ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/der mo'i
151a1(mdo sde): pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chud pa de bdag gis byargya
151a2(mdo sde): snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas
151a3(mdo sde): gtsang gis gral te ngo ma mthong na khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod gyis de la thubs shig ba shams par bya'o snyam nas bcom
151a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel lngas byas par sprul pa dang /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par
151a5(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nos bcom
151a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang khams dang //rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba
151a7(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs
151b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa//btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis mas ma lpags/rgyal pos
151b2(mdo sde): lags/lha rnams kyis mi lags/sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma legs/dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/sdug pa dang /rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi chog tu
151b3(mdo sde): 'gra ga labs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/khrag dang mche ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams//rus pa'i ri bo las ni sbrul ngan slong gri sgo rnams ni bkum//mtho ris
151b4(mdo sde): dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/bdag lce dang mi rnams su ni gnag go/yang gsol pa/ngal ldan du phan gdags pa//dam pa'i bus ni bgyi b+ha gang //khyod kyis bdag la
151b5(mdo sde): mdzad lags te//sems ni grol bar gzhol par bgyis/khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las//drangs te mtho ris thar pa las//bsgrim mi 'tshal badra bzhag lags te//
151b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa legs mgon po byams pa khyed kyis ni//bdag gi tshod pa brnyid ldan ltar//mtho ris rnyed pa sred pa yi/longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad/
151b7(mdo sde): donas rgyal po zas katsang stan las langs te blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
152a1(mdo sde): ces gsapas+ho//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi snyam par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar
152a2(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cing mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang
152a3(mdo sde): bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kye zhabasna gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di
152a4(mdo sde): skad ces smras s+ho//na nu rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid /rje'i slad du/dus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar badren pa mthong bas so//gang gi gdugs
152a5(mdo sde): yu lags/de ring khrona'o//bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'odas gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' re bar ches bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya dun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig
152a6(mdo sde): bdan du mthong lags so//de bzhin du tho ba zas la rgyal srid khyu gyig kyis smras pa dang /des skyes pa bdag gi bcom ldan sa ga
152a7(mdo sde): na po'i sbyid mas tshal du rgyas pa shad hrIblo mngon pa'i mang la nasaso//de bzhin du 'angadu byas pa rgya kyis smras pa
152b1(mdo sde): des smras pa/bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so//
152b2(mdo sde): gral te de ltar gyur na nga su zhig rgyal srid la bzhag/de rnams kyis smras pa/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal
152b3(mdo sde): srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ste gon byas nas nang par sder longs te/
152b4(mdo sde): gdan bshams shing nor bu chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod logs na/da de'i dus la bcwa
152b5(mdo sde): bapar dgongs su gsol//bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' dang sham thabs banabs//lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnam sau tAM dge slong gi tshogs kyis yang su bskor cing dge slong gi
152b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis mdun du badrar nas/rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkang sra gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso/
152b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gcing gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs por rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas
153a1(mdo sde): stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi la gnas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/bcom
153a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi byam bum blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo//bcom ldan
153a3(mdo sde): byings kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan po'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa//sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis//shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi//yid la ra ba
153a4(mdo sde): rdzogs nas ni//rtag pa'i gnas ni thob pa shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ni bzhugs so//de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams
153a5(mdo sde): kyis kyang mdo sde lnga bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi lI gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba nA bzhugs so//zhes gdags pa byas so//bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs
153a6(mdo sde): nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshad gsol/nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo//rgyal po zas gtsang gisnga ral pa can los rab tu byung ba'i dge
153a7(mdo sde): slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na dka' thub drag pa'i brtul shugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo //mthong nas
153b1(mdo sde): kyang 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dad pa yin mod kyi//lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das mdzes par
153b2(mdo sde): gyur snyam pa las nges bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te gzhonu don thams cad grub pa rab tu
153b3(mdo sde): byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur//g.yog babyed par 'gyur ro//da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad gab
153b4(mdo sde): po bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur na/khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam//rab tu byung ba zhig/ci thams cad dam/khyim re nas re re'o//dkal
153b5(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshal//rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas/
153b6(mdo sde): re re rab tu byung zhig tsos de skad bkra' stsal to//bro bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming chen no//ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no//ma
153b7(mdo sde): 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do//ming chen la mas smras pa/bu rgyal pos dril sgrog
154a1(mdo sde): su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu phyung zhig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung zhig/des smras pa/bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis//
154a2(mdo sde): khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung zhig/bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyis sems can de la khyod 'gran mi tshal cig/
154a3(mdo sde): yum khyod ging la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags myong //de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskur dang /ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam
154a4(mdo sde): ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro//bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o//des gzeb stong pa rje'u yis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas
154a5(mdo sde): btab nas/bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri ba dang /ci yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig/des de khyer nas song ba
154a6(mdo sde): dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/des bsams pa/rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin
154a7(mdo sde): bde da ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya/de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rje'u de rnams sran tshod dang /tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo //ji tsam
154b1(mdo sde): namangag gzhug mas der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /des smras pa/bu mo'o na ni ci yod/des smras pa/gzhon nu ni yang ma mchis so//mu 'gags pas
154b2(mdo sde): bsams pa/bdag lo ma byams na 'di stong par ci stau bskur gdon mi za bar 'di ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re zhig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha bye ba dang /
154b3(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal de thams cad zos kyi dri zhim pos grang bar gyur te/de snrums nas ma 'gugs pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so//de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma la zos kyi
154b4(mdo sde): phred bskur nas spring ba/yun gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs so//des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/des ming
154b5(mdo sde): chen la bsten nas bu mthong ngam/yum mthong lags so//khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen mo'i sems can mi'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan po la khyod 'gran
154b6(mdo sde): mtshol cig ces ma smras sam//des smras pa/yum de bsad namos kyi dngang thang chen po dang ldan pa'ang rung //mi ldan yang rung //bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar myong
154b7(mdo sde): chen gnas skabs thams cad tu rab tu'i byung bar khas len du ma btub po//de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa//bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs tu bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim
155a1(mdo sde): re nas re re rab tu byung zhig ces bsgo na/khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/'on te khyim par 'dug/des smras pa/yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis
155a2(mdo sde): nye dmigs ci mchis//khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/nyes dmigs ci mchis/bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na/mya ngan las 'das pa thob par
155a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//legs par mi bsgrubs na lha dang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro//khyim par 'dug ste legs par bsgyings na lha dang mi 'thob bo//ma bskyangs na sems can dmyal
155a4(mdo sde): bdang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgos 'thob po//yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim no gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas//
155a5(mdo sde): pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang byur mdzod cig dang /rab tu 'byung ngo //des smras pa/bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po
155a6(mdo sde): bzang ldan ljon pas de de'i drung du song ngo //de'i tshe shUkya'i rgyal po bzung ldan pi bang ldan te/blo brang len pa ni rgyud chud nas sku gzhan du gyur to//mi 'gogs pa pi bad+ma
155a7(mdo sde): la byang ba yin pas des sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas sgor bsdod de//sgo srungs kyi mi la smras pa/kyi nang rjes nga la rgyal po bzang ldan lha ma 'gags pad+man
155b1(mdo sde): zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras pa/lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas
155b2(mdo sde): chab sgo na sdod cing mchis so//des smras pa/shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog/shes ldan mi 'gags pa nang du thong zhig/de nang du zhugs pa dang /rgyal po
155b3(mdo sde): 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste smras pa/khyod 'ongs nas ci srid lon//des smras pa/gang gi tshe khyod pi bang len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so//de mchog tu
155b4(mdo sde): ya mtshan skyes nas/des smras pa/khyed pi bang len pa la byeng ba yin no//shAkya'i rgyal po bzong ldan gyis smras pa/gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs//ma 'gags
155b5(mdo sde): pas smras po/lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa/shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung zhig par bsgo bas pa khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/
155b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/gal te dri lta na kho bo 'ang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid tu gnas thob cig/de de nyid du gnas btab po//
155b7(mdo sde): mal 'cha' bas rims bag gi dri can gyis gos kyi ting zhing me tog sil mas bkram pa'i maul du ma 'gagos pa nyal ba dang /de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i
156a1(mdo sde): /nyams su myong nas smras pa/ci 'di 'og tu rdo phraru yod dam//de rnams kyis brtag pa brtsams par me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams
156a2(mdo sde): mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so//mu 'gags dri mtshan mo mi bde zhing nyal nas nam langs so//rgyal pos smras pa/mA 'gags pa cig bde bar gnyid log gam des
156a3(mdo sde): smras pa lta bde bar gnyid ma log go//rgyal pos smras pa/ci'i phyir ma 'gags pas smras pa//wA rA mras bag gi dri can gyi gros bting bar me tog sil ma bkram
156a4(mdo sde): pa'i me tog gi rtsu bas lus snang lags so//rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gros bting ste ci bya/mal 'cha' bas smras pa
156a5(mdo sde): lha bdag la dkor bas gtang ba lags so//rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos pog ste ci bya//des smras pa/lha bdag
156a6(mdo sde): la thag pasna gtang ba lcags so//rgyal po sra tha ga pa bkug nas smras pa/khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims ngag gi dri can gyi gos 'bul/thag pas skyes pa/lha snam
156a7(mdo sde): bu'athag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/bdag rims kyis thobs bzhin bgyis po legs so//rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/des smras pa/
156b1(mdo sde): tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims bag gi dri 'gags so//rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/shes ldan ma 'grags pa ni shAkya'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan
156b2(mdo sde): pa yin no//de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na/lhas byin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to/shAkya rnams la gnod pa
156b3(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur gyis/me la bdag cag thams cad la 'dus la lhas byin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste de nas thams cad 'dus nas
156b4(mdo sde): smras pa/lhas byin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na/khyod ci byed/ltos byin gyis bsams pa/gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /shAkya'i rgyal po
156b5(mdo sde): bzang ldan rab tu byung bur mi 'gyur gyis de la thabs zhig bA sha mau par bya ste bslu'o//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i
156b6(mdo sde): cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ji ltar 'di'i sbyar mas skye ba'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so skom
156b7(mdo sde): nas smras pa/khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dugashAkya'o rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/'di ni brdzun du slu ba yin gyis dom 'char bcug la 'gro ba
157a1(mdo sde): mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo//de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas grong khyer sar skye'i gzhing dril sgrogs su bajug pa/grong
157a2(mdo sde): khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/bzang ldan dang /nam glu dang /mya 'gags pa dang /ltos byin lo sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung
157a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyis thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyes cig ces bsgo'o//lhas byin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yide mi bde ba skyes nas/gal te bdag
157a4(mdo sde): gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzung ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur drang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig/de ni gal te rab tu ma byung ni brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes
157a5(mdo sde): rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zud ngam/ci rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo//de nas rgyal
157a6(mdo sde): po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o sbyin+da dro grong khyer des gsog ma dang gyo mo bsal/con danr-i gyi chus tshog tshig btab//gdugs//
157a7(mdo sde): dang /rgyal mtshan bsgreng /dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs/shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed du
157b1(mdo sde): bcug go//de nas shAkya brgya stod du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgron seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/shUk+Sha mo dang /shAkya gzhan nu mtshor skyes pa rnams kyang skar khur khol
157b2(mdo sde): mu can dang /skar khung dang /ltogs bu dag la 'dug go/shUkya rnams kyi 'byor pa le lta bar 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhogs pa dag kyang lam po che dang /
157b3(mdo sde): tshong 'dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo rnams su 'dug gi/shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/su dag gis ni thugs byung bar 'gyur brtag pa'i bram
157b4(mdo sde): mtshan ma ngan dang /ltas mkhan dag bkug go//shAkya rnams de shUl dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyan dang /rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams kyi pha dang /mi dag la bltas
157b5(mdo sde): nas/so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa ni/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sprul byung ba mtshon mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/re zhig 'dis ni
157b6(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du nam gru dang /ma 'gegs pa la sogs pa phyir byung bya na/de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to//de nas lhas
157b7(mdo sde): byin phyir byung ste/de phyir byung ba na bya khras gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar
158a1(mdo sde): sbyin du la la spyanas dmyal bar ldan pa ba gyu /ka kA la~M ka dang /khan dra drang byungang /ka ta mo rak+Sha dang /rgyal dang /rgya mtshos ston/
158a2(mdo sde): rnams phyir byung ba na/bong bu'i skad grags nas de dag kyang mtshan mdunan kyis lung bstun pa/'di dag kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig dran pa smras nas dmyal bar gro zhel
158a3(mdo sde): bir 'gyur ro//nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang /de glang po che las babs te blangs so//de'ang de rnams kyis lung
158a4(mdo sde): bstan pa/'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bzang ldan dang /nam gru dang /ma 'gags pa lhas sbyin la sogs
158a5(mdo sde): pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshul du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzong pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
158a6(mdo sde): pa/gal te ngas shAkya rnams la dge sbyong chu bai shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi
158a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag gzhon du sems la/dge slong tshur shig ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas/ma
158b1(mdo sde): langs thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
158b2(mdo sde): pa/dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/btsun pa bka' bzhi ni 'tshal zhes dge slong
158b3(mdo sde): de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to//rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba/de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na skra 'dreg par btang
158b4(mdo sde): nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzeng ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na/de ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag cing sked madz+re ri cang dbugs brtsegs pas skra 'dreg par byed do//shAkya'i rgyal po
158b5(mdo sde): bzang ldan gyis smras pa/nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du/de skang rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dral bus tshig re re nas smras pa/lha bdag dzam+bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la
158b6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa mi bal ba rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig/khyed kyis spangs te gson paM bas na gum mi bsngo'o//shAkya'i rgyal po
158b7(mdo sde): bzang ldan gyis smras pa/nye bar 'khor khyod kyis rje bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig/ngas ji ltar mi phel che ba rnams la bsnyen
159a1(mdo sde): bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig da ting na swA shUkya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/shes ldan+da gnan du/
159a2(mdo sde): dag nyon cig/'dreg ma khon nye bang 'khyer 'dis bdag cag la bkur ba sti byas la bdag cig kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyisgra rgyun rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du/
159a3(mdo sde): zhig cig/de rnams kyi sa ma do dang /do shUl dang /mgul rgyan dang /gdu b+ha dang /dpung rgyan dado/rna rgyun la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis bai rgyun pa'i rgyan
159a4(mdo sde): khyad par can rnams kyisnga ras kyi steng du phung po chen por spungs so//nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra phrogs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /des bosems
159a5(mdo sde): bopo/re zhig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang /lang tshol ba ba cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang /brang mdzod kyis rgyas pa'ang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag
159a6(mdo sde): rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pos sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//gal te bye drug rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i tshe sa 'dul ba
159a7(mdo sde): la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo la rgal ba dang /sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo//'di ni chos nyid
159b1(mdo sde): yin te/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams
159b2(mdo sde): kyang byed pas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes po mthong //mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na bsong ste phyin nas
159b3(mdo sde): 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so//nye 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dgo' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/1
159b4(mdo sde): bar 'khor gyis smras pa/btsun pa shU ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir da lta gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang /lang tshol babacing chung ma dang ldan la ba mdzod dang /
159b5(mdo sde): mdzod kyis rgyas pa'ang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/bdag rgyun 'di tsam+ba li tshogs pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes
159b6(mdo sde): na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang /sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir btsal ba dang /'bod
159b7(mdo sde): pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa shrI ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bzhin bzang thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rang
160a1(mdo sde): 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/dus snying po byed pa ma yin rgyud snying po byed pa yin/zlo ba snying por byed pa ma yin te/'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di
160a2(mdo sde): la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni//rgyun dang dus la rtog mi mdzad//'das nas yun ring lon pa yi//las rnam
160a3(mdo sde): la ni rtog par mdzad//gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na tshur bcom ldan 'das kyi
160a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dong dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro//des khas blangs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom
160a5(mdo sde): ljosngon 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa nye bar
160a6(mdo sde): 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal legs na thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/bcom ldan/
160a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis/de la bka' stsal pa/dge slong tshur shog/tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig ces bcom
160b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kha nAr skra byi ba dang /snam sbyar gyon pa dang /lag pa lhung bzed dang bya ma bum gyis 'brel pa dang sgra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon bcom dang
160b2(mdo sde): dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya ljon pa'i spyod lam lta bu ro gnas par gyur to//smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shig bka' stsol pas/sgra byi snam sbyar gyon pa
160b3(mdo sde): lus ldan zhing /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur//shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnams na rgan rims ji lta
160b4(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so//de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/bcom ldan
160b5(mdo sde): 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la'ang gdud par bgyi 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir
160b6(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba yin te/'di rgan gyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa mchog la thud cig/des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur to/sa chen po 'di g.yos
160b7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'//
161a1(mdo sde): lho phyogs mthon byung phyogs dmara'/byung phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/mtha' mthon dbus dma' bar gyur te/
161a2(mdo sde): de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gtugs so//lhas byin gyis ma btud ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin
161a3(mdo sde): gyagyis thud cig/des gsol pa/bdag gis de'i rkang pa la mi gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes te 'dud du ma btub ste der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi
161a4(mdo sde): bka' lhas byin gyis bcug go/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser spyi'i'o gzhi n+ya gra d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de nas ser skya'i gzhin glenas pa'i shAkya
161a5(mdo sde): rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/thog mi na gang yin/rgyu ni
161a6(mdo sde): ci zhig yin//shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las
161a7(mdo sde): skyes/thog ma ni gang yin/rgyun ci zhig yin/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las
161b1(mdo sde): skyes pa dang /thog ma gang yin pa dang /rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa'ang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/tshur bdag cag
161b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang nub der dong la lhags po dang /bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar
161b3(mdo sde): bya'o//de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das grang na ba der dong ste lhags na/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
161b4(mdo sde): bos te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ser snye'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa 'dir bdag ser skra'i gizhi'i
161b5(mdo sde): shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du 'tshogs shing 'dus nas par skabs kyi bkra' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes thog ma ni gong yin/rgyu ni
161b6(mdo sde): ci zhig yin/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las
161b7(mdo sde): skyes/thog ma ni gang yin/rgyun ci zhig yi ni/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes thog
162a1(mdo sde): ma ni gang yin/rgyu ni ci zhig yin/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa'ang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/tshur bdag cag bcom
162a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na bu der dong la lhag pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar
162a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bradag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/thog ma ni gang lags//
162a4(mdo sde): rgyu ni ci zhig lags/shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
162a5(mdo sde): rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/mu stegs can dang /kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid
162a6(mdo sde): bstod par byed do//zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yi pa s+ya dra'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud lus brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs par nus
162a7(mdo sde): bsu yod snyam mo//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa modral gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyurato//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mornal gyi blo
162b1(mdo sde): chen po la bka' stsal pa/maud+gal gyi bu nga rgyal skung bas re zhig nges bsal gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtamu
162b2(mdo sde): bya bar spobs par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo rdul gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi
162b3(mdo sde): bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar blta ba ste sngas su bcug nas/glogayas pas phab ste/zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du
162b4(mdo sde): shes dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau d+gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/mal bdag
162b5(mdo sde): gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang /thog ma gang yin pa dang /rgyu ni ci yin pa dang /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong
162b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/tshe dang ldan pa mi rdul gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag ni/shAkya rnams kyi
162b7(mdo sde): sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams
163a1(mdo sde): /gang las skyes pa dang /thog rgyu gang yin pa dang /rgyun ni ga yin pa da /rna rnams kyi sngon gyi rig sa rgyud ni glung yin pa mthong ngo //mthong nas/
163a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung lnga bstan pa shams pa nyid la 'dug go//'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa met+pal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shA
163a3(mdo sde): rnams la smras pa/gau ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'dzeg cing 'jig rten zhig nas/sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/de rnams de ni
163a4(mdo sde): yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po mnyam shing mtshang ba med pa yan lag dang /nying lag thams cud dang ldan pa/kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/rlung
163a5(mdo sde): gi 'od can/nam mkha' la 'gro ba dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun+da ring du gnas so//de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig
163a6(mdo sde): tu 'gyur ro//sa chen po 'di chu 'bra' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis bris mi chags pa dang /mkhregs pa dang /khebs par byed do//dper na
163a7(mdo sde): 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis bris ma chags pa dang /mkhrigs pa dang //khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gis mtsho gcig tu
163b1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i steng du rlung gi bris ma chags pa dang /mkhregs pa dang /bebs par byed do//sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum chags pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs
163b2(mdo sde): pa yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na mAr sar lta bu'o//ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do//gau tA ma
163b3(mdo sde): dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'ang 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zang bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phron
163b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu rim rnams dang sprul pa mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di ni yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/dbang po mnyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/yan lag dang /nyid
163b5(mdo sde): lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/mkha' la 'gro ba/dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//
163b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/rgyu skar rnams kyang med/skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam yang med/mtshan mo dang nyin mo 'ang med/zla ba dang /
163b7(mdo sde): zla ba phyed dang dus tshigs dang /lo rnams kyang rdo jig rten du 'byung ba med do//skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i//
164a1(mdo sde): ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//de nas sems can brkam tshugs kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do//ji lta ji ltar myangs pa
164a2(mdo sde): de lta de ltar sred do//ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar lam gyi zas rim gyis za'o//sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed
164a3(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar myongs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ji lta ji ltar sred pa dro lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong//
164a4(mdo sde): bar rtsom ste/ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar srod de//ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o//gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud
164a5(mdo sde): la kham gyi zas rim gyis bros pa de'i tshe/de rnams kyi lus la mkhang ba dang lci bzhugs par gyur to//de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de'ang nub
164a6(mdo sde): par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to//gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyu skar
164a7(mdo sde): dang /skad cig dang /thang cig dang /yud tsam dang /mtshan mo dang /nyin mo dang /zla ba dang /zla ba phyed dang /du sa tshigs dang/lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar
164b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de rnams dri za zhing zlas su zab la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//de rnams las zas la ches nyung zad tu zla ba gang yin pa de'i kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kha zas
164b2(mdo sde): la chos mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/kha zas kyi tshad gnyid la brten nas kha dog gi rnams pa gnyis mngon te/khwa dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kye sems
164b3(mdo sde): can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no//khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yino zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i
164b4(mdo sde): chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to//gau ta ma dag su'i bcud de nub pa na sems can+da de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/kyi hud blo ba
164b5(mdo sde): kyi hud bro bra zhes skye zhing smre sngags 'din la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dper ni dAltar mi rnams kyis zlos zhim po chung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang /tshig
164b6(mdo sde): dang /tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran na sa 'di skad ces/kyi hu de bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pan tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad
164b7(mdo sde): ces/kyi hud bri ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smai rdza 'don la mya ngan dang /sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni
165a1(mdo sde): /shes /gautA m+b+ha dgu sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub bla ma b+hi nag //phun su tshon par rgyun ma tshogs pa byung ba gyur to//kha dog ni 'di
165a2(mdo sde): yin te/dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o//ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o//de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe rang zhing yun ring du gnas/
165a3(mdo sde): de rnams las kha zas la ches nyu du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to//kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to//zas kyi tshod gnyis
165a4(mdo sde): la brten nas kha dog rnams pa gnyis mngon te/khwa dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis
165a5(mdo sde): sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag nub par gyur to//gau ta ma dag
165a6(mdo sde): sa'i zhag de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nos 'di skad ces/kyi hud brob kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/
165a7(mdo sde): dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ba' zhig gis rig pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang /tshig dang /tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o
165b1(mdo sde): hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams su zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud brob kyi dud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang /sdug/
165b2(mdo sde): bsngal bar 'gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yis smras pa 'di di ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so//gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis zhig de nub pa na/myu gu'i tshol kha dog phun
165b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/dper na shing ka dam pa kA'i me tog lta bu'o//re ni 'di lta bu yin te/
165b4(mdo sde): dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o//de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang /
165b5(mdo sde): ldan par gyur to//kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to//zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnam pa gnyis/
165b6(mdo sde): yod pas/kye sems can kho bos ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsan
165b7(mdo sde): de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to//gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal do nub par gyur pa ni sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus
166a1(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces/mdun nas par song /mdun nas par song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya dran dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dper na da ltar mi rnams
166a2(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig pa drag po'i tshar gtsad par 'dod par na ston gyi yi ge dang /tshig dang /tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad du/mdun nas par song /mdun nas phyir so
166a3(mdo sde): zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang /tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas par song mdun nas phyir song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'dron la
166a4(mdo sde): myud+ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang /smras po 'di don ni 'di yin smras pa/'di'i don ni 'di yin na zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so//gau ta ma dag sems cani de rnams kyi
166a5(mdo sde): gu'i tshul nub nas/mo rmis ma btab pa'i 'bras sku lce'i 'bras bu chen bzhi pa bub ma med/spun ma med pa/shun pa med pa/dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/de nub brngas na ning
166a6(mdo sde): skye zhing smin par 'gyur/nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yung mi mngon no//de rnams de za zhing zlos su za ba la
166a7(mdo sde): tsha ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//gang nis sems can de rnams kyi marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyis zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams
166b1(mdo sde): kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o//kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o//de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang /skyes pa'i dbang po
166b2(mdo sde): can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gi sgo mig tshug su blta'o//ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig chags su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so//ji lta
166b3(mdo sde): ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar bzhi no//ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so//sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par
166b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang sa dang /bong ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mos gau tor nus 'di skad ces/sems can dran pa tha chud rnams ni bya bu ma yin pa byed do//
166b5(mdo sde): sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bye ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis kwa'i sems can khyod kyis nga ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o//dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams bag ma
166b6(mdo sde): blangs pa na phye ma dang /dri za dang /phreng ba dang /gos dang /'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur/cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis
166b7(mdo sde): sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba nas sa gtor cing bong ba dang /gasreg ma dang /gyo ma rnams kyis kyang gtor nas kyang 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/
167a1(mdo sde): /byu bya ma yin pa byed kyis/kwa'i sems can khyod kyis dadi ltar sems nAn sun byu zhes byu ba smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yodado//gau ma dag
167a2(mdo sde): deltar ston chos ma yin par 'dod par gang yin pa dang /sngon gyi 'dul po ma yin par 'dod pa glang yin pa de ni de ltar chos su 'dong ngo //'dul bar 'dong ngo //sngon spyad par

167a5(mdo sde): bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa skyed do//'dir bdag cag bya ba mA yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyi ma zhes bya bar grags te/gau ta ma dag 'dri ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i
167a6(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin//de'ang chos kyis yin gyis chos ma yin pas mi yin te/de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no//de rnam
167a7(mdo sde): nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba'ang dgongs ka/nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba 'ang nang par sA lu'i ched du gdong par byed do//de nas sems can snyam las rang bzhin gyis
167b1(mdo sde): nang bar gyi sA lu nub blangs so//de nas sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo //de nas sems can des
167b2(mdo sde): sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma sems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/kho bos ni nang bar gyi sku lu nang blangs so//de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/
167b3(mdo sde): kye ma de ni legs so//kye ma de ci shin tu legs kyis ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang /zhag gsum gyi dang /zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam nus/des zha
167b4(mdo sde): gnyis kyi dang /zhag gsum gyi dang /zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so//de nas sems can zhigs sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye sems can khyod
167b5(mdo sde): tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo //de nas sems can des sems can la 'di skad ces so//kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la sems shig/kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang /gsum
167b6(mdo sde): gyi dang /zhag bdun gyi bAr gyi sA lu blangs zin no//de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma de ni legs so//kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ma la bdag gis
167b7(mdo sde): zla ba phyed dang /zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/des zla ba phyed dang /zla ba gcig gi sA lu glengs so//gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras
168a1(mdo sde): sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyod pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /spun pa dang /shun pas yog par gyur to//
168a2(mdo sde): brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mo skyengs brngas par yang mngon la/sA lu 'ang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to//de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing

168a4(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa/kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/na mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba bzhi bku pash+tha kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la bdag cag la sra'i

168a6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis si'i bcud la lam gyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gis lus la zla ba pa nyid dang /lci ba nyid du zhugs par gyur te/kha dog bzang ngo'i gsal ba
168a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni nub par gyur pas 'jog rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to//bdag cag de za zhing zas su zab la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to//
168b1(mdo sde): bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung ngu zla ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog bzang por gyur kha zas ches mang du zla ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dran par gyur te/kha zas kyi tshad gnyid la
168b2(mdo sde): brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kwa'i sems can kho bos ni kha dog dang yan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems

168b4(mdo sde): de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sumatshogs pa byung bar gyur te/bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring gnas so//

168b6(mdo sde): kha dag gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnams gnyis yod pas/kwa'i sems can khro bo ni/khe dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog dran pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can
168b7(mdo sde): la khyad du gsod par byed do//bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to//sa zhag
169a1(mdo sde): de nub pan myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa/ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba
169a2(mdo sde): la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu zas gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur kha zas chos mang du zla ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan/
169a3(mdo sde): par gyur te/kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no//kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes
169a4(mdo sde): sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do//bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i tshes de dag nyid blangs par rgyus myu gu'i
169a5(mdo sde): tshal de nub par gyur to//myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/sbun pa med pa/shun pa med pa/dag pa/gtsang ma
169a6(mdo sde): skye ste/de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brdas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/bdag
169a7(mdo sde): tsocig da za zhing zas su za ba lo tshe ring zhing yuni ring du gnas so//gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongasu longs spyad pa
169b1(mdo sde): zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang /sbun pa dang /shun pas log par gyur to//brngas shing brngas na'ang sgyur mi skye bas brngas par mngon la/sA lu'ang sbubs sam
169b2(mdo sde): yal gA'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la/'di ni khyod kyi'o//'di ni nga'i'o zhes mu thug bri bar bya'o zhes de
169b3(mdo sde): rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshams su mu thugs bres so//gau tam dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bri ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no//
169b4(mdo sde): de'ang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin pas de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi mchog yin no//de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sA lu yod bzhin
169b5(mdo sde): du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so//sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo //mthong
169b6(mdo sde): nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//kwa'e sems can khyod rang gi skya lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes de par drangs tshur drangs nas ci tsam na
169b7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang du khrid de/shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sngo lu yod bzhin du lar gsum phye bar du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par len to zhes spros so//de nas sems can
170a1(mdo sde): de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so//kwa'e sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang /1/
170a2(mdo sde): sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byin cig/de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag sA lu
170a3(mdo sde): byir+ya par drangs tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas spyos so//de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di smras so//kwa'e sems can khyod
170a4(mdo sde): kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir par drangs rgyur drang sa nas ji tsam ni 'khor gyi nang du yang byung nas kyi'i phyir spyos/kA sems cani khyod song la phyin chad nga ltar mi
170a5(mdo sde): byed cig/de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag spyi lu'i phyir bar 'dron chung 'dren cing ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spro ba'ang snang bas/ma
170a6(mdo sde): la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cig gi nang na sems tan ldeg par gzugs bzang gi/lhag par lta na sdug pa/stug par mangs pa/lkug
170a7(mdo sde): par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang /des bdag cag chad pas gtsang bar bya ba rnam
170b1(mdo sde): pas gcod par 'gyur/phan bdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las de la chas bzhin du thog shas sbyin pa
170b2(mdo sde): bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/lhag par lta na sdug pa/lhag par mdzes pa/lhag par bsod nams che bar grags
170b3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/'di skad ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog/kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas chod cig/phan gdags
170b4(mdo sde): par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig/kho bo cag gi zhing dag 'a khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no//de de rnams la chad pas
170b5(mdo sde): gcad par bya ba la ni chad pas gcod/phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog
170b6(mdo sde): shas dbul te/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur shing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang po bkur ba zhes grags so//zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na
170b7(mdo sde): nyams pa las skyob por byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so//chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/shes rab nyams su
171a1(mdo sde): /blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyu ba zhes bya bar glags so//bau t+tam dag rgyu ba rgyang du sro dkur g+hu m+bi rnams kyi myong sems can sems can zhes
171a2(mdo sde): byA byar gyur to//gau tA ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur bo'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste gau ta ma dog rgya la po 'ad mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi myi tshur shog/rgyur shog ces bya bar gyu
171a3(mdo sde): spyod mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi mang smra ba can sme bcan zhes bya bar gyur to//gau tA ma dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces byaste/

171a5(mdo sde): kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rlung ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po gas sbyong 'phrogs kyi spyi bor sha chen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen to//dper na shid pal gyi
171a6(mdo sde): rlunga' ba'am/ras dal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod po mi skyed do//de smin nas ba~M rtol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/lhan sdug pa/mdzes pa/skyes bu chen
171a7(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/spyi bo las skyes pas spyi ba skyes zhes bya bar gyur to//gzhon nu byung ma thig tu rgyal po gas skyong 'a'agro
171b1(mdo sde): nas d+hA/khyi du pakrI ng+ku/de m+b+ha d+hA mA la'o ma gnas sa dums chu la snyan nas smras pa s+yA d+mas dugasas sa byung klagasag// ta sa dran
171b2(mdo sde): po ngomamo gang gi ci rgyu la srid byed pa de la kyi mi rnams sems pa d+mo/'jal ba byud/1 ga pa byu de/de rnams mas gnas ba d+hAgs
171b3(mdo sde): bcwo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas tha dad bdag byed du 'jug pas des ni/de rnams yid la skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so//gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug
171b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni cha tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no//gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i bad+ma g.yos par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/dper ni shing bal
171b5(mdo sde): gyi 'da' ba 'am/ras bal gyi 'dra' ba bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//de srin nus btol ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/skyes
171b6(mdo sde): blo chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/bad+mo g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes bAM zhes bya bar gyurate//gzhon nu de rdzu 'bru
171b7(mdo sde): zhing mthu che ba yin pasad dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go//gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes po 'jim zhi
172a1(mdo sde): shin tu mnyen te/dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ras dral gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chung chud kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//de smin nas brtol pa nga
172a2(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang ba/lhan sdug pa/mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/pad+mo g.yon pa lis skyes pas ming
172a3(mdo sde): nyo mdzes nyi mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to//gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas dra dung yang gling gsum la rgyul srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jog go//glu
172a4(mdo sde): tam dag rgyal po nyi mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par shir+m+man nog skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/dper ni shing bal gyi 'do' ba 'am/ras bal gyi mdo' ba bzhin
172a5(mdo sde): du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//de sbyin nas btul ba dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/lha na sdug pa/mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
