176b3(mdo sde): rngo mi thog gis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o//des smras pa/bu rung gis brang ngam/dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gI ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/khyod song
176b4(mdo sde): song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug cig/mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo mI spyil bu byas
176b5(mdo sde): te gnas so//de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na spyad 'tshang ma gzang mo zhes bya ba dang /skyes bu g.yon can pad+mo rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/des de la dga' mogur spyod
176b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro//des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las//yang mi gzhan zhig kA ra ShA pa Na lnga brgya thags pa zhig 'ongs nas/bzang mo dga'
176b7(mdo sde): mgur spyad kyis tshur shog/des bsams pa/gal te bdag song na kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin no snyam
177a1(mdo sde): nas des bu mo mngagu gzhugs ma la smras pa/so la pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mching nas re zhig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smos/
177a2(mdo sde): shig/des de'i gan du song nas smras so//mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de de dang dga' dgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo //des bsam pa/nam tshe de ring
177a3(mdo sde): du yod pas de'i sems kyang bsrung bar nus so//snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/pad+ma'i rtsa ldeg gi gang du seng la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na skyed mos tshal
177a4(mdo sde): gang du mchis zhes smros shig/des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang /des smras pa//khyod kyi skad cig la skabs med/skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/bu mo de de dang regs mi
177a5(mdo sde): 'phrod pa zhig pas/des smras pa/rje'i sras skabs mchis pa ni ma lags med kyi/de khyod kyi gros dang /rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do//de'i 'dod
177a6(mdo sde): chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te/de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/bu mo song la bzang mo pad+ma'i rtsa lag na
177a7(mdo sde): re skyed mos tshol ga ge mo zhig tu shog cig ces byos shig/des song nas bzang mo la smras nas/de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang /skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lagri smras pa/khyod kho bo
177b1(mdo sde): na rgyun gyi skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rigs sam/des smras pa/rje'i sras de ni bdag gis rmongs te 'on kyang dud myed ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod ce
177b2(mdo sde): de nas da mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shugs nas phyung ste bsad do//de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad do//jo mo bsad do zhes gu tso'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs chen
177b3(mdo sde): kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang /de ji tsam na besti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so//de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag con drang srong gau ta ma'i/
177b4(mdo sde): mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so//skye bo'i tshogs chen po de ral gri khrag can mthong nas smras pa/rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo gsad do zhes de nas drang srong
177b5(mdo sde): gr-i ta ma de bskor to/mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/kI'i rab tu byung ba dang drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/des smras pa/ci byas/de rnams
177b6(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do//des smras pa/kho bo'i sdig pa zhi ba las de mi byed do zhes de zhi ba smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs nges
177b7(mdo sde): lag pa byin ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so//rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa
178a1(mdo sde): yin pas/des smras pa/gal te de lta gyur na rab tu byung ba 'dis ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la gshon cig/de rab tu byung ba de me tog kar bi/
178a2(mdo sde): ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag ni mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang /tshong 'dus dang /bzhi mdo dang /
178a3(mdo sde): sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung na su gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no//de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus su
178a4(mdo sde): bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des phan tshun du bcol bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshin pa mthong/
178a5(mdo sde): nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/kyi hung bu 'di ci zhig/des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yid chad la gan tu
178a6(mdo sde): bab pa'i gnod pa'i tsher ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/mkhan po gzhan ci lags las lags mod//des smras pa/bu rma phyung ba'am/gnod pa zhig ma
178a7(mdo sde): byas grang /mkhan po bdog gis lus kyis rma byung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no//bu ji ltar shes/mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig/bden pa dang /
178b1(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag lus kyi rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dong //
178b2(mdo sde): tu gyur cig/bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to//
178b3(mdo sde): kun+da tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to//de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to//de nas drang srong
178b4(mdo sde): go'u ta mas smras pa/mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang /skye ba ni gang tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags des smras pa/bu bram
178b5(mdo sde): ze rnams khye'u med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na khyod kyi bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dmamakhan pa yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid
178b6(mdo sde): du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/bdag gi blo skye ba lta ga la mchis bu gal te de lta ni sngon yul la spyad po rjes su dran par gyis
178b7(mdo sde): shig/ mkhan po tshar ba drag pos nyen pas nga ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/'gum pa gcig tu dran par bas ni ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad
179a1(mdo sde): //pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pa sA de rdzu 'phrul gyis rje char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas dre lus
179a2(mdo sde): la phos pa dang /de nas char pa dang rlung grang mi reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/des sngon gyi yul la sprad pa rjes su dran par byi bar brtsams so//gang gi tshengs
179a3(mdo sde): 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo //bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/bdag sems pa
179a4(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten sems pa dang /sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o//khu ba'i thigs
179a5(mdo sde): pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang /khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram
179a6(mdo sde): shing gi tshal gse ba der de gnyis zhugs so//de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis dang srong gr-i ta ma gdungs nas shi'o//de nas
179a7(mdo sde): drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas ni/sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/de phan tshun rjes gcod
179b1(mdo sde): cing bla ngam shing tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo //des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsams pa las zhugs pa dang /drang srong pa ta ma
179b2(mdo sde): shu yin par gyur nas/de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun gsos te/de de gnyis kyi ming gtags te nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od
179b3(mdo sde): gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas nyi ma'i rigs yin pas des na nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to//drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa
179b4(mdo sde): la ni gau ta ma'i gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to//rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes bya bar gyur to//bu ma shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhipa
179b5(mdo sde): bu ram shing ba bu ram shing ba zhes bya bar gyur to//ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra dA dza du med par shri nas/blon po rnams 'dus nas spros bya bar brtsams pa/shes
179b6(mdo sde): ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/gzhan dag gis smras pa/de'i gcin gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste rgyal srid 'di ni de'i ri De rgyud du 'ongs pa
179b7(mdo sde): yin pas de dbang poskur ro//de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang /rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas smras pa/drang sro chen
180a1(mdo sde): /bo gau tA ma gang du mchos/des smras pa/khyod cag kho nas bsad do//de rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis du mdzad par yang mi dran
180a2(mdo sde): na ji ltar bsad/kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o mA nangs so//des de rnams dran par byas pa dang /smras pa/drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smras
180a3(mdo sde): ba'ang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhig shig/des sdig pa'i las ci byas/'di dang 'di'o//skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsod//
180a4(mdo sde): deltar ci mngon/des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des mi legs kyi/bdag cag
180a5(mdo sde): grigyis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du skye bar byed pa na/khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen
180a6(mdo sde): pokhye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/des smras pa/de kho na'i bu'o//de rnams kyis smras pa/'di gnyis dzA ltar skyes/'di gnyis kyi ming nI lags/des byung byedang
180a7(mdo sde): bcos par rgyas par smras pa/blon po rnams kyis de thos te mchog tu nge mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos
180b1(mdo sde): rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de'ang bu med par sha'o//de nas gcig shod nu bo dbang bskur rnam de'i ring rgyal blo bu ram shring ba zhes bya bar gyur to//gau tA
180b2(mdo sde): mo dge rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang /tsha ba dang /yang tsha dang /sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya'ang grong khyer gro 'dzin du byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
180b3(mdo sde): pubu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo //gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ra mi shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/skar mda' gtong dang /lag rna dang /gang po che 'dul dang
180b4(mdo sde): rkang pa gdub can no//dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa 'gram pa la btong de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lce ci'i
180b5(mdo sde): slad du phyag la zhal btang nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/des smras pa/de'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir phye mas khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/lha gal te de lta na
180b6(mdo sde): nyi'og gi rgyal po rnams la bya mo mchis na ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/rgyal pos smras pa/gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal sring mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di
180b7(mdo sde): dag yod na nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur/lha dgongs shig dang /bdag cag gis btsal lo//ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/
181b1(mdo sde): cig rtsed mo dang /dgyes pa dang /dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig/de la khye'u bca' bar 'gyur ram/'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/spyi ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal/rgyal po/
181b2(mdo sde): smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng li longs shig/de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de'ang rgyal pos mngon par
181b3(mdo sde): 'dod par gyur te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
181b4(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/lta na sdug pa/mdzes pa zhig btsos so//btsas
181b5(mdo sde): nas de'i bcas ston rgya cher byas pa te khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon
181b6(mdo sde): par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o//khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya bar nas rdzi ngon gnas pa'i pad+mo bzhin du myur du
181b7(mdo sde): skyed drag par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhing po rgyal pos thos nas/des de la pho nya btang ste/tshig rtsub po dang
182a1(mdo sde): chas pa'i spring yig bskur ba/khyed kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lda nu legs/gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu
182a2(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/kho bo'i nir 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go//rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/
182a3(mdo sde): blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/shes ldan dag de la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring nas de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal
182a4(mdo sde): cheb tu dbang bskur logs mod/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur
182a5(mdo sde): ba 'di ni 'os pa mi yin no//de rnams kyis smras pa/lce rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhin pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchi sran gdon mi 'tshal berare yul bur mar rlog pa gang
182a6(mdo sde): la kha'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dge'u rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid byer dbang bskor la/gzhon nu de rnams ni smyug tu gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag
182a7(mdo sde): skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug/lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/lha yi sman par ze gyi balhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang /
182b1(mdo sde): nongs pa ma mchis pa spyugs la skyon mchis pa dang /nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhag go/rgyal pos btang snyoms su gzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go//blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du
182b2(mdo sde): gros bya bar btsams pa/shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/des ni rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshil/
182b3(mdo sde): byi dor byas pa/ri mo sna tshogs khrid par shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar gzhag/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas po zhig byed
182b4(mdo sde): tu bcug go/de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de'i byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag cen de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo //
182b5(mdo sde): blon po rnams skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/'di su'i skyed mos tshal/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i lags so//de rnams
182b6(mdo sde): slar log par brtsams pa dang blon po rnams kyis smras pa/gzhon nu rnams nang du bzhugs shig/ci'i phyir slar ldog/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha'i skyed mos tshal yin
182b7(mdo sde): ni 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bor brtsams so//
183a1(mdo sde): blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so//rgyal po chas
183a2(mdo sde): pa dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug/blon po rnams
183a3(mdo sde): kyis smos pa/lha gzhon nu rnams so//gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so//blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis le gtugs te smras pa/lha bzod par mdzad
183a4(mdo sde): cing gzhon nu rnams spang bar gsol/rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams sprug par chad pa dang rgyal po'i rkang pa ginyes la gtugs nas smras
183a5(mdo sde): pa/lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na de tsi nas kyang mi dgag pa da ltar ba ka' stsal pa'i rigs so//rgyal pos bsgo nas//de rnams
183a6(mdo sde): chas pa na/de rnams dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas ni skye bo'i tshogs
183a7(mdo sde): rgyus so//blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par glu 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro//gal te lhan sgo chod cing /
183b1(mdo sde): de nas gzhon nu de rnams rung gi sring mo khrid nas mthar kyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gramA na/drang srong ser skya'i bsti granas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas de/
183b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/gnas btab nas ri dgas bsad cing bsod nas 'tshe ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do//lang tsho
183b3(mdo sde): dang drar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te/sha khri ngan pa skye bo bsed bsed por gyur to//ji tsam du gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skya'i de lta bu mthong
183b4(mdo sde): nas dris pa/khyed cag ci'i phyir skyes po bsad bsed por gyur/de rnams kyis smras pa/drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so//des smras pa//
183b5(mdo sde): rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig/drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ram/shes ldan dag rgyal rigs rgyal srid
183b6(mdo sde): stong pa rnams kyis rung ngo //de nas de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/mos dbyen gyi sring mo
183b7(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rnams dang de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga'o bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par
184a1(mdo sde): byed pa na bu po dang /bu mo dag bcas te de rnams chen por gyur pa dang /bsam gtan gyi tshur ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid
184a2(mdo sde): ma btub nas shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o//drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi tsher mi ni sgra yin pas rtse gcig po nyid du ma btub pas so//
184a3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po khyad 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/bdag cag gzhan du mchin/'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phogro cig/shes ldan dag rung ngo //drang srong bdag /
184a4(mdo sde): chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs /
184a5(mdo sde): so/drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhir sor skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to//de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs
184a6(mdo sde): chen por gyur te/dogs pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to//lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyis sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang /de rnams der dong ste
184a7(mdo sde): grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas bstan ces bya bar gyur to//de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gres bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan
184b1(mdo sde): dgra gang gi phyir bdag cag skyugs pa ni rig mnyam pa las chung ma ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis de bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste gcig
184b2(mdo sde): kho nas chog shes par bya'o//de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi chun ma ni mi len to//de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes pa bu sdug pa
184b3(mdo sde): rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/kye grong pa de dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug de rnams kyis smras pa/lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig la spyugs pa las
184b4(mdo sde): de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gang se ri dang nye ba chu bo skul ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas baitab ste rang rang
184b5(mdo sde): gi sring mo spangs te/mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/dga' bar bgyid/dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do//de rnams rtse bar bgyid/dga' bar
184b6(mdo sde): bgyid/dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa ni bu pho dang /bu mo dag btsas so//grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam/lha rdo thogs lags so//de nas rgyal
184b7(mdo sde): po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba ste/ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no//
185a1(mdo sde): ma saston na smras na shin tu spyod pa yin no zhes sems can dung /nas rgyab tu rgyu smra/ma na rnam sun 'du sanan/
185a2(mdo sde): zhon nu rnams ni shin tu 'od pa yin na nas bya bas du rnams sabya bar gyur/de rnams dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po mi shing po 'bigs skyes po nas rgyus
185a3(mdo sde): srid dga' rgyal skyid la dbang bskur ro//de'ang bu med par shi nas skor 'dal gtong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug lnga dbang byed du bcug go/de'ang bu med par shi nas log
185a4(mdo sde): na rgyal por gyur to//de 'ang bu med par shi nas glang po chu 'dul rgyal por 'gyur to//dri'ang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to//de'i bu gnas
185a5(mdo sde): 'jog go//gaut+ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi blas khyim mo//gau tA ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang /tsha ba dang /yang tsho dang /sum tshwa'i rgyud rgyal
185a6(mdo sde): bolnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang /shong rta ba rgya ba dang /shing rta dgu bcu dang /shing rta khwa kho /nga
185a7(mdo sde): rgyal dang /rten pa'i shing rta dang /gzhi bcu pa dang /gzhu brgya pa dang /gzhu dgu bcu dang /ga'u rgyal dang /gtsu gra dang /gzhu sbyinano//gota
185b1(mdo sde): dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/seng ge'i 'gram dang /sang ge'i spu'o//gau ta ma dag dzam+bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na seng ge'i 'gram mtsharA tu
185b2(mdo sde): grags so//gau tA ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/zas gtsang dang /zas dkar dang /bre bo zas dang /bdud rtsi'i zas so//bu mo gtsang ma dang /dkar mo dang /

185b4(mdo sde): shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no//bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ming chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o//bdud rtsi zas kyi bu gnyis te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
185b5(mdo sde): dang /lhas byin ni//gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rubya sad do//dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no//bre bo ma'i pu nI bzong lan no//bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni dge 'phel lo//
185b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin yin te/gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin du rdzogs srid pa'i gleng rgyud chad/'khor ba zad de
185b7(mdo sde): nga ni yang srid pa med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so//bzhugs nas
186a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mot+pal gyi bu lcags so legs so//maud+gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shA
186a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa'ong khyod legs so//maud+gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams
186a3(mdo sde): te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang /ngas ni de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam sa la bka' stsal pa//
186a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig/bzung shig lton shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
186a5(mdo sde): rigs rgyad la brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan pa chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung
186a6(mdo sde): bas shrI kya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam bzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so//de nas sar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
186a7(mdo sde): pa la mngon par dga' ste/rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sde nas dong ngo //de'i tshe grong khyer
186b1(mdo sde): ser skya'i gzhin rgyal po seng ge 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/'thab pa
186b2(mdo sde): dang /thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa dang /chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/'bras dang /bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang /ma he phun sum chog
186b3(mdo sde): pan bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do//grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid budu 'jug ste/'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /
186b4(mdo sde): bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang mi mdo pos gang ba/'thab pa dong /thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa dang /chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar bya bar gyur pa/'bras dang /

186b6(mdo sde): dam pa gzugs bzang ba/lta na sdug pa//mdzes pa/yul gyi bzang me lu ma bi na'i zhes bya ba yod do//lha so bstan ni khyim bdag phyug cing nar mang la long spyod che ba yo su bzung
186b7(mdo sde): ba'adra shing rgya ches rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa//rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa der kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
187a1(mdo sde): chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra bya dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags/
187a2(mdo sde): nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do//lu mi be nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes de/des smras pa/lho kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/rgyal
187a3(mdo sde): pos smras pa/da kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/gal te khyod la kun dga' ro ba dgos na khyod kyis phyir de bas lhag par bzung ba gzhan zhig bya'o//de nas rgyal
187a4(mdo sde): po logs par rab sad kyis lum bi nI'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/de'i ming lum bi nA'i tshil zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po
187a5(mdo sde): seng ge 'gram la yun ring po nas kye me'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur bar skye bar gyur kyang ci mu rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do//rgyal po lcogs par rab sad lo yang
187a6(mdo sde): yun ring po nas kye ma'i'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do//ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dang stan
187a7(mdo sde): rtsi bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/de zla ba brgya dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs
187b1(mdo sde): bzang ba/lhan sdug pa/mdzes pa/yan lag dang /hing lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcaso//bcas pa d+ma'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rabya sad btsun mo'i la DUr//
187b2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang lces bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/the tshom du gyur nas ci 'dri bu mo yin nam/'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i
187b3(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo//de'i bcas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do//blon po

187b5(mdo sde): 'di bu mo kho na lags te/sngon gyi las kyi rnam por smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o//gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu me/
187b6(mdo sde): ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/de bas nr-i bu me'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bgyi bar bdags so zhes btags
187b7(mdo sde): so/bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gta da de zhe sa bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar ma gong ma bzhin du'o//de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung
188a1(mdo sde): bskrun pa/mtshan tshun sum tshogs padu ma dang ldan pa zhig btsal bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to//yAng /
188a2(mdo sde): bar byud /dga' bar byed/druka' dgur sbrid par byud pa las bu ma gzugs bzang ba/lhan sdug pa mdzes pa/bad+mon/bzung po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig
188a3(mdo sde): btsas so//de bcas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang brgya chen pos snang bar byas te/sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de re gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du

188a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis lung bstan pa/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum nu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig brtul bar 'gyur te/de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bdun

188b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring ba/gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag

189b6(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /zhu tshon gyi la ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus to gtan la phab pa'o////rgya

190a1(mdo sde): dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po pad+ma rgyus pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun

190a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad+ma ltar byung ba'i//skyo ba mdzad ri bo lta bur mi bskyod thub pa'i sku//depe byad rgyun gyis brgyan cing mtshan gyi me tog
190a6(mdo sde): mdzes//blta bas mi ngoms rab mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod kyis bdag cig 'dir 'dus 'di dag la//dge slong 'ba' zhig gnas pas dge
190a7(mdo sde): gi/ngo bo dbye dang sgra 'jug ched bya ba//bzhi po 'di dag thub pas gsung du gsol//de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs rab dgyes te//nye bar 'khor la spyan gzig
190b1(mdo sde): 'di skad gsungs//legs par nyon cig bu khyod nye bar la bor//ngas ni khyod kyis sems rangs bya phyir dang //dge slong rnams la phan phyir de bshad do//dge slong zhes bya
190b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan te//dge slong zhes bya rdo rje srog shing yin//dge slong zhes bya sdug bsnol spangs pa ste//dge slong zhes bya rgyal ba'i sras po yin//dge slong zhes
190b3(mdo sde): bya nyon mongs srog bcad de//dge slong zhes bya thar pa'i tshul 'gro'o//dge slong rong gi ngo bo bsdams pa s+ho//rtsa ba bani sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu pa/ched du bya ba rnam
190b4(mdo sde): dog tshul khrims yin//dbye ba ming gi dge slong gang yin dang //rtags tsam 'dzin dang yang dgi dge slong ste//sku 'jug rnam sa zad byir dang //dge ba slong dang zas
190b5(mdo sde): slong dang //zhi bar gnas dang lam zhugs dang //legs par 'tsho dang chags spangs dang //yid 'di phyir na dge slong ngo //dge slong zhes bya brgyan pa ste//rgyan spangs
190b6(mdo sde): rgyan gyis legs par brgyan//chags spangs chags pa chen pos spyad//byug pa khrus dang bza' ba dang //rgyan dang gos dang kha dog dang //rta dang glang po khyogs sogs kyi
190b7(mdo sde): bzhon pa bla med de yang bzhon//de dag 'byor pa dge slong ste//de dag mi 'byor dge slong min//de nas nye bar 'khor de yis//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol//
191a1(mdo sde): ci de bde bar gshegs pa yis//smad byings rtogs par bka' bu gsungs//de nyid badre bar gshegs pa yis//tshig gi mun pa tshig gi ni//mar
191a2(mdo sde): mes gsal bar mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gser los sogs pa 'jig rten rgyun//rab tu spangs pasdu snying rje yi//rgyun gyis
191a3(mdo sde): mchog gis brgyan par bya//'jig rten ma yin bslab pa yi//gros gyon gos mchog bzang po yin//glo bur la sogs ma yin pa'i//tshul khrims byug pa
191a4(mdo sde): mchog gis byug/dkar dmar la sogs ma yin pa'i//dad pa'i kha dog rnam par mdzes//'jig rten ma yin brtson 'grus kyi//bzhon pa bla med mgyogs pa'i
191a5(mdo sde): mchog/bsam gtan chos spyod zas mchog ni//'bras chan pas ni ro mchog ldan//dge 'dun tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang //zhig nas stan la rab tu spyad//de dag ldan/
191a6(mdo sde): zhing phyir mi ldog/da ni yang dag dge slong yin//gtso bo gsum dang 'khor lngar ldan//drang srong snod bcas mkhar bsil ldan//lus ngag yid gsum rnam par bsdams//
191a7(mdo sde): rang gi spyod pa brtul zhugs bstan//de yang yang dag dge slong yin//de gnyis thar pa'i grong khyer la//bsnyen pas thar pa'i bde ba'i mchog/yang dag ma yin gcig
191b1(mdo sde): na//lhung bzed la sogs rab 'bar bas//dmyal bar khro chu lta bur ni/bskal pa stong phrag bani ru 'tshod//la la'i tshul khrims bde ba ste//la la'i tshul khrims sdug bsngal/
191b2(mdo sde): rgyud tshul khrims ldan pa bde ba'i mchog/tshul khrims 'chal ba sdug bsngal yin//shin tu lags par tshul khrims gang //bsdams pas mi de mdzes pa'i gzugs/
191b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba la ni nye bar gnas//tshul khrims bslab par nga yid ches//mi de nyi ma gcig la yang //bsod nams phung po dpag med pa//sog cing sangs rgyas 'bras bu skrun//
191b4(mdo sde): rang gis rang la bslus 'debs shing //bslab pa la ni mi gnas shing //bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin//gzugs tsam la ni brten nas su//nga ni dge slong yin
191b5(mdo sde): zer ba//blang skyon sna la rol btags pa 'am//sbrum ma skyur rtsi 'thungs pa ltar//mi de nyi ma gcig la yang //sdig pa'i sa bon dpag med dang //rang la gnod pa sna tshogs
191b6(mdo sde): pa/byed par 'gyur ba kho na yin//gang zhig bslab la mi gnas shing //bder gshegs rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa bas//bslab pa mi gnas skad cig la//gzugs der khyi
191b7(mdo sde): par gnas pa bzang //bslab pa mi gnas rtags 'dzin pa//'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi//snying du sdug par mi 'gyur zhing //kun gyi tshig gi ngan snod sa//dper na
192a1(mdo sde): sdong po bzang po la//yun ring yal ka 'khrung ba bzhin//mi de rtags tsam yun ring na//kha na mtho'i gtam 'bel dang //sdig pa'i lus rnams
192a2(mdo sde): 'phel bar bshad//tshul khrims 'dri ni 'dra ba'i mchog/tshul khrims 'di ni thar pa'i lam//tshul khrims 'di ni yon tan zhing //tshul khrims 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyu//
192a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'di ni rab mchog yin//mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du srungs//srog la bab kyang tshul khrims ni//gtong ba mi mkhas blun po yin//srog chad phyi mar skyo ba
192a4(mdo sde): ste/tshul khrims phyi nas de ltar min//de bas nye bar 'khor sogs kyis//'di nyid la ni brtan par zung /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/nye b.raro 'khor/
192a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so///
192a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/shI la si yug tasU tre/bod skad du/tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo//thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos
192a7(mdo sde): po dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsuM
192b1(mdo sde): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag shes pa ni 'grib/srog ni chud/tshe'i 'du byed ni nges par 'joms
192b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur na/ci'i phyir brtson 'grus dang /brtul ba brtan pas sgrub par mi byed/mi'i lus ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ni de thob nas des rnyed pa'i rgyal po'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba
192b3(mdo sde): 'ang rnyed na thar pa'i don dang mi mthun pa dag gis bslus te sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/srog dang bral zhing shi ba ni sla'i//tshul khrims nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
192b4(mdo sde): srog dang bral ba ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad par 'gyur gyi/tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni skye ba 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral zhing bde ba spangs te rnam par ltung ba
192b5(mdo sde): nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//de phyir ston pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad//tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad//tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kun gyi
192b6(mdo sde): mchog/tshul khrims 'byor pa dri dang byug pa yin//tshul khrims ldan pa dga' ba kun gyi gnas//tshul khrims ldan pa gdung ba sel ba'i chu//tshul khrims ldan pa
192b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun gyis bstod//tshul khrims dag gis 'gro ba dam pa mnos//ji ltar sbrul gdug klu chen nag po yang //tshu yi khrims can la gnod med gzhan ci smos/
193a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong 'od dang ldan//tshul khrims ldan pa glags 'gyur bde ba thog/tshul khrims ldan pa mtho ris 'gro ba'i rgyu//ji ltar mig
193a2(mdo sde): med gzugs mthong mi rung ltar//de bzhin tshul khrims me na chos mi mthong //rdo ltar rkang mid lam 'jug glu li nus//de bzhin tshul khrims med ni dUr mi 'gyur
193a3(mdo sde): ji ltar bum pa bzang pos rin chen snod//de bzhin tshul khrims chos rnams skyed pa'i gni//ji ltar bu mchog rin chen snod mi rung //de bzhin tshul khrims dal byas
193a4(mdo sde): chos kun gtugs//dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa des//phyi nas mya ngan 'das pa thob sgyu ma 'am//sku dang rna rdum la sogs gang yin pa//de la me long dag ni
193a5(mdo sde): dgos mi 'gyur//rna bas ma thos mig sngar ma mthong bzhin//bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur//thos meng thos ldan thos srung mtho ris nyid//bud med bstan
193a6(mdo sde): drug la rung //rgyal dri'o pho byung ga la dga'//dbyu ba skyong po ga la yod//longs spyod rtag pa ge lnga yin//bud med dge la rlung ba med//rgyal srid dgal dga' ba
193a7(mdo sde): med//dbu ba dag la snying po med//longs spyod dag la rtag pa med//longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin//glu de ci 'dra khyim de 'dra//me tog tse 'dra gzugs de
193b1(mdo sde): //srog ni rgyu bur 'dra ba yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//
193b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/pany+tsa par+t+ti ni kA ya shU b+hU shrA b+hA phal pa rik+Sha sU tra/
193b3(mdo sde): bod skad du/ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cab phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gos thos
193b4(mdo sde): pa dus na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
193b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/dge slong dag dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal tshon bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/
193b6(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis le lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lho rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag bslab pa'i chos gang dag bsrung ba dang /spong ba dang /
193b7(mdo sde): yongs su skyong ba dang /'da' bar mi byed pa dang /de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /rab tu ston pa ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro rgyal chen bzhi'i pa'i ris kyi lha rnams su
194a1(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /lha'i kha dog dang /b+ha'i stobs dang /lha'i bde ba dang /lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lhar
194a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lo lnga brgya gang
194a3(mdo sde): yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go//nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni dmyal ba
194a4(mdo sde): chen po yang sos kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag bslab pa'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /mi sbed pa dang /yongs su mi skyong ba dang /de dag las 'da' bar byed pa
194a5(mdo sde): dang /'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag der yang sdug bsngal
194a6(mdo sde): drag pa dang /rtsub pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong nga'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag dzam+bu'i gling ba'o mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa
194a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcing //zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo stong ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
194b1(mdo sde): che'i che dade//dge slong drugs skur bshags pa'i chos gang dag srung ba dang //sred pa dang /yongs su sbyong ba dang /'da' byur mi byed pa dang /de dag las 'das bstun
194b2(mdo sde): bdang /rab tu sbyin pa de ni lus nIg nas bde 'gro sam curtsa gsum gyi rgyu rnams su spro bar 'gyur te/dri dag der yang mo pa 'i 'di dpa lta'i stangs dang /sna'i 'dis
194b3(mdo sde): dang /lha'i dbang phyug la du byed ci b+hU TI gzugs dang /smr-i dang /d+hi dang /ro dang/ra bya nga /lha'i gamag 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag smra
194b4(mdo sde): rtsa grusum gyi lha rnams kyi lce stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig go/nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo/
194b5(mdo sde): gcig tu rtsis pa lo stong ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dgas su rab shugs pa'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /mi sbrid pa dang /yongs
194b6(mdo sde): mi spyod pa dang /de dag las 'di bar byed pa dang /'das pa de dge mi ston pa dang /d+hu m+bi sbyin bu de ni lum zhig nas shi 'i 'og tu dmyal 'dzin po zag nag tu skye ba
194b7(mdo sde): 'byor te/de dag der yang sdug bsngalo drag pa dang /grub pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ang ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro//nyes byas kyi ltung ba brtag pa'o//
195a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go//nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig/
195a2(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo nyis stong ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag ltung byed kyi chos gang dag srung ba dang /sbed pa dang /yongasu
195a3(mdo sde): skyong ba dang /'da' bar mi byed pa dang /de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /rab tu ston par de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtshe ma'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag der
195a4(mdo sde): yang lha'i tshe dang /lha'i khaM dog dang /lha'i stobs dang /lha'i bde ba dang /lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /
195a5(mdo sde): lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lo nyis stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig go//nyin
195a6(mdo sde): zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcog//zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo nyis stong ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag ltung byed kyi chos
195a7(mdo sde): gang dag mi srung ba dang /mi sbed pa dang /yongs su mi skyong ba dang /de dag las 'da' bar byed pa dang /'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang /rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus
195b1(mdo sde): zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal bu chen po bsdus 'joms su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /rtsub pa dang tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong
195b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//ltung byed kyi ltung ba brtag pa'o//dge slong drag dzam+bu'i gleng pa'i mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/nyin
195b3(mdo sde): zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag sbom po'i chos gang dag srung ba
195b4(mdo sde): dang /sbed pa dang /yongs su skyong ba dang /'da' bar mi byed pa dang /de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang /rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
195b5(mdo sde): su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag der yang lha'i tshe dang /lha'i kha dog dang /lha'i stobs dang /lha'i bde ba dang /lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing lha'i gzugs dang /sgra dang /
195b6(mdo sde): dr-i dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lo bzhi stong gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi
195b7(mdo sde): nyin zhag gcig go//nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go//zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ni dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong
196a1(mdo sde): dag sbom po'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang /mi sbed pa dang /yongs su mi skyong ba dang /de dag las 'dar bar byed pa dang /'das pa de dag mi
196a2(mdo sde): ston pa dang /rab tu mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skye bar 'gyur to/de dag der yang sdug bsngal shin tu drag pa dang /rtsub pa dang //
196a3(mdo sde): tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshar ba myang bar 'gyur ro//sbom po'i ldan pa brtag pa'o//dge slong dag dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo brgyad bcu gang yin pa de ni
196a4(mdo sde): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go//nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go//zla ba bcu gnyis le lo gcig tu rtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnam
196a5(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad do//dge slong dag lhag ma'i chos gang dag srung ba dang /sbed pa dang /yongasu skyong ba dang /'da' bar mi byed pa dang /de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang //
196a6(mdo sde): rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bdi 'gro 'phrul dga'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/de dag dor yang lha'i tshe dang /lha'i kha dog dang /lha'i stobs dang /lha'i
